item.text: @#/ /rgyud pha pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems
@#/ /rab tu bskyed nas pad+ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hrIH'i 'phro 'du las zhal
gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og ma na bgrang phreng mu tig dkar
po/ g.yon 'og ma na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas
pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma dang / yab
nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te
'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan gcig brjod dam/ dran zhing
yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus la bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na/ mtshams med pa lnga dang /
de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal

dang bcas par mi skye'o/ /mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes brjod pas 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste/ 'di la the tshom mam/
@#/ /som nyi'am/ yid gnyis ma za zhig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ pad+ma mu ku Ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom
ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i
gzhal med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sgo kun nas 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas reg ma thag tu
bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo/ /nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag
stong spyan stong dang ldan pa/ sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ steng gi zhal ser ba/ g.yas ljang
gu| g.yon dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nag po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni/ byi ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te 'dzum pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang / /khyad par cho ga bstan par gyis/ /zhes gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/ sku ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/ /thugs rje
dag pas chu shel te/ /mnyam par bzhengs pas 'gro don mdzad/ /chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar/ /ljang gu'i mdog can nag po che/ /ser po de bzhin
@#/ /bcom ldan dmar/ /drang srong dag tu ri dwags brgyan/ /zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang / /khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes/ /bcu pa
sems dpa'i rtags can te/ /bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag /yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng / /'phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa/ /dang po'i phyag ni thal
sbyar te/ /g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o/ /g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te/ /g.yas pa 'khor lo
rab tu 'dzin/ /g.yon pa na ni mda' gzhu ste/ /lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan no/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de cod pan gnyis nas rin
po che rab tu 'phro ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par
snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'o/ /khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng+ge
dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / glang po che'o/ /de dag ni/ cod pan las byung ba'o/ /yang / yum ni sku mdog sngon mo ste/ pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i
steng / /tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes/ /sems dpa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi/ /mnyam pa yi ni skyil krung bcas/ /yab ni sku mdog ser po ste/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i
steng / /thal sbyar nor bu'i bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma
ni| |gzhon nu ut+pal mchog sbyin mdzad/ /zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog /cung zhig khros pa rdo rje can/ /dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste/ /nyi zla'i steng na pad+ma
'dzin/ /drag po gnyis dang hrI yig las/ /gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bur rdzogs/ /ha ya gri bas khams gsum sdud/ /khro gnyer can gyis 'phrin las mdzad/ /
gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing / /khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms/ /'khor lo dkar po dge ba'i steng / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /dang
por dkon mchog rab dad cing / /tshad mad bzhi ni yongs su rdzogs/ /byang chub yan lag rdzogs pa dang / /chos kyi rang bzhin stong nyid do/ /gleng gzhi dang / sku
bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams
@#/ /thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM hUM trAM hrIHyAH/ na no rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga

ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+had b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ nA ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te wa T+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me wa re/ i
li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA/ sngags 'di rnams kha ton byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos lan gcig brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas
sam| lus la bcangs na/ mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las 'byang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
su mi skye zhing / mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gcan gzan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa thams
cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NaM/ A d+ya nut+pan+na twata zhes pas gtor ma'i chus yi dwags
la mchod par bya ste/ oM AHhUM zhes bas so/ /de rnams srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes pas so/ /'dis ni/ rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/
de'i phan yon ni/ 'di'o/ /chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA d+hu pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma
ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA puSh+pe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maH
sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nai wi d+ya pU dze me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta
shap+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /
stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i/ /hrIHyig dkar po yang dag ldan/ /sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //
las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ /dang po zhi ba'i las bsgrubs na/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dkar po dang po gsal dus su/ /dri zhim chu yis legs
@#/ /byugs te/ /me tog dkar po bkram byas nas/ /khrus dang kha zas phyogs mthun pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /bum pa
dkar po tsan+dan dkar/ /dris bkang gos kyis legs par dkri/ /maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag /hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku/ /zhal gcig
phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams/ /zla ba'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa/ /hrIHlas 'od zer 'phro ba bsgom/ /phyag stong
spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal ba ni/ /bzlas pa rab tu gsal ba ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod
par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sa gA ra bai ro tsa na ya/ byU ha rA dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+had
b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya a ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ a mi ta b+ha ya che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ zhes bzlas
par bya'o/ /bruM/ rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chus/ /gang dag legs par khrus byed pa/ /dri ma thams cad yongs dag nas/ /'bras bu bde ba de thob 'gyur/ /
'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas/ /myur du chu skyes mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na/ /nags tshal shin tu mtho bar ni/ /dri zhim chu yis legs
byugs la/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram/ /rgyan rnams yongs su btags nas ni/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru snar bcas/ /rin
chen ga 'ur blug par bya/ /maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag /hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs
pa pad+ma bsnams/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar

bzlas| |na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sa ga ra bai ro tsa na ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha da b+h+yaH/
samyak+saM b+hud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maHAR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na ku na puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ bang mdzod stong pa'i thog bzhag
na| |'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur/ /de nas dbang gi las byed na/ /sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram/ /pa la sha dang a shwat+tha/ /me tog dmar po'i ril bu
@#/ /byas| |bse gab dmar po'i nang du gzhug /me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod/ /hrIHyig las byung sgrol ma'i sku/ /ljang gu phyag na
lcags kyu 'dzin/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /mchod pa lnga yis mchod byas te/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar
bzlas| |na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sa ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+saM b+hud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+had
b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM b+hud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha b+hasmi ku ru/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+hasmi
ku ru swA hA/ rdzas kyi lde gus lus byugs na/ /byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur/ /de nas 'phrin las byed 'dod na/ /dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni/ /
ba yi lci bas legs byugs nas/ /me tog sngon po nim pa yi/ /spos kyi tshom bu lnga steng dgram/ /byang chub 'dug ste las 'di brtsam/ /gcan gzan steng du chu
shel te| |hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /ri dwags pags pa 'dzin pa yi/ /drang
srong khros pa'i cha byad can/ /phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa/ /g.yon pa pad steng ral gri can/ /g.yas pa ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdung / /rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan
pa'o| |g.yon na thod pa dkar po ste/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang / /rgyal po chen po rol pa ltar/ /cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o/ /phyag stong spyan yang de
bzhin te/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong / /pad+ma'i gdan la legs zhugs pa'i/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung
ba'i| |gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa rA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+saM b+hud+d+hA ya/
na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+had b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM b+hud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te
ni ka Te/ ka Ta ka Ta ka ro Te ka ro Ta bI R+ye swA hA/ oM karma a mo g+ha bi badzra siM ha na di hUM phaT/ dri'am byug pa dag la ni/ /btab pa lus la byug par bya/ /me tog sngon po
mgo la gzhag /maN+Dal chu yis lus la byug /nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas na ni/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bzhi ga sgrub 'dod na/ /bkra shis dus
@#/ /su rdzogs dus su/ /ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu/ /sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste/ /maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni/ /dri zhim dkar pos
yongs gtor te/ /gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams dgram/ /gtsang ma bram ze byas te gzhag /khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te/ /hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng //
chu skyes mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang / /'dzum zhing zhi ba'i cha byad can/ /ljang gu bzhad pa'i zhal gsum pa/ /nag po khros pa dmar ser skra/ /ser po'i zhal
ni 'dzum pa ste/ /dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu/ /ri dwags pags pas stod g.yogs shing / /sna tshogs sham thabs mnabs pa yi/ /zhabs gnyis
phyag drug mnyam par bzhengs/ /g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar/ /bar ma bgrang phreng pad+ma bsnams/ /tha ma mchog sbyin spyi blugs 'dzin/ /bum pa rnam snang
lha mo ni| |lA s+ye ma le girti ste/ /nirti nang gi lha mo dag /zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas
par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+had

b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ aT+Te Te waT+Te Te/
tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma wa re/ i li mi li tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ bum pa'i chu la legs bsgrubs nas/ /lus la byugs na 'grub par
'gyur| cho gas sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas thabs kyi rim pa ni/ gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la/ /ra yi 'o mas bris pa
yi| |tshom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la/ /dbus su sku yi sa bon te/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste/ /shar du de yang bri bar bya/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan/ /lho ru de ni yang
dag dgod/ /lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum/ /nub tu de ni yang dag dgod/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /e yi rnam par sbyar ba ste/ /byang du de ni yang dag dgod/ /dbus
su thugs kyi sa bon te/ /shAn+tiM ku ru mtshams su'o/ /swA hA dbus su dgod par bya/ /de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas/ /dngul lam dkar po'i ga'ur gzhug /
thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur/ /yung ba'i chu yis bris pa yi/ /puSh+TiM ku ru mtshams su'o/ /kham phor ser por legs par gzhug /rgyas pa'i las rnams
@#/ /'grub par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yis legs par bris/ /ba shaM ku ru mtshams su dgod/ /kham phor dmar por legs par gzhug /dbang
gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /nim pa'i chu yis legs par bris/ /mA ra ya ni mtshams su dgod/ /lcags sam thod par
yang dag gzhug /'phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dkar po dri zhim zhing / /zhi bas de ni me la bsreg /'bras bu mngar dang bcas pa'i shing //
rgyas pas de ni me la bsreg /dbang ni pa la sha yi shing / /de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur/ /nim pa'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i/ /bsregs pas 'phrin
las 'grub par 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas las kyi rim pa ni/ /dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dab/ /til dang
yungs kar ci tse la/ /gsang sngags bzlas nas grub pa ni/ /da li'i shing la legs bsregs nas/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /ku sha star bu shug 'brum
dang / /stag pa'i me tog dmar po dang / /gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas nas/ /tsan+dan shing la legs bsregs nas/ /rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub
cing / /nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi shing dag dang / /khre dang ci tse mo sran la/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te/ /pad+ma ka yi shing la
bsregs/ /nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /thams cad dbang du 'dus par 'gyur/ /gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni/ /bra bo mon sran til nag po/ /gsang sngags
rab tu bzlas byas te/ /kha ti ra yi shing la bsreg /nus dang ldan te las rnams ni/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /pra ha kha tsha'i shing dag la/ /lo ma
'bras bur bcas pa dang / /rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas/ /mya ngan 'tshang gi shing la bsreg /nus pa thob nas myur du ni/ /mi rnams thams cad dbang
du sdud| |ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba la/ /mu la pa tra'i shing dag la/ /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/ /a ru ra yi shing la bsreg /'khor lo'i 'og tu
bcug pa yis/ /rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi shing dag dang / /kA ra bi ra'i 'bras dag la/ /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/ /'dzam bu'i
shing la rab bsregs nas/ /ral gri 'og tu bcug na ni/ /yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /tshe rabs brgya ru lon pa'i rus/ /mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa
@#/ /dag /gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/ /skyer pa'i me la rab bsregs te/ /lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na/ /glang po dbang du
'gyur bar byed/ /ba le ta dang ta le sha/ /kha ti ra dang d+ha ti ma/ /dur khrod shing la rab bsregs na/ /stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du/ /nas dang 'bras dang
so ba dang / /sman dang rin chen sna tshogs kyis/ /maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /pad+ma chu shel las skyes pa'i/ /
chu shel mdog can 'dzum dang bcas/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs/ /ku sha'i stan la shar du 'dug /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis/ /byams
pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang / /shu ba g.yan pa me dpal dang / /nad dang gdon ni thams cad bzlog /mtshams
med lnga dang mi dge ba'i/ /'bras bu sdug bsngal thams cad bzlog /me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas rgyal po'i 'jigs pa la//
maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te/ /mchod yon me tog dkar po dang / /ci 'byor pa yis mchod pa yis/ /rgyal po lta
bu'i gzugs la mchod/ /sdig pa thams cad de mdun du/ /bshags nas myur du skyabs su 'gro/ /gro ga dag gam shing shun la/ /rgyal po dag gi gzugs byas
te| |yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis/ /tshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing / /byams pa'i sems kyis chu bo la/ /bkur na rgyal po'i chad las thar/ /oM hUM trAM hrIHAHsho
na ha ri ma ka to/ sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ gcan gzan 'jigs pa 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la/ /me tog dkar pos rab tu gtor/ /mchod
pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod/ /sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro/ /'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga/ /tshon sna lnga yi phur ma lnga/ /byas pa lus la btags pa la/ /
gcan gzan 'jigs pa thams cad las/ /myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur/ /oM AHhUM triM hrIHsho sha na ha ri ha tirma ka ro sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ chom rkun dag
gis 'jigs pa la/ /me tog sngon po rdo rje can/ /mthing nags gnon phyag rgya can/ /mchod nas bdag nyid skyabs su 'gro/ /oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHta ka ka ra Na ga ra kha ti
ba swa d+hi tsikra ta ya ri ka tse tsa tra tin du dan+ta sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swA hA/ sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la/ /bal po se 'u'i lcug ma la/ /bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan
@#/ /bsgoms nas/ /rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms te/ /spyi bor mu tig byi ru dang / /man shel pad+ma rA ga dang / /in+d+ra nI la dung g.yas
'khyil| |gser dang dngul dang dur ba dang / /rin chen rgyan dang 'bru snar bcas/ /ku sha gla rtsi tsan+dan dang / /ba lu skyer pa ut+pa la/ /gur gum dri zhim lus
la byug /oM rat+na saM b+hA ba sa taM bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swAhA/ /lce 'bab pa yis 'jigs pa la/ /stag dang 'brug gi rus pa dang / /'khar ba'i phye ma
lcags phye dang / /zangs phye ra gan phye ma dang / /gser gyi phye ma gro bar btum/ /snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te/ /byams pas phyogs mtshams
kun tu bstan/ /dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdug /oM a mr-i ta badzra dz+wa la badzra dz+wa la/ gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swAhA/ mi yis 'jigs pa dag la
ni| |'brug rus sen da wa sha dang / /til dang sA lu tsi tsi dang / /nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum gyi/ /thang phrom dag la sngags btab ste/ /mi yi phyogs su
gtor bar bya/ /oM bai ro tsa na pra b+ha dz+wa la dz+wa la sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swAhA/ rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgoms te/ /me la gtor nas sa yis gsod/ /
chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la/ /mdze can pho mo'i thod pa ni/ /ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag /sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas/ /nang du bcug ste chu bor
dor| |don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal/ /oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ oM ka bai tA ra Ni sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swAhA/ phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /thugs rje chen
po'i sku mchog ni/ /so sor gsal zhing bsgom par bya/ /so so'i dbu la so sor bsam/ /byams pas kun la rab tu blta/ /'jigs pa kun las grol
bar 'gyur/ /'jigs pa kun srung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod/ /sa gzhi dri yis chag chag btab/ /snying po
gzungs dang bcas pa'am/ /khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la/ /legs par mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /thugs rje'i gzugs
kyi rten du shar/ /rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan/ /byang chub phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs/ /dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste/ /rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /
byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni/ /khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan/ /lha yi rol mo char du 'bab/ /chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gter/ /rin chen lnga yi bdag
@#/ /nyid de| |phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che/ /de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa/ /mtshams
med lnga dang mi dge bcu/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams/ /skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur/ /shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni/ /
byams ldan snying rje can gyis byas/ /bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /'bri mkhan snying rje can gyis bya/ /rang bsam rnam par dag pa yis/ /mdun du
bdar te mchod par bya/ /tshad dang kha dog yongs dag gsal/ /yid du 'ong ba dag la'o/ /zas dag yid du 'ong ba yi/ /dkar gsum sbags pa spangs
ba yis| |sha dang sgog pa la phug dang / /zan dang chang ni shin tu sprang / /shel phreng pad+ma'i snying po dang / /bo d+hi tse dang mu tig shis/ /glal dang sbrid pa
mi tshigs rnams/ /nam yang chod par mi bya'o/ /yo byad dang dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //las rnams sna tshogs sgrub
byed na| |po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la/ /brten nas bdag ni byams sems ldan/ /muM las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni/ /dmar ser ut+pal pu ti
'dzin| |mnyam pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /bum pa kha dog ser po ni/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru snar bcas/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me wa re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA/ lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na/ /gti mug
thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur/ /ras ris mchod rten la brten nas/ /maN+Dal dri zhim me tog dgram/ /dkar gsum mngar
gsum dag dang ni/ /'bras dang til dang yungs kar dang / /pad+ma'i rtsa ba dkar po la/ /ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni/ /
hrIHlas byung ba'i sku mdog dkar/ /phyag na pad+ma mchog sbyin mdzad/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru
d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me wa re/ i li mi le/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA/ ril bu dag la sngags btab ste/ /byams
pa'i sems dang ldan pas bza'/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas/ /rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas/ /ut+pal sngon
@#/ /po nim pa dang / /a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang / /dri yi chu yis bum pa dgang / /phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can/ /sku mdog ljang sngon
cung zhig khro/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ aT+Te baT+Te/ tsa
le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me wa re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swAhA/ hUM bskyed phyag na rdo rje yis/ /bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas
na| |zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ /dug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //ras sam
gro ga shing shun la/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes bya'o/ /srung ba lus la btags
byas na/ /nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni/ /'jigs pa'i nad dang gdon las thar/ /bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skud pa dag ni dkar po
la| |mdud pa dag ni rab byas te/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas nas/ /srung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na/ /srung ba yi
ni dam pa 'dis/ /srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'o/ /mu tig rin chen byi ru gser/ /ga bur gur gum gla rtsi dang / /a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /phur ma snying gar gdags
par bya| |tsan+dan gla rtsi gur gum dang / /gu gul nag po bsregs pa'i phye/ /ba yi 'o mas lde gu byas/ /gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni/ /gdon dang nad
kyis 'jigs kun la/ /byugs pas de ni srung bar 'gyur/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //ser ba yongs su srung ba ni/ /
seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la/ /gzungs sngags bzlas nas dbus su ni/ /hUM las byung ba'i sku bskyed do/ /phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni/ /shar du khams gsum
rnam rgyal ni/ /sku mchog dkar po me dpung 'bar/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /oM pra dz+nyAn+ta kri ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni/ /dmar
nag lag na be con 'dzin/ /oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni/ /me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin/ /oM ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/
byang du khro gnyer can sku ni/ /ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste/ /oM a mo g+ha ka b+h+r-i ku Ti ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ne/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa
@#/ /gcig bzlas/ /gcan gzan dri ma yungs kar bsres/ /gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor/ /oM badzra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha
tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ser ba srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zar rab tu bkye ste
phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer byung ba 'di lta ste/ dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po dang / ljang gu dang / ser po ste/ 'od zer de dag gis
'gro ba ris drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste dbugs dbyung bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang /
dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang /
tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod
nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de
dag gis mchod pa'i sprin gyi char phab nas lha'i bu rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku/ /phyag stong nyon mongs sgrol ba'i phyag/
spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te/ /'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bstod nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar gyur
nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bus gsol pa/ 'di'i phan yon ci yin zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| gang zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na/ /nad dang rims dang gdon dang ni/ /rgyal po gcan gzan 'jigs pa dang / /'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'dod
chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /mtshams med sdig pa mi dge kun/ /rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur/ /dmyal ba ngan song sdug bsngal dang / /mi khom brgyad las
rnam grol te/ /nyan dang 'chad dang sgom par 'gyur/ /dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes bka' stsal nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas legs
@#/ /so legs so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa
rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lots+tsha ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /
rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po'i rtog pa ni/ /mdor bsdus 'dir
ni brjod bya ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rgyun chen po/ /'dod pa'i don kun rab ster ba/ /dang por re zhig rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su
hUM gis dag par byas par nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra sra b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes brjod la thams cad stong pa'i rnam
par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/ de ltar brjod la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
bsam par bya'o/ /zla ba'i steng du hrIH'i sngags gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug bgom par bya ste/ sems dpa' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/
phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar pa/ mchan du ni gos dkar mo de la 'khyud pa/ pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed cing gar gyi tshul can/ khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed par
bsgoms la 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /'dod chags skyon gyis ma gos shing / /de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon/ /khams gsum
rnam par dag pa'o/ /dbu rgyan 'od dpag tu med par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bak+tsi ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/
de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyad du lha mo rnams bsam mo/ /oM bi lo ki ni/ a ba lo ki ni/ a ba lo ka ya swAhA/ shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs
ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma
@#/ /bsnams pa'o/ /oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsakra brti ni hUM/ nub kyi 'dab ma la b+hu ri Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams
pa'o/ /oM b+h+ri ku TI tA re tu ta ma tA hUM/ byang gi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po bsnams pa'o/ /oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ 'di
ni| pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtshams su btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /oM badzra pad+me shwa ra ma ra pad+me hUM/ lho phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma
dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ 'di ni/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ste/ nub phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma nag po bsnams pa'o/ /oM bi shwa bak+t+re hUM/
'di ni/ sna tshogs kyi zhal can te/ byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /oM hrIHpad+ma na rte shwa ra hUM/ ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags
chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ /de ltar gang sgom pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na/ dngos grub brtan
por 'gyur ro/ /des sangs rgyas nyid dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ster ro/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing / /gzungs dang sa yang de
bzhin no/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing / /so so rang nyid rjes su sgrub/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni byang sems nyid/ /rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /yid 'ong sangs
rgyas go 'phang ni/ /spyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar dang rab sbyar te/ /rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin/ /sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /bcud kyis len ni bde ba yang / /'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /gzhon zhing nad
med dam bde zhing / /tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /skal bzang ye shes bla na med/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub pa'o/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /
dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa/ /rengs dang phur bus gdab nyid dang / /nam mkhar 'gro ba de bzhin no/ /sa bcu'i
dbang phyug thob 'gyur zhing / /ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur/ /de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje dam tshig de yis ni/ /rig pa dang ni bcas pa'i mchog/
'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM hrIHpad+ma ni rte shwa ra hUM/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams
@#/ /par 'gyur ro/ /yang na lnga brgya bzlas brjod byas na/ nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong bzlas brjod byas na/
dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlas brjod byas na/ thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang
stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na/ skal ba bzang ba dang / g.yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na/ dbul
ba med par 'gyur ro/ /yang na stong phrag lnga bzlas brjod byas na/ dgra thams cad kyi snying 'khrug par byed do/ /stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na/
dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ bdud bzhi las mchog tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod
byas na/ rig 'dzin ma grub par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas na/ gnod sbyin mo grub par 'gyur ro/ /khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ lha
dang / klu dang / mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na/ bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
stong phrag sum cu bzlas brjod byas na/ bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na/ mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par
'gyur ro/ /stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na/ ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na/ grub pa'i rig 'dzin du
'gyur ro/ /stong phrag bdun cu bzlas brjod byas na/ sa gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /stong phrag brgyad cu bzlas brjod byas na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
por 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na/ rang dga'i
gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /bzhi cha dang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlas brjod byas na/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na/
thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub par 'gyur zhing lus dang ngag dang yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo/ /
'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o/ /oM paN+Da ri ba si ni ba ri de hUM/ 'di ni/ gos dkar mo'i sngags te/ lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa'i
@#/ /rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed/ nub bdun gyi nang rol tu rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don dang / skye 'gro'i tshogs dang /
btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu'i
rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/ gang yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing / /dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM bi lo ki ni a ba lo kA ya swA hA/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni/ stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na/ me long dang / mtheb chen
dang / nam mkha' la sogs pa la gsal po pra dbab pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang sngon byung ba dang / da ltar dang / phyis 'ong ba de ston par byed do/ /
yang na so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon par bsngags par byas la/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus su so shing 'chos nas mi smra bar nyal na/ dgos pa gang
yin pa rmi lam du ston par byed do/ /de yang 'khrul pa med par ston no/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas
rna/ 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang
nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur gum dang / rgya skyegs dang / rang byung gi me tog dang / byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu
rno ba'i 'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsam la/ chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya'o/ /de
yang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du ltung ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o/ /yang
na lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / blon po dang / skyes bu'am gang 'dod pa
de dmar por rnam par bsams la/ de'i snying gar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i lcags kyus 'bigs bzhin pa dang / zhags pas rked
pa nas bcings la 'gugs bzhin pa 'dod pas myos par gyur par rab tu gsal por bsam par bya'o/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du
@#/ /'gyur ro zhes bya'o/ /oM b+hu ri Ni ma hA tsa kra bi rta ni hUM/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni/ dri chen dang / rdo rje chu la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la ji ltar
rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la/ de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos gling ngam gling gzhan dang / grong khyer dang / grong dang / yul 'khor gyi rgyal por
bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o/ /des bdag po nyid du 'gyur zhing longs spyod la longs spyad nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /
oM b+h+r-i ku TI tA re tu ta ma ta hUM/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs la dug dang / tshwa dang / ske tshe dang / khrag dang / chu bo'i 'gram
gnyis kyi sa dang / dri chen rdo rje chus bsnos la gzugs brnyan byas la mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/ thod pa kha
sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o/ /zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sems la sdig pa med par gyur
na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /oM ma hA shri ye ma Ni pad+me hUM/ lha mo 'di la dri dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bsod
snyoms kyi zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas na/ thams cad du srung bar 'gyur ro/ /yul chos kyi rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro/ /yang na pad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra pad+me shwa
ri ma ra pad+me hUM/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma 'di yid kyis bzlas na/ dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags te gtsugs phud
mdud na/ rang srung zhing rims dang / lkog nang dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon dang / me dang / rkun po dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sbrul dang / 'ching
ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / sha za'i nad stong phrag gcig bzlas pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig gi las kyis rjed byed kyi gdon dang / zad byed dang / skyug pa
dang / bri bar dka' ba dang / sgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams cad nyams par byed do/ /'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/ lus 'phel
zhing skal ba bzang ba dang / lus gzhon zhing nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do/ /yang na klu thab khung du bris la der dug dang /
@#/ /ske tshe dang / tsha ba'i sbyin sreg bya zhing / klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ char chen po phab nas mu ge med par
'gyur ro/ /oM bi shwa pad+me hrIH/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'di ni/ rmongs pa dang / rengs pa dang / mnan pa dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang /
phur bu dang / mig 'phrul dang / ngo mtshar dang / mi mthong bar byed pa dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lcags sgrog gcod pa dang /
ril bor dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang / rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do/ /lus dang ngag dang yid
gsum gyi dngos grub ster ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las thams cad ni/ 'grub par
'gyur ro zhes bya'o/ /oM bi shwa pad+me hUM/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'dis ni/ ngag gi dngos grub ster ro/ /tshig bshad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi
ngag rengs par byed do/ /rang nyid srung ba dang / gzhan yang srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan pa yang skal ba bzang po'i rang don dang gzhan
don byed do/ /ji ltar 'di ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can gyi don la spro zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba
dang / yi dwags dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed do/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid
kyis srung ngo zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to/ /sems brtan rtog pa med pa yi/ /blo
dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar/ /de ltar 'dir ni rab sbyar nas/ /de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang
'grub/ /ji ltar 'dod par gnas byed cing / /kun la longs spyod kun byed ltar/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i snying rje spyod/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis/ /'dug pa 'am
ni langs kyang rung / /'chag pa 'am ni gang dang de/ /rgod pa 'am ni brjod pa 'am/ /gang de ji ltar don bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am/ /sgrib pa kun
dang ldan pa yang / /rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag /bsod nams chung ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /thams cad mkhas
@#/ /pa nyid dang ni/ /thams cad rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang / /skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan
gyi/ /bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min/ /byang chub sems chen la brtson na/ /rnal 'byor dag ni de lta yin/ /khrag chen po dang ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar
dang bsres pa ni/ tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na/ /kun las mchog gyur bcud len no/ /sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /bcud kyis len ni sla ba ru/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i tshe bzang dang / nad med bde ba bzang po 'thob/ /grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang / gzungs dang sa dang de bzhin
'grub/ /bde ston thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /rang nyid so so rjes su 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du
'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas kun ni rab grub 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su
dag pa med na/ de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrub pa bshad de/ bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing smyung bar gnas pa'i lha bzos tshon sna ma 'dres par ras gsar ba de yang rang
rang gi kun tu khru re'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze 'bru'i dkyil du
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog dmar ba/ mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi gtso bo ni/ dmar ba ste/ 'dod
chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/ /g.yas pa nag pa ste/ zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/ /g.yon pa dkar ba ste/ gti mug nyid kyi phyir ro/ /phyag drug pa bya'o/ /g.yon
pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang / pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang / g.yon pa gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /
g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang / me tog gi mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bya'o//
shar gyi 'dab ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo/ /pad+ma dmar po dang / rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lha mo sgrol ma ljang gu rgya
skegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang / rin po che phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la b+hu ri Ni ser mo ut+pal sngon po dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs
@#/ /kyi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser po dang / ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /shar gyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos
can ma gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog can pad+ma dkar po dang
shal gyi phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+ma ston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkar ser gyi mdog pad+ma nag po dang / po ti phyag na bsnams
pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs rdo rje ma sna tshogs kyi mdog can du byas la sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /de ltar pad+ma la
bkod cing bris la sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams mtshams su'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba'i lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog
dang / dril bu rnams ni/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su'o/ /yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan
'das g.yas na skud pa dang / dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang / mchog spyin pa'i phyag rgya can/ g.yon na pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / zhags pa dang / thams
cad mkhyen pa'i dam tshig gi po ti bsnams pa'i phyag can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral ba'i cod pan la 'od dpag
med bzhengs pa'am/ /skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o/ /de'i g.yas phyogs kyi cha ru sgrub pa po mchod yon gyi snod dang / bdug spos kyi snod lag
pas gzung bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyis pa/ ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa sa la gnas shing zhabs
g.yas pa pad+ma'i steng gi gdan steng du bzhugs pa'o/ /phyag re re na phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos phreng ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni/
sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkar zhing dmar ba phyag bcu pa/ ri dwags seng+ge'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du skyil krung phyed
pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas na phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /seng+ge dang / glang po che dang / me dang / sbrul gyi 'jigs pa rnams las grol ba'i cha byad can no/ /g.yon na pad+ma
dmar po sdong bu gnyis pa steng du po ti can te/ rkun ma dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang / mtsho dang / thog chen po dang / sha zas za ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad
@#/ /can no/ /gnas de brgyad du sgrub po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sngon bzhin du langs pa'am/
'dug pa bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan yang cho ga ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs kyi gzugs 'chang ba/ dbu bcu gsum pa/
spyi bo'i mgo bo ni/ ljang gu'i rta zhal lo/ /yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal lo/ /phyag brgya ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ sna tshogs kyi mtshon cha
bsnams pa'o/ /yang na zhal brgya pa phyag stong pa yang bya'o/ /kha cig tu rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas pa'am bzhengs pa yang bya'o/ /tsam pa ka lta bu'i dkar
ser gyi bcom ldan 'das so/ /thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa po me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod dang / bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na
gzung bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan 'od dpag med pa'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni/ thang sku'i cho ga'o/ /thang sku'i mdun
du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pa de bzla zhing bsam gtan yang byas nas mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/ mchod yon snod dang / yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i zas
dang / sgron ma'i zas la byas nas mchod yon byin te sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na/ de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba po ni sngags 'di
nyid/ /kha cig la yang mi sbyin no/ /blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i/ /sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya/ /mchod rten las byed nyid la ni/ /blo ldan 'bad pas sbyin
par bya/ /rang nyid dang ni nor dag gis/ /bla ma la rtag gus par bya/ rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor la/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i yon yang dbul/ /gang dang gang ni gtang
dka' ba/ /mchog tu gyur pa 'dir ni bsngags/ /chung ma sring mo dang yang ni/ /bu mo dang ni tsha mo dag /bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya'o/ /glang chen rta dang shing rta dang / /
phyugs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang / /yul 'khor rgyal srid ldan pa dang / /rin chen sna tshogs dag kyang ni/ /gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon dbul/ /rdo rje slob dpon
dgyes gyur pa/ /thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzam+b+ha la dang / bod
kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu
@#/ /bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu
bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /deng bdag
ni| bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma
thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to/ /longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /lus rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /ngag rnam par
dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /sems rnam par dag pa yang 'thob bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /gzungs rgya mtsho
thams cad kyang 'thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad kyang mnyes par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag
tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /dpa'/ bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ /'bar ba'i sgron
ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ /rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin
kyang 'thob/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ /de la sogs pa'i ting
nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /des na bdag da ltar dran pa 'di lta bu
@#/ /dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing / mthong ba dang thos pa dang
bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa don mchis na/ bcom ldan
'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de yang yongs su dgod du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag pa/ de'i
dus la bab par shes na smros shig /de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi po 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas gzungs 'di smras so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kha ga me kha ga me/ tsak+Shu kha be/ shro tra kha be/ g+ha na kha be/ dzi dwa kha be/ ga la ya kha be/ ma na kha be/

sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha be/ shU na tra kha be/ a na mi ta kha be/ a pra Ni hi ta kha be/ sa mI d+ha kha be/ pA ra mi tA kha be/ bo d+hi kha be/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba bung+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha

ra/ d+ha ram a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ ka la ka la ka la/ saM g+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ na mo dwa na ba tI nAM/ bung+d+ha ko TI NAM/ a d+hiSh+Tha na du man/ tsa ta sra paR+Sha da A yur ba lan tsa da dan+du/ tad+ya thA/ su ra
b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra b+hi/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru
Ni kA ya/ sa mr-i dan+du man/ sa man+ta b+ha dra d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro
ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag ni/ gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni/ 'di lags
te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar
'gyur ro/ /phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yid la bgyis na/ thar par 'gyur ro/ /rims nad thams cad la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /rlung gis zin na/ mar
@#/ /dang | 'bru mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o/ /so na na/ so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o/ /rna ba na na/ ras bal gyi sa bon 'bru mar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod kyis rna
bar blug par bgyi'o/ /klad pa na ba la 'bru mar ro/ /lto na ba la byab par bgyi'o/ /gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te mgul du
gdags so/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis btab na/ 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas te gshis thams cad du byug go /nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o/ /
'di ni| sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o/ /ci ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis
'gro ba dang / mi snang bar bgyi ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs
kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bres te me tog sna tshogs kyis chal bar
bkang la/ tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / kun du ru'i bdug pas bdugs te mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te tshangs par spyod pa gtsang bas gos gtsang
ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa
ya| ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ti li ban+d+ha mi/ mi li ban+d+ha mi/ tsi mi li ban+d+ha mi/ sI mi ban+d+ha mi/ bdag gi mtshams las su yang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ chu la lan
nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o/ /
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi li li/ e hi b+ha ga wA na/
AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swA hA/ 'di ni/ bdag gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag dgug par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngos tshes brgyad nas bzung ste
nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyid do/ /de nas
@#/ /tshes bco lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag tu ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /'on tang nam gyi gung thun la 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/ lus las 'od zer bye ba stong
'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi zhing brtan par bgyis na/ mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs
dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrug pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang / nub
phyogs su 'od dpag med dang / byang phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rigs pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar
'gyur te/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
bstod do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha
ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwA rA ha ya gri
ba d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba satwe b+h+yaHsa nA ga ti ne/ na maHsar+b+ba satwe byaHsa na a sa ba ha

ri Ni| na maHsar+b+ba satwA b+ha yod+ta ra NA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba pra sha ma na na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsi ki ta sa na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maH
@#/ /sar+b+ba du| kha ra mo k+Sha Na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba an+d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba bid+ya rA dza ba sha pra bta ye/ ma hA yo gA yo gI shwa rA ya te s+yan
ma kr-i twA i daM AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu kho t+gI r+NaM r-i Shi bid dA de ba nA ga /yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ shAkya brah+ma/ lo ka pA la biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ nA ra ya Na/ skan+d+ha ku be ra/ a

su ren+d+ra/ ma tri ga Ni/ na maHkr-i taM badzra khu ra sa hi yaM/ ha ya gri ba brah+ma/ pra ra ma hr-i da ya/ ma brta yi Sh+ya mi/ a ba bra me yAr+ha sA d+ha kaM /a ba h+yaM/ sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAM/ sar+b+ba

bi g+h+naM bi nA ya kaM/ a mo g+haM/ sar+b+ba karma NaM/ bi shA nany+tsa/ bi nA ya kaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ta ru la ta ru la/ bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/ sar+b+ba biSha g+hA ta ka /sar+b+ba b+hu ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa
li ti| a na la/ bi spu ling+ga/ aT+Ta ha sa/ ke sa ra/ a to ba/ bra bi ta ka yaM badzra khu ra nirga ti ta/ tsa li ta bA su d+ha ta la/ badzro da shwa si ta/ ha si ta ma ru tok+Sha ti/ pra sha

ma na ka ra| ba da duSh+Ta bag+hI na/ saM b+hak+Sha Na ka ra/ swa bid+d+ho pa da sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya mi te/ b+ha ga wan ha ya gri ba/ sar+b+ba bid+yA hr-i da ya/

ma brta yi Sh+ya mi/ khA da khA da/ ma hA ro dre/ man+t+ra na/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ At+ma swa hi taM/ man+t+raM sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ sar+b+ba karma Shu me/ sid+d+he/ de hi de hi/ A be sha A be sha /pra be sha pra

be sha| sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sar+b+ba ba ro pa gra ma/ kr-i t+ya ka kho rdo/ dur laM g+hi ta/ mu shi kha/ bi sha ka ra/ bi sha

daMSh+T+ra bi sha tsur+Na yo a bi tsA ra bi shwa ka ra na/ sid+d+ha any+dza na/ tsak+Shu ra mo ha na/ tsita ta bak+She pa na ka ra/ ni t+ya/ ya ba ra pre k+Sha Na/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA r-i d+d+h+ya d+hi Sh+ThAM Ne

naHsar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsatwA nA rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+ha| a nu dz+nyA taM/ me karma/ shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya gri ba phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ badzra daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+ha ya

b+hai ra wa ya phaT/ pa ra man+t+raM sha ma ka rA ya phaT/ pa ra duSh+Ta big+h+nan/ baM b+ha k+Sha Na ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba gra hod sA da na ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba gra he Shu a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ pa Ta la

mu khA ya phaT/ yi ge tsi ta/ ma ma a hi te Shi na/ ka ye kra man+ti/ man+t+ra yan+ti/ a man+ti/ dza ba yan+ti/ dzu hwan+ti/ kA khordaM kurban+ti/ ta na sarba nA b+ha mu khe na ba kr-i tA ya phaT/ na maH

sar+b+ba duSh+Ta gra hod sA da nA ya/ ha ya gri bA ya/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa da swAhA/ oM a mr-i tot+b+ha bA ya hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM na ma ha yA ya swAhA/ oM na mo bi shwa mUrta ye swA hA/ na maH
sar+b+ba satwA nAM/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dA ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so// //rgya gar skad du/
@#/ /AR+ya' ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/ /bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ dzam+bu nA da'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ rin po che sna
tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am
ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom
ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod cing bkur stir byas te yongs su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog
mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
yongs su gsal ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas/ /khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes/ /srid par sbyor ba yongs
su zad/ /yang dag bka' la rnam grol sems/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol/ /klu chen po na cing shes po/ /sems la dbang ba sgyur thams cad kyi/ /mchog
tu pha rol phyin pa thob/ /ye shes tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs/ /srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu brgal/ gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson/ /thugs rje dang ni 'brel
ba'i thugs/ /skye rgu kun la mchog tu byams/ /bde bar brtson pa byams las byung / /mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas/ /bde bar gshegs pa nyid las
skyes| |bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'/ /khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/ /dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs/ /
rig pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin/ /mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes/ /n+ya gro d+ha ni lta bur zlum/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang
@#/ /ldan| |dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang / /sku ni rnam pa kun tu brgyan/ /sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /sku tshad che la dkar sham po/ /nA ga ge sar
gzhon nu ltar/ /cung zad dmar ba 'dra ba'i mdog /dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /thor tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs/ /dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/ /'od
zer dag ni rnam par 'phro/ /'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar/ /gser gyi ri 'dra grags pas khyab/ /gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che/ /shar gyi ri la 'char ba yi/ /nyi ma'i
gtsug tor dag dang ldan/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yi/ /se ral khas ni sku phyed brgyan/ /sa dag la ni rab tu mkhas/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod/ /tshul khrims ma nyams ral
pa med| |thong ga seng+ge mchong ba 'dra/ /sku ni 'jam zhing ldem bag can/ /gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra/ g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung yang 'dra/ /dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra//
dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che/ /smin mtshams bar yang yong ma chad/ /spyan ni nor bu rin chen 'bar/ /shangs kyi dbyibs ni cung zad mtho/ /tshems kyi sgros kyis rnam par
gnon| |ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing / /snyan gyi khrung yang rab tu zab/ /mgur kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra/ /dpung pa dag kyang rab tu
zlum| |phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang ring / /sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar/ /phyag sor rnams kyi bar 'brel ba/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnams la/ /'khor
lo dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes/ /sku mdangs 'jam zhing shangs kyang rgyas/ /gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar snyan/ /yid du 'ong zhing
dga' bar 'gyur/ /blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba/ /pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra/ /pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes/ /pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs/ /phyag
na pad+ma bzang po bsnams/ /ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams/ /khri snyan sa le'i pags pa mnabs/ /dbyug pa dang ni bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /bkra shis dag gis
gtsang mar gyur/ /snga nas gsungs shing gsong por gsungs/ /bdud rtsi'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /sems can thams cad
dga' bar mdzad/ /bzang po snang ba'i ljon shing ltar/ /sems can kun gyi gsos su gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa lags/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i cha
lugs mnga'/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin/ /ba spu nyag ma re re yang / /sems can rnams kyi gtso bor gyur/ /bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad/ /bshol ba med/
@#/ /cing nges par mdzad/ /rab tu drag pa'i brtson 'grus can/ /'khor ba dag las rab tu brgal/ /dam chos rgyal mtshan mnga' gsol ba/ /yid bzhin 'khor lo dge
ba sbyor/ /don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren/ /ha ya gri ba bdud bzhi 'joms/ /gro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel/ /chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las sgrol/ /lha mo sgrol ma rjes su
'brang / /khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed/ /rgyal ba can ni tshul dang ldan/ /mthu chen ldan zhing dran dang ldan/ /yon tan ldan zhing byams dang ldan/ /shes rab ldan
zhing dpal dang ldan/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan/ /don rnams kun ni rig pa po/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/ /chos rnams thams cad smra ba'o/ /'jig
rten rnams kyi ston pa po/ /zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan/ /gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas/ /'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag /tshangs
pa la sogs phyag bgyis pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
gang zhig bstod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags
thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong gi bar du yang ngan 'gror mi skye'o/ /mnar med par mi 'gro'o/ /su zhig nang par langs nas klog gam/ klog
tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du 'don na/ mi de'i lus la mdze dang / shu ba dang / glo na ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las thar bar
'gyur ro/ /skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur
ro| |gar skyes kyang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/ yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/ /sems
dpa' bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /bstod pa 'dis bstod na/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa yang de dang 'dra bas na bye brag med do//
rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dzaM b+ha la dzA len+d+ra ka ru Ni ka s+ya shaM ka ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje
can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i
grong khyer gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang po'i bu'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi
sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum sems par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rtag tu de'i rjes su 'brang bar
bgyid| bdag dpag tshad brgyar yang gnod sbyin rnams las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /'dod pa dang
ldan pa'i kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs pa 'di lta ste/ zas dang / skom dang / bca' ba dang / bza' ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser stsal

bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ hi li hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru

tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ oM e h+ye hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha me sA d+ha ya swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ pU ta ne pU ta ne/ su ru
me| sum te/ su ban+te su pU Sh+ye/ hi li mi li swA hA/ cho ga ni/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas la a ga ru bsregs nas bzlas
brjod byas na/ de'i 'og tu gser thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ru tsi ra ang+ga yaSh+Thi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi te a saM khe ya/ sUR+ya sha ta sa ha sra a ti re ka te dza/ pra b+hA a ba b+ha si ta murta ye/
ma hA ma Ni mu ku tra kuN+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+ha ri Ne b+ha ga bA te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a ba ya sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha khu kha sa ma bA sha a biSh+Tha/ sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA
@#/ /ya| tad+ya thA/ oM b+hur+b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA a lo ka ka ra Na ta ma sti mi ra pa ta la bi nA sha ka /rA ga dwe Sha ma hA mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka /sha sa ka rak+Sha
ka /sarba a pa ya durga ti pra sha ma ka /sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka /sarba ta thA ga tA saM b+ha na ka ra/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ ba ra ba ra da
ya kA/ pad+ma a lo ka saM b+ha ta/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka /dzA TA mu ku TA/ a laM kr-i te shi ra/ ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/ sha ta badzre bai DUR+ya a laM kr-i ta shA rI ra/ a mi tA dzi na ka
ma la ya a laM kr-i ta/ pra b+ha ra Na rA dzA na sha ta sa ha sra A b+hi la Shi ti kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yAM tra kle sha ka
ba TA a ba bad+d+ha bi bo d+hi satwa saM sa ra tsa ra ka pra ma thA na/ pu ru Sha pad+ma/ pu ru Sha nA ga /pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bi ha/ bi ra bi ra dza/ su dan+ta pa ri bri ta/ d+ha
ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya pra shA sa ya/ pra d+ha na sa ya pra d+ha na sa ya/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ bi bi ri bi bi ri/
tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu yam/ muM tsa muM tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA ya/ gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/
pra ha sa pra ha sa/ nA nA bi bi d+ha kle sha pa sa nA/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ d+hu ru Ti d+hu ru Ti/ ma hA maN+Da a la kA ra Na/ sha ta pra se ka /a ba b+hi si tA ma hA bi Sha sha ma
ka| ma hA bo d+hi satwa pa ra da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dam pa/
rdo rje chen pos bgegs par gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / mi'am ci dang / lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ re ba thams cad phun
sum tshogs par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chen po mang pos bsgribs pa gang la la zhig nyan tam/ 'chang ngam/ 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas legs par
rtogs par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nang par langs nas lan gcig bton na/ lag na pad+ma phyi
bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gcig pu rab tu dben par 'dug ste sangs rgyas
yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma rjes su dran par byas la lan bdun brjod na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /
@#/ /sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /yud tsam zhig 'chag cing 'dug
la yid la brjod na/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod
nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs su yang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo khyad par du 'phags pas
bkur bar 'gyur ro/ /me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa bkang ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na/ yon tan chen
po stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba yang de la skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi gdong du
bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / chos snang
ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems
mnyam par bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams
cad zad par byed par 'dod na/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la smyung ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs
kyi spyan sngar tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang / bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos kyis bsti stang byas te/ de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des
sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa byed pa yang sdig pa byang zhing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / shin
tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi
stobs dang / dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / ye shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do/ /gnam la gyen
@#/ /du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo/ /sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro//
chu dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na/ chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad la lag pas bya ba cing bzlas brjod byas na/ sos
par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na/ dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bkres pa dang / skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod
byas na/ tshim par 'gyur ro/ /mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags na/ dpag tshad tshun chad mtshams gcad pa dang / srung
ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA warma dang /
zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ siM ha nA da tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ seng+ge
sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i
dbang phyug tu bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bsod
nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / lam rnams ji ltar sbyang / e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i mchog spyan ras gzigs seng+ge sgra zhes bya ba
yod de| des smon lam sbyang ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par yid la byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dbang phyug
langs te gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/
oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te/ ka ro kaM Te/ bI R+ye swA hA/ oM AHhrIHsiM ha nA da hUM/ bruM aM dzrIM khaM hUM/ oM AHhUM/ oM ba li na b+hu dz+nyA dzI ba puSh+pe d+hu pe
hUM/ sarba a mr-i te hUM/ oM ba ta li/ ma hA ba ta li/ hUM hUM hUM dzaHswA hA/ oM bak+Sha bak+Sha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dza hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a ta pra te hUM phaT/ sri ti ka ra hUM phaT/ oM
ba ru Na A gats+tsha ya/ A gats+tsha ya/ ma hA nA ga ki sa ti sarbe b+huraHphuHphuHphuHswA hA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti shru ti smr-i ti sa ma ba ti/ sa ra ma ti sid+d+haM swAhA/ oM AHhrIHhUM swAhA/
@#/ /phuHhr-IHoM siM ha nA da phuM phaT phaT/ nA ga du pa la mA ra ya phaT/ dz+wA la dz+wA la hUM phaT/ oM a big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM/ oM ag+na ye a ti bya/ b+hi sa
ma ya bi sha/ ma hA kr-i ye ha bya/ ka bya ma hA ni ya swA hA/ oM b+ha ba ga ag+na ye/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ AHhrIHsiM ha nA da badzra tsa kra brti lo ki ka bruM bruM bruM/ lo kot+ta ra
Ni siM ha nA da bruM bruM bruM hUM ni hUM ni/ siM ha nA da bruM bruM bruM hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ 'di ni/ maN+Dal gyi sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /gsad pa dang / phyir ldog
pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba'i las yin te/ nang par ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal byas te mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du
mnyes pas klu'i zhe sdang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ seng+ge'i steng du zla ba la/ /rgyal po rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /g.yas
na thod mtshan rtse gsum la/ /drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdus/ /pad+ma'i rtse la thod pa ni/ /'phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da/ /shes rab sbyor ba'i ral
grir bcas/ /dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la/ /rigs lngas rnam par brgyan pa po/ /gsum dang lnga ni mdun du 'phyang / /rtse mor 'od dpag med pas brgyan//
seng+ge'i sgra las byung ba yin/ /'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis/ /pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan/ /rang lus 'og nas thal mo sbyor/ /sku la 'dud cing 'phrin
las byed/ /rdo rje'i gdan la mi bskyod pa'i/ /thugs ka nas ni sngags 'od 'don/ /spro ba gsum du ldan pa'i sngags/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya'o/ /gsang
ba'i bdag po/ /rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smod pa yin no/ /gsang ba'i bdag po/ rgyud
'di nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tha na 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
lha dang / tshangs pa'i bu dang / tshangs chen rnams kyis srung ba dang / /bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / kun tu rjes su 'brang bar byed de/ de bas ches lhag pa'i
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu la mas srung ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyis bar du gcod par mi nus so/ /gang shi
'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can du pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'dir me dang chu'i 'jigs pa las thar
@#/ /bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir ni/ mdo tsam smos su zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par
'gyur ro/ /gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang / klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung
bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga' nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar
byas so/ /de nas gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir bdag sa dkar po la lan du mar bsngags na/ bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /seng+ge sgra'i rgyud ces
bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta pra dz+nyA ka ra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te
gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya siM ha nA da nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug seng+ge sgra'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo Ta la'i rtse mo na rin po che'i khang bzang rin po che dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dpag med
kyis spras pa/ 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor zhing / bcom ldan 'das
seng+ge'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa
de rang gi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yul ma ga d+ha na rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang /
btsun mo dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa las/ rgyal po de mdze dang / phol mig dang / dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste/ de
@#/ /ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal/
sngon 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyed nyid byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po zhes bya ba yin la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug seng+ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du sems
can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng+ge dkar po gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/ sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan/ mdung rtse gsum
pa dang / ral gri dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la thogs nas phyin pa la rgya mtsho chen po la rgal ba'i dus su seng+ge bzhag nas 'khur res byas shing byon pa
la| byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po khyod nyid ni/ grogs la phan pa'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang bkum mo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
snying rje mchog gi bsam pa la steng 'og bar snang gi klu dang / lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs
