@#/ /bcas pa bris te dbus su hUM swA mA ra ya hA phaT ces bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma la hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT
hUM/ phaT hUM phaT/ hUM phaT hUM/ phaT hUM phaT zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe phyi ma la hUM oM phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hUM re phaT/ hUM tuta phaT/ hUM tA phaT/ hUM re phaT/ hUM tu phaT/ hUM re phaT
zhes bya ba bris te rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste
sum cu pa'o// //myos pa'i 'khor lo ni/ d+ha du ra'i chus ras sam/ sho gu la ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo bris te dbus su

ha ha de ba t+ta ta ha zhes pa bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma la h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha bri bar bya'o/ /phyi ma brgyad la ni/ h+ha oM h+ha/ h+ha tA h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/ h+ha tuta h+ha/ h+ha tA h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/ h+ha tu
h+ha| h+ha re h+ha zhes bya ba bris te rtsi'i ga'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas kyang myur bar byas te lam rgya gram du dong dang bcas par sbas te d+ha du ra spungs na/ myos par
'gyur ro/ /gso na/ mar sbrang rtsi ba'i 'o mas ling ga bkrus na/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /myos byed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de
nas mnan pa'i 'khor lo ni/ g.yam pa la ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te yung ba'i chus ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ga swa staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya g+ha ha zhes bya ba bri bar
bya'o| |ling tshe brgyad la ga oM ga /ga tA ga/ ga re ga /ga tuta ga /ga tA ga /ga re ga /ga tu ga /ga re ga zhes bya ba bris te 'khor lo kha sbyar nas lam rgya gram du sbas na/
'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas mnan pa chen po ni/ yung ba'i khu bas snag tsha byas
te kham pa'i ga'u'i nang du phyi nang ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris la sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su rga swa staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya rga ha zhes bya ba bri'o/ /nang ma la ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

ha zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o/ /de'i phyi rol gyi ling tshe brgyad la ni/ rga oM rga/ rga tA rga/ rga re rga/ rga tuta rga/ rga tA rga/ rga re rga/ rga tu rga/ rga re rga zhes bya ba bris te sgrub pa 'phags
ma la byas la dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs su sbas na/ srung bar 'gyur zhing dgra'i sgor sba na/ mnan par 'gyur ro/ /dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'o// //de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni/ yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa'am/ lhang tsher ma gnyis gang yang rung
@#/ /ba la 'khor lo bris te ling tshe dgu pa la phyi nang dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su wa swa staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya ha/ 'khor
lo nang ma la wa wa wa wa wa wa wa wa zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o/ /phyi ma la wa oM wa/ wa tA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tuta wa/ wa tA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tu wa/ wa re wa zhes bya
ba bris te phan tshun g.yas pa g.yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na/ mnan par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus me tog man+dA ra ba dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la gtor
ro| |lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma yang sgrags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te/ /lha yi 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ /srog chags dag ni bsad pa spang / /ma byin pa dag mi
blang zhing / /bud med mi bsten smad mi bya/ /brdzun ni rnam pa kun tu spang / /myos 'gyur dag dang sha dag dang / /rku zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang / /mi rnams thams cad kun
la ni| |chags pa'i sems kun spang pa ste/ /ma bzhin du ni kun la ni/ /phan pa'i sems kyis kun la bkur/ /dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yi/ /las rnams kun la mthu
yod 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po
brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang /
lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rjes su yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol
ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos
bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tA ra b+ha T+TA ri ka nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM /bod skad du/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rje
btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan yid 'ong po Ta la/ /sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs ljon pas bkram pa ste/
@#/ /skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa/ /'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che/ /ri dwags sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste/ /me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis/ /kun tu dri
yis bkang ba ste/ /sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/ /rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra/ /mi'am ci yis glu snyan len/ /glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs/ /rig 'dzin grub
pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/ /thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang / /sa bcu'i dbang
phyug rnams dang ni/ /'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis/ /rtag tu legs par sten pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i tshogs
gzhan dang / /rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/ /bzhugs te de phyir dpal dang
ldan| |pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan/ /dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje ldan/ /lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/ /chos gsung po ni yang dag
bzhugs/ /de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas/ /spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste/ /rkun po sbrul dang seng+ge
me| |glang po stag dang chus 'jigs pa/ /zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/ /
chags sdang gti mug dri ma las/ /gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/ /de gsungs bdag la thub chen po/ /de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten mgon
pos 'di skad gsungs/ /dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/ /phyag na rdo rjer rab rtogs byed/ /snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs/ /nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang
po| |skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/ /smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste/ /nga yis 'jig rten ma rung shes/ /snying rje che dang ldan pa yis/ /'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo/ /
nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ /zla ba nya 'dra byed kyi 'od/ /lhar bcas mi dang lha min rnams/ /'di rnams thams cad gsal bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/ /
gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/ /phyag na ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/ /bar snang du ni 'bar bar gnas/ /'gro ba yang dag gzung don
du| |mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba dang / /'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag bskyed de/ /ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis kyang / /sems can thams
@#/ /cad bdag gis srung / /sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/ /des na bdag la 'jig rten du//
rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/ /gus dang bcas pas yang dag gnas/ /gang zhig
rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pa/ /gsungs shig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba/ /sdig pa
spong byed bsod nams dang / /bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed/ / /gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid/ /nad rnams thams cad brlag par byed/ /dpal dang
shis pa 'jog par byed/ /nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed/ /sems can rnams la byams bsgoms la/ /de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po/ /de skad zhus nas bcom
ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rab gzigs nas/ /'di lta bu yi byams pa spros/ /phyag ni g.yas pas phyag
thabs mdzad/ /bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /de gsungs shes rab shin tu che/ /legs so legs so dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la gcig tu brtse//
skal pa chen po'i mi rnams nyon/ /mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrog pa/ /nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad yang dag grol/ /dbang phyug kun dang
yang dag ldan/ /dus min 'chi ba nges par 'joms/ /'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba/ /de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/ /lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/ /'di la rjes
su yi rang gis/ /legs par bsngams par 'gyur la bstod/ /oM/ /dge ba can ni gzi brjid che/ /'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/ /dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma/ /shes
rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/ /gso byed ma dang rgyas byed ma/ swA hA/ oM gyi rnam par 'dod gzugs ma/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /g.yul las sgrol
byed rgyal ba mo/ /lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ /'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/ /rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa po/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma/ /zla ba'i gdong can dkar
mo che/ /mi pham gos ni ser mo can/ /sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che/ /stobs po che la pha rol phyin/ /rtsub mo chen mo gtum chen mo/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis brlag byed ma/ /
rab tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/ /glog gi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/ /'chol byed rengs
@#/ /byed nag mo che/ /mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/ /srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/ /mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lding / /tshangs pa mo dang rig
byed ma| |gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas/ /bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo/ /skyes gnas rig byed yid mgyogs ma/ /thod pa can ni shugs chen mo/ /tshangs ma bden
ma gzhan mi rgyal/ /ded dpon chen mo snying rje gnas/ /chud zos pa la lam rab ston/ /mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo/ /bud med gzugs la dpag med gnon/ /
ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma /grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma/ /des ma nor ma bsod nams ma/ /skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma/ /mthar byed skrag byed
'jigs byed ma/ /drag dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma/ /'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson/ /skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma/ /ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/ /rtag
par kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/ /don kun sgrub byed bzang po ma/ /gsad byed gso byed nor ster ma/ /mi 'jigs bsod nams go ta ma/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang
bdag nyid skyes/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /phan par byed par grags pa ste/ /mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba'o/ /lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba/ /skal
bzang bskal pa dang ldan byed/ /dug ni thams cad nyams byed pa/ /nad ni thams cad zhi byed ma/ /sems can kun la bde ster ma/ /blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog /
mnyam bzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis/ /des ni dus mi ring ba ru/ /rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sdug pa'ang bde bar 'gyur/ /bkren pa phyug por 'gyur
ba'o/ /rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid gzhungs 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur/ /tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /
dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba ste/ /rwa can dang ni mche ba can/ /dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' dang / /sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las/ /mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis//
'jigs pa kun las sgrol bar byed/ /dus min 'chi la sgrol bar byed/ /skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed/ /mir ni skye ba don dang bcas/ /de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis/ /gang zhig 'dir ni sngar langs
nas| |skyes bu gang zhig sgrog byed pa/ /de yi dus ring tshe dang ldan/ /mi ni dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za dang ni lus srul po/ /'byung po
gshed byed srin po dang / /ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa/ /gnod sbyin mo dang yi dwags byed/ /smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams/ /grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang / /sha za
@#/ /la sogs pa rnams dang / /ro langs la sogs sna tshogs rnams/ /skul byed gzhan sems sdang ba rnams/ /grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur//
ji ltar slar ni mchod par 'gyur/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar 'gyur/ /nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur/ /phyug cing longs spyod yon tan ldan/ /bu dang tsha
bo 'phel bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur/ /gzi brjid dang ldan zhing tshig gsal ba/ /bstan bcos thams cad rig
par 'gyur/ /dge bshes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten/ /byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang / /gang dang gang du skyes pa der/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong / /
dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM /bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs
kyi do shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi ga shal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma
mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/ oM tre lo kya bi dza ya/ a tsi t+ta dza ya/ a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/ su dza ya/ bi dza ya/ ma hA dza ya/ bi dza ya/ dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma ra/

ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da/ ma hA de bi/ bi la sa/ be la sa/ bi la sa/ ba dza a mo ta ka ri bi dza ya de bi hI hI/ ki ni ki ni bi laM ba se/ sma ra sma ra/ ma hA pra dz+nyA a ni ba ta/ badzra ma hA kA ru Ni

kA| b+ha gi ni hrUM hrUM/ spu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na/ bi d+hu na/ kam+pa/ kam+pa/ kam+pa ya/ su ra bi gan+d+ha/ ti si ta/ mu khe ha la da ba la/ saM
ga rA dzA na bi ma bi gi /bi na sha ya bi nA sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san+t+ra sa ya/ bi ga nA na/ pa ri ba lA ya/ asma kaM asma kaM /mA da ni mA da ni/ sam bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ ha ra ha ra/

hi ri hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ra ka ba ra dza/ haM haM/ tro tA ya haM haM/ san+t+ri tA ya/ san+t+ro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ marda marda/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra saM tsa ra/ be ga be ga be ga ba ti/ na mo na mo na maH
swA hA/ de nas lha dang lha min tshogs/ /srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am/ ci/ /lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / /'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams/ /'jig rten gsum du
grags pa'i mchog /gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas/ /skrag cing mgo bo smad gyur te/ /lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas/ /gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di/ /
@#/ /mtha' dag khyab par bya ba'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i lha yi ngag bzlog pa/ /sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs
smras pa/ /che ba nyid kyis grags pa'o/ /spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams/ /phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags/ /de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa/ /lha dang lha
min 'dus kun dang / /rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang / /de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te/ /bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang /
pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du/ /btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yis/ /
dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi/ /bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba/ /skye rgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes myur/ /dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag /rgod bag med cing
dregs pa med/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang pad+ma'i zhal/ /pad+ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin/ /spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste/ /sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od/ /skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba
sbyin| |de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa/ /mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste/ /dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma/ /sgros dmar so ni dmar ba ste/ /spyan rtsa dmar
pos gzigs par mdzad/ /dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad+ma lags/ /pad+ma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste/ /'jigs pa'i cha lugs
stobs mo che/ /'dul du 'jug ma 'dul mdzad ma/ /bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags/ /rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba/ /byang chub rdul
med dri ma med/ /zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rje/ /sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar/ /rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes/ /chu lha g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can/ /skyes mchog rang
bzhin yid 'phros rgyas/ /gtsug phud gsum po lto tshil gsum/ /spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel pa/ /srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba/ /tshig ldan ma yang de bzhin grags/ /
rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin/ /sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med/ /nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma/ /gzugs bzang phyal bzang nu ma bzang / /sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul
ldan zhing 'dul/ /dul ba srung ba rdul sel ba/ /phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma/ /rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma/ /drag mo lags te gzi skyed ma/ /dkar mo zhi mdzad
bde ba mo/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan/ /tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags/ /zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal/ /zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad/ /nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog
@#/ /dgyes pa mo/ /yid 'ong bzang zhing zhi ba mo/ /bde ba bde ldan mu dang stegs/ /bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/ /nor sbel bsod nams
rnam par rgyal/ /dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser dngul 'od/ /'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin/ /sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal/ /sems can kun la med mi 'gyur/ /mchod
gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma/ /cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang / /rgyan dmar rgyan du thogs pa ste/ /na bza' gser mnabs gang+gA ma/ /dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par
gzigs/ /gi'u wang gi thig le spos/ /'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid/ /dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma/ /tshems dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum/ /
dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor thogs/ /do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can/ /'od dpag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma/ /grog ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs/ /nor bu'i cod pan nor bu
'chang / /nor bu'i rgyan rnams rgyan du thogs/ /nor bu'i 'od zer snang ba can/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/ /'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can/ /skyes pa bud
med sad par mdzad/ /zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can/ /tshangs pa'i zhugs can rlung dang ldan/ /bud med lags te mkha' las gshegs/ /lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phro
ma| |'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul/ /'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma/ /drag po thor tshugs gtsug phud can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal/ /ping+ka'i skad
'dra pheg bzang ma/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes/ /dbyig pa'i shing la rdo rje thogs/ /drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan/ /gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo/ /
gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug /rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma/ /stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad/ /stobs dang stobs mang mnga' ba ste/ /shes rab mtshon gyis
gcod par mdzad/ /sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan/ /de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags/ /steng nas khyams dang khyams bzang tshul/ /tsam pa ka yi chun pos gsal/ /ser mo
can pa legs pa'i rten/ /drag mo phyag na chun po thogs/ /skal pa bzang mo gshal ka can/ /de bzhin shin tu shas cher dgyes/ /rigs mtshan shin tu stobs dang ldan/ /
rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma/ /bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thogs/ /blo mdzad shes rab skyed par mdzad/ /lha mo la me cod pan can/ /lha rnams kun la tshul lhag ma/ /sred med bu
mo sdig pa sel/ /bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes/ /rab tu dga' ba grogs na dga'/ /spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan/ /dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste/ /chos rnams
@#/ /kun gyi legs pa'i rten/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma/ /nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing / /'dod
pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma/ /shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas pa/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa/ /stobs rnams bcu pos cher
gsal ma/ /rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje phra mo lha min sel/ /dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bde ba dpal/ /rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang / /sgeg mo
rdo rje phyag na bsnams/ /yid 'ong yid la tshim par mdzad/ /pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad pa/ /tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste/ /rol cing gar thabs ston par
mdzad| |chos can ha la ha la'i 'od/ /chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang / /bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste/ /rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che/ /
lha mo chen mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod/ /kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni/ /smra ba rnams kyi
mchog lags gsungs/ /de nas zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi/ /lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can/ /'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa/ /dbang phyug
chen po la sogs kun/ /nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/ /thams cad rtag tu mthun par ni/ /stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang / /dus
kun du ni srung bar gyis/ /zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing / /'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ /rgal dga' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis/
mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la/ /dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis/ /de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi/ /phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i zhal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra/ /
'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchog /mun pa sel bar byed pa dang / /mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed pa/ /
tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dag par byas pa ma yin pas/ /shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas
brtson byas pa'i/ /brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la/ /dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing / /
sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa/ /sems can thams cad rab 'byed pa'i/ /gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/ /su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /nyan tam 'chang
@#/ /ngam klog byed na/ /rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing / /sems
can kun las lhag pa'i mchog /'jig rten dag tu chos shes la/ /'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/ /su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /'don cing sgrol
ma zla ba'i zhal/ /de bzhin bstod byed de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/ /de yi don kyang 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi/ /gzhan
yang sems can bgrang ba gang / /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di/ /'jig rten dag na rgyags pa
dang / /nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o/ /de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i ri bo 'khrug byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba/ /'od
gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po/ /rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyad par stobs kyis bsten pa yis/ /gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod
la| |don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang / /rab des chos de dang ni sdud byed dang / /de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas/ /bzod med nyon mongs
sel ba dang / /zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig /rgyal ba mchog gis bka' stsal nas/ /gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs/ /de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtser gyur dga'
bar byed cing yid 'phrog la/ /dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas/ /lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' ba rgyas shing rmad byung
nas| |rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //
rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra Ni bid+yA rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / mi 'bum phrag du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs te yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig
@#/ /rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces
bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang / 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis
'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba
dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems
dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me
tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar
bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des
bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i
mchog des bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la
reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/ /'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo / /'di na mi'am/ mi ma lags pa'am/ 'byung po'am/ sha za'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/
grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi sde dpon nam/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po'am/ cho ma rkun nam/ sbrul lam/ srin bu'am/ srin bu lu ta'am/ sbrang bu lcags phye'am/ nye ba'i
nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag la 'tshe bar bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes gsung ngo / /sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs
dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba
@#/ /dang | mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang bskur te/ 'di lta ste/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ga te/ huk+ku/
muk+ku/ saM ma te/ ma hA saM ma te/ ma hA dz+wa la/ dz+wa ba la me/ sa he sa he/ ma hA dz+wa le/ uk+ke/ muk+ke/ sha me/ saM ma he/ ma hA saM ma te/ ma hA sha me swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs
shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag
la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang
dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu
rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang /
bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs
dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o//
@#/ /'di lta ste/ at+te/ bat+te/ nat+te/ kunat+te/ pu ka se/ ku pu ka se/ ka se/ a na ka se/ nA ma ka se/ a nu ta/ pra nu ta/ kha dze/ ma hA kha dze/ sad pa phe/ ta Da phe/
tu Da phe/ hi li mi li/ ti le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi
'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/
sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di
dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa
dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rabs
dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad
dang rjes su mthun par bgyi'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi
gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag las yang 'da' bar byed pa ni/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang
ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung
ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ ag+khe/ bag+khe/ na dzi te/ nA ga sa re/ na hI le/ dza hi
le| dza hi la ba te/ tsa DI la ba te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags
@#/ /kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs
rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa
yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang
ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tsha rabs bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la
yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga'
bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag thams cad las 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ngas
kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon
tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi
'di rnams bshad do/ /'di lta ste/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ Ta ke/ e Da ke /ta ta be/ tu Da be/ ra Ta ke/ le le/ hu le/ hi li/ mi le/ ti le/ shI le/ shI la/ a D+he/ ba D+he/
na D+he/ ku na D+he/ a Da be ti/ pa Na ba tI/ ka se ka se ka se/ pha se pha se pha se/ ma hA pha se pha se swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag
la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka' bo/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi
gsang sngags 'di dag ston pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /
@#/ /len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu bzhir tshe
rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par
'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag thams cad las 'khus pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags
kyi gzhi 'di dag shing skam po gsher bag med pa la srung ba byas te yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur
ba byas na/ shing de la lcug gu dang / lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ me tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur na/ mir gyur pa lta ci smos/ na maH
sarba bud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+d+h+yan+tu d+hA ra Ni/ man+ta pA da ni swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sems can rnams kyi don
dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang /
stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par
bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ at+te/ mat+te/ pa ke /pA ra ke/ be ke Da/ dra ma ti/ ta re ma ti/ Tu Da ma Ti/ Tu Da ma Ti/ Tu Da ma Ti/ Tu Da Tu re/ su re/ hi le/ mu le/ ti le swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /
kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed
par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni/ tshe rabs
@#/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang /
'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig la srung ba byas na/ de la yang 'byung bo thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshigs so/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / srin
bu lu ta dang / sbrang bu lcags phye thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /rims rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / dus tshigs 'gyur ba las byung ba thams
cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa'am/ zhag gsum pa'am/ zhag bzhi pa'am/ zhag bdun pa'am/ zla ba phyed pa'am/ zla ba gcig pa'am/
lo gcig pa'am/ nad rgyun ring ngam/ skad cig pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /'bras sam/ phol mig gam/ rkang shu'am/ lhog pa'am/ me dpal lam/ shu ba'am/ khyi
rdo'am/ g.yan pa'am/ mdze thams cad dam/ lhog pa thams cad dam/ gshed byed thams cad dam/ sgyur ba'i las thams cad dam/ byang thams cad dang / ro langs
thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /kun dga' bo/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi
gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug
na yang yid la bya'o/ /chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /srin po'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /
'brog dgon pa'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /klung dang bgrod dka' ba na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /me'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /chu'i nang na 'dug na yang
yid la bya'o/ /de yid la byas pa de rnams la 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /des dug zos pa thams cad kyang kha zas nyid du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /yi dwags thams cad dang / srul po thams cad dang / gshed byed thams cad dang /
sgyur ba'i las thams cad dang / byad thams cad dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/ kun dga' bo/ mdor na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad kyis
@#/ /mi tshugs so/ /kun dga' bo/ gsad pa'i rigs pa ni/ chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni/ brdegs pas/
brdeg pa'i rigs pa ni/ brgyad pas/ brgyad pa'i rigs pa ni/ bsdigs pas/ bsdigs pa'i rigs pa ni/ mig tshugs su bltas pas thar bar 'gyur ro/ /kun
dga' bo/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang la srung ba byas pa'am/ yongs su bskyab pa'am/ yongs su gzung bas bcings pa'am/ zhi ba dang /
bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas med de/ lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang /
bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na yang ngas ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/
gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes
la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par
bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud thams cad tshar gcod pa'i slad du gzungs
kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la legs so zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur bas gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi
gsung bar gyur bas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de ni/ 'di lta ste/ da na D+De/ da na D+De/ ma hA na D+De/ dzaM b+ha ne/ staM b+ha ni/ Ta Te Ta Ta ni/ ma hA Ta Ta ni/ kuT+Te/
kuT+Ta ni/ ma hA kuT+Ta ne/ d+har+m+ma le/ tsarma le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di dag ni/ gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur dga' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / bzlas te bton nas 'chang ba de ni/ sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams
cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /de la ni/ dam pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar mi
@#/ /'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag /khyed bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya
pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis
de dag rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /longs shig /chongs shig /
lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis bzung
lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di/
sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa ste/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'dzin tam
yang na klog byed pa/ /tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod de la ni/ /mi min gang yang rung ba dang / /gnod sbyin grul
bum srin po dag /nam yang bar 'chad mi byed do/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod de la ni/ /'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa/ /sdig can bdud de nam du yang / /bar chad
byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi/ /pha ma dang ni phu nu dang / /sring mo mdza' bshes gnyen dag kyang / /log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir
gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'jigs med gang gis thos gyur nas/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed pa des/ /nam yang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /gzungs sngags 'di
'dzin byed de yi/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ /sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang / /
bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed pa des/ /zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis gnon/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba po/ /rgyal po chen po
bzhi po dag /lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung / /mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang / /gzungs
sngags 'di ni rjod phyed pa/ /de la rtag tu srung bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po
@#/ /de dag dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po
chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba du Sh+Tan pra du Sh+Tan ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/
mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha ni tA re swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tA
rA swa pra tI dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ /'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sgrol
ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tA re yai/ hUM hUM hUM/ sa ma ya s+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ a

sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ te lokya pa ra de/ sarba de ba da na pa/ pU dzin te smra rA hI/ b+ha ga wa ti tA re/ sma rA hi/ b+ha ga ban+ta/ ta thA ga tA s+ya/ pu ra taH/ sam yaM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA sa twa
a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka/ bi tsi tra b+ha ra Ne/ oM bi lo kI ya/ che ge mo b+ha ga wa te/ tA re/ hrIM hrIM hrIM phaT swAhA/ gzungs ngas 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs
pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la
'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzla bar bya'o/ /gang 'dod pa de sbyin no/ /mchog thams cad ster ro/ /ma
byin na/ bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so/ /gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus pa 'phags ma
sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /AR+ya a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po
@#/ /la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bo Ta la ka'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan med pa dang / a ti muk+ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong
pos yang dag par brgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag bco brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po
dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la des thal mo sbyar zhing
phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba
yod de/ gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang
ma'i ris gyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po yang 'dus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya
stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das/ sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i tshe sa
phyogs de dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa'i don du gnas
par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sa'i phyogs gcig po de mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag don
yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang
@#/ /'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das/ sdig pa'i
skyon byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de/ gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad
gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na/ de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag cing yongs
su zad par 'gyur ro/ /phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin gcig pa'am/ /nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru
ba'am/ tshad pa'am/ lag pa na ba'am/ rkang pa na ba'am/ mgon ba'am/ ha la ha las btags pa'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu'am/ 'brum bu phra mo'am/ lhog
pa'am| 'bras sam/ bye'u 'bras sam/ g.yan pa'am/ mtshan par rdol ba'am/ 'brum bu'am/ brjed byed dam/ khyab par na ba'am/ gsod pa'am/ 'ching
pa'am/ brdeg pa'am/ bsdigs pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod pa'am/ mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das/ lus kyi na tsha'am/ sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/ rmi lam ngan pa
mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems can dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal
te bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor bzhi po dang / rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod par byed/ /gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan par byed
pa dang / don 'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed pa/ 'bri bar byed pa/ 'brir 'jug par byed pa/ kun chub par byed pa/ sems can gzhan rnams nyan
du 'jug par byed pa'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par byed/ sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang / dor ba med pa/
gzugs med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/ rgyu med pa/ gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa/
phung po dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi bzlas
@#/ /pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro/ /ji snyed po tir bri bar byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mang pos ci
bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa'am/ rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/ gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni/ 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyi rlabs su mkhas pas shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
ste| gang la la'i skyes bu'i tsan+dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur zhing brgyad cing rdo ba'am sa la gzhi bas nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ de la tsan+dan
nam| ga bur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur ba'am brgyad pas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dri zhim po yang de nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar kho
nar bdag gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang / snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod par byed
pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ rmu rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de/ phyi ma la yang ngo /
gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim
po nyid du byed do/ /gang yang bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las
gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la smyung bar gnas par byas te lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying
po tshig tu mi brjod par yongs su bzlas na/ de la bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /nyi shu po gang zhe na/ gang de'i
lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang / las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dkar bar yang 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i yid
du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang / nor rnyed par yang 'gyur ro/ /nor yod pa yang rkun pos 'khyer bar mi nus so/ /mes mi 'tshig go /chus mi 'khyer
ro| |rgyal po'i yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/ /de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang char pa'i/
@#/ /'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu'am thal ba la yongs su bsngags te phyogs dang / mtshams
dang / steng dang / 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na/ nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so/ /sems can thams
cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgras 'jigs pa byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mkha' 'gro
ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa drag po yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /lhas
kyang rgyun du nye bar srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 'thob ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ 'chi ba'i
dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /mthong
par 'khrul pa med do/ /lag pa g.yob pa med do/ /bshang ba med do/ /gci ba med do/ /rlung gi rnam pa med do/ /shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha 'og tu bltas nas
tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i
bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o/ /chang dang / sha dang / btsod dang / sgog skya dang / bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma
khyad par du srung bar 'dod pas de rnams spang bar bya'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam mi nus shes par
byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yin no/ /sems can gyi
don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro/ /shes rab ni/ byang chub tu brjod la/ sems dpa' ni/ thabs te/
de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du brjod par byed
@#/ /pa ni/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i
dus la bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzum par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ gson cig /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang
po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang / skye rgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i don gyi phyir yang ngo // //na mas+t+rai ya

d+h+wa a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa b+h+yaH/ na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha AR+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaH/ a tI ta a nA ga ta pra t+yu ta pan+ne b+h+yaH/ na maHsamyag+ga tA nAM/ na maHsamya ka pra ti

pan+nA nAM/ na maHshA ra dwa ti pu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na ma AR+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yaH/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi te shi len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ ar+had b+h+yaH/

sa mya k+saM bung+d+he b+h+yaH/ b+ha ga ba de b+h+yaH/ na maHsu bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA sa ba ni rti te shwa ra rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsiM ha bi kri Di ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ da thA ga

tA ya/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Th-i te ma Ni klu Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta smyud ga ta shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pa sh+ya ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/

na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tsha na dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na te/ ta thA ga tA ya/

a r+ha te samya k+saM bung+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA ha/ oM sha me sha me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kI rti ta nA ma d+he yA

ya shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta a wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM gra ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHin+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shir ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na pa b+ha se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na

mo a pra ti ha ta bai Sha dz+yA rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi krAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bung+d+ha ya/ na mo d+ha rmA ya/ na moHsaM g+hA ya/ na mo a tI ta a nA ga ta pra t+yud pan+ne b+h+yo/ /sarba bung+d+ha

@#/ /bo d+hi satwa b+h+yo/ b+ha ga bad b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+r-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ pra dz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra ni b+hA na bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ sA ma tha bar+d+ha

ni/ bi bA sh+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+ha rma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ku la bud+d+ha d+harma ba ri pU ra NI ye swA hA/ ma no rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma A R+ya a wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo b+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA

ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma pra b+hA+e ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ m+ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo no ma skr-i dwa i daM AR+ya a ba lo ki ye shwa ra mu kho da gI r+N+NaM/ a mo g+ha pA

sha rA dzA nA ma hri da yaM/ ta thA ga tA saM mu khi b+hI Shi taM/ ma hA taM pa ra ShaM ma d+he a ha mi dA nI mA brta ya Sh+ya mi/ sing+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa de/ sarba kAr+yA NI sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nA ny+tsa
rak+Sha b+ha wan+tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru NI kA/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri

tshi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ po ri pi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha sta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shung+d+ha sa twa/ bung+d+h+ya bung+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bi d+hi be shi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/

ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shung+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prA p+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la mi tsa la/ pra tsa la pa tsa la/

e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra

ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa

ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ya ra ya ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dwA la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+hA sa b+hA sa/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma b+ha ga wA na/ so ma A da t+ya/ ya ma/

ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+men+d+ra/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ d+ha na da/ de ba/ ri Shi ga Na a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa na twa ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha

na da/ bA yu/ ag+ni ri Shi/ nA ya ka bi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra
ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa man+ta a wa lo ki te/ bi lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tri b+hu ba ni shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa ma a laM kr-i ta/ a ba

li ki te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu yam mu ny+tsa mu ny+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwA sh+tsa/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa dra pe b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaH/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi
@#/ /b+h+yaH/ sarba bi She b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+we re b+h+ya/ e baM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na/ tA Da na/ tardza na/ rA dza/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka /bi Sha shasta pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki

Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bo d+h+yaM ga /tsa tur AR+ya satwa saM pra kA sha ka /ta pa ta pa/ ta ma ta ma da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ d+ha

ma d+ha ma/ ma hA ku ru Ni ka /ma hA ta mo an+d+ha kA ra bi d+ha ma na/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /ma la ma la/ mi li mi li /mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu Tu/

Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e na ya tsar+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hu ta ga Na saM b+ha ny+dza ka /ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa

ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shung+d+ha bi Sha ya ni ba si ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dz+nyA+o u pa

bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra/ si kr-i ta dza Ta mu ku Ta/ ma hA a da b+hu ta ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra la ta/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha a pra kam+p+ya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA

tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba ka rma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka /sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka /sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba satwa a sha pa ri pU ra ka /sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa ka ra na maHstu te swA hA/

a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha pA ShA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+ha su trA ya swA hA/ mA ra sai n+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/

a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me ka rma ku ru na

mo stu te swA hA/ oM ra Na ra Na hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dza ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dzri dzri dzuM swA hA/ oM hUM dza ya swA hA/ oM hraM trai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM
ba su pa ti swA hA/ oM A ro l-i ka swA hA/ oM ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/ oM A ro l-i ka hrIHhrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ ni ya ta a ni ya ta/ be dA nI ya a shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wAn ka rma No a she Sha tAH
k+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/ oM pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swAhA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub pa yin no/ /dus gsum du bzlas na/ mtshams med pa lnga rnam
par dag par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos dang / thal ba dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu
la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo / /rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o/ /nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par
@#/ /bya'o| |lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas bcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o/ /lto na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa'am/ 'jim bag gam/ chus kyang
bya'o| |mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o/ /so'i nad la kA ra bI ra'i so shing gis so/ /mtshams bcing ba la ni/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gdab par byas na/ mtshams bcings pa yin no/ /thams cad du srung skud dam/ chu'am/ thal
bas bya'o/ /gza' thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/ /rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / pa spu byi ba dang / lhog pa dang / gre ba
'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o/ /mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/ rgya skyegs kyi chu'am/ sbrang rtsi'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i dus
thams cad du rtsod pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o/ /yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag
bar bzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na/ zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de'i chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sems can thams
cad srung ba yin no/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / yams rnams zhi ba yin no/ /phyag rgya tsan+dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas na/ mtshams med pa
thams cad zad par byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na khyim srung ba'o/ /pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad kyi srung ba'o/ /tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang / 'byung po dang /
rgyu skar thams cad las srung ba'o/ /rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / na gu li dang / dri'i na gu li dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang /
dbang po'i lag pa dang / dri'i pri yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nata ta zhes bya ba ste/ de dag gang yang rung
ba la brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang / dpung ba la bcing bar bya'o/ /byis pa rnams kyi ni/ mgul du'o/ /bud med rnams kyi 'doms
su bcangs na/ rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do/ /g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang ster ro/ /nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du srung ba byas pa yin no/ /dug dang mes mi
tshugs so/ /dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang / sprin dang / thog ni/ chus rengs par
@#/ /byed do| |kA ra bI ra'i lcug mas ni/ las thams cad byed do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par
yang las 'di rnams byed do/ /de nas sgrub par 'dod na/ thang sku'i cho ga ni/ tshon sna ma lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba ri dwags kyi pags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag ga cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lha bzo mkhan gso
sbyong dang ldan pas ri mor bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste dri zhim po'i chus bkang
ba'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /nye bar spyod pa brgyad dang / nye bar mkho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos bsregs
la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pa'am/ dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas
pa bya'o| |de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ldong ros sam mig sman la yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus na/ de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rmongs
pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/ /sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de 'dis byed do zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang / mi
dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa
chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs
la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / /rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/ /mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/ /shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la
skyabs su mchi/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma/ /'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shing / /drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs/ /de ni spyod pa rgya
@#/ /chen rnams las byung / /sems can don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur/ /spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas/ /dge
ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin las su bsgyur/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig byed pa/ /dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs//
de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud/ /byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma/ /lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/ /thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags/ /
shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang / /rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la/ /sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen
mchog pas/ /mu su rtog ge ba rnams kun kyang 'dud/ /yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa/ /yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings/ /rig pa mchog gi dngos
grub sbyin mdzad pa/ /blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/ /mi bslu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs/ /thugs dam
brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang / /dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs/ /'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/ /sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te/ /
phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang / /dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/ /gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/ dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can/ /
lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang / /yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs
'gyur ba'i/ /lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/ /bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol/ /bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang / /lce yi dbang po dag cing
tshig btsun la/ /rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang / /bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol/ /rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las bden/ /snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan
dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod/ /mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar/ /mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med/ /na mo b+ha ga wa te/ brah+ma Ne/ na maHswa ra swa t+yai de bi

sid+d+h+ya n+tu man+t+ra pA da taM bra h+mA nu man+t+ra swA hA/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya shrI ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo
dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems
@#/ /dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /lha mo chen po dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang mgo bos phyag
'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te
brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags so/ /lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong
ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya
@#/ /rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs
pa dang / yams kyi nad gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang / g.yo can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/
nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so
legs so/ /legs te/ gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang / pan yon ni/ /de dag
lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs
pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na de
bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par
'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni/ 'dir lha mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes
sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa
dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par
byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par
@#/ /byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho
bai DUR+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi me tog gzi brjod skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las
rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos
kye cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas
kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi
yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang
phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i
dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag
@#/ /'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes
pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs
pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma
'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor
bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa
de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'
las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i
snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang
bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/
@#/ /'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/
lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lnga'i
dpal/ gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo/ /oM nyi ma'i bu mo'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can gyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/
gang+gA ma/ mu stegs thams cad ma/ bkra shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i
dpal| gza' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng+ge la zhon ma/ pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma la gnas ma/ pad+ma 'dzin ma/ pad+ma dang ldan ma/ rin po che
'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba du ma dang ldan ma/ nor sbyin ma/ dkar mo/ dkar mo chen mo/ lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thams cad 'dzin ma/ bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i
lus can ma/ shes nyin gyi bu mo/ lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum ldan ma/ mgo 'bum ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi
gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhi ma/ sprin 'dra ba'i skra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs
pa'i dpal/ 'phags pa me tog gi dpal/ me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang / mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgya mtsho thams
cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang / rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin ma/ zas dang /
skom spyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/ gshin
rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi brjid ma/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor pa ma/ rnam
