par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/ phyag dpung pa'i
mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros
@#/ /shig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyi/ khyod gsang ba dam pa'i
dam tshig smros shig /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/ gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba
brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po
de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to/ /oM pad+ma hasta/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA shA sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hri da ya tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang
ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po Ta la 'di brag dang / nags tshal dang / rtswa shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang
bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar bar gyur to/ /klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas
rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to/ /chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to/ /de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku
gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang
ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa'
dag pa/ khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba'i
snying po'i gzungs 'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste spyi bo
la bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid do/ /
@#/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do/ /sdig pa dang / sems can gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol
ba rnams dang / mi mdza' ba rnams 'jigs par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o/ /rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin blta 'tshal bar
'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni/ 'di yin te/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /byams pa dang /
snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par
bgyi'o| |me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / pheng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dbul bar bgyi'o/ /tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga
bgyi'o| |ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo krung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /tshig gzhan mi smra
bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang / yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon
par bgyi'o/ /gsang sngags kyis ni/ dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod
bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna
tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar
'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ grub pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes grub pa'i rtags dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya
'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dgos pa thams cad dang / las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya
stong gangA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
@#/ /phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur
ro| |mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol
bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /de lta bas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na khang pa
brtsegs pa legs par brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri'i mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa blta
bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang /
snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhes dang / bla mar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor ba
me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o/ /tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum
gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o//
mchod yon dang / yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o/ /a ka ru dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres
nas blang bar bgyi'o/ /dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ don yod khams gsum rnam par grags/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ /gang phyir
bdug pa tsam gyis ni/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par
'gyur ro/ /dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
@#/ /mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod
pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor
na| de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / rtsod pa
dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang / mi bde ba thams
cad dang / nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur
ro| |byad dang / g.yeng byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad
dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / bsgoms nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod ltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur
ro| |'jigs par 'gyur/ 'gyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar
bgyi'o| |'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /zas dkar
gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor ba dbul bar bgyi'o/ /snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ri mo'i
gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du nam langs kyi bar du mchis nas nyal bar bgyis te rmi lam du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med
khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzing dang bcas/ gnas dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang /
rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs
la| lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan
@#/ /'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang rig sngags 'chang de la
dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / legs so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa
dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags
ba'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par bya ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni/ grub zin te/ legs so legs so/ /khyod rig sngags
'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig /khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po
la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing / 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni/ dam pa sgrub pa yin no/ /zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag
par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs
kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur
ro| |skye bo dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la don yod
pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa chen po bla na med pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshes
bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la ci 'byor ba'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o/ /gang gi tshe
yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi
shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o/ /bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'am mi
@#/ /dge ba thams cad dam/ nyams pa'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/
'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur/ de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i don dang / las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o/ /oM pad+ma d+ha ra a mo g+ha
dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so/ /oM pad+ma pA sha d+ha rA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra sany+tso da ya hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi
dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa skul ba'i gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas chab dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor na/ thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /oM trai lokya a b+h+ya hA na a mo g+ha pA sha /pad+ma bi lo ki ta A yan+tu/ b+hu ba na su ra
su ru su ru/ bi ma la hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs
bcur gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so/ /oM pad+ma b+hu dza mahA bA sha d+ha ra Ni man+t+ra ya mi/ a mo g+ha pA sha yan+tu b+hu ba swAhA/ mu ru mu ru hUM/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs la
sogs pa spyan drangs pa'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / chab dang / me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te thams cad la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so/ /oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badzra a d+hiSh+Tha na ku ru ku ru swAhA/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ chab dang yungs
kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na/ dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /
de thams cad bsrungs pas ni/ rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung
po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong
@#/ /bas rdo rje ltar sra bar 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad+mot+ta ra siMhA/ san+tu Ti si ri si ri hUM/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te/ yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na/ pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng+ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la
chab dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags 'grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM mahA kA ru Ni
ka pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha dri D+ha badzra a d+hi Sh+Thi te b+hu ru b+hu ru ban+d+ha re swAhA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang
dang / bsti gnas dang / 'chag sa dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas
gtor bar bgyis te gnas su gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin
dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA she na sa man+ta da sha su di k+Shu si mA b+han+d+ha ya/ tu ru tu
ru hUM/ lcags kyi bur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o/ /lnga pa ni/
dbus kyi bzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcing
pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la ban+d+ha ya sa man+ta na/ pad+ma ma hA pad+ma d+hu ru d+hu ru swAhA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / steng du yang gtor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur te/ bgegs dang /
log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can gdug pa dang / lha'am/ klu gdug pa gang su
yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa dang / bgyis pa ngan pa thams
@#/ /cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha ba ri shud+d+he sho d+ha ya sa man+te na/ d+hi ri d+hi ri shud+d+ha satwa ma hA pad+me hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ bya skyibs sam/ tshang tshing ngam/ 'chag sa'am/
gnas sam/ tshal lam/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ grang sa'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la gtor na/ stong pa'am/ mi
stong pa'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dwags la sogs te/ rigs ngan pa thams cad
yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/ bza' nyes dang / bsgoms nyes dang /
gnod ltas dang / gnod sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs par
spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa ni/ bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad srung ba dang / bskyab pa
dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / khyab 'jug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang /
lus ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os
par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar
par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / yams dang / gnod pa dang /
'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram/ reg par bgyis na/ rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang /
dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der
mchod par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyis mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par dkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang /
@#/ /rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang /
blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur
ro| |rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing / /shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde
ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM pad+me sa ra sa ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya swAhA/ gsang sngags so/ /oM pi bu la pad+ma a mo g+ha pra sa ra pra bi sha tu ku ru ku ru
swAhA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad+ma ban+d+hu re hUM/ slob ma'i gsang sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma shi ge tu ru tu ru tiSh+Th-i badzra ban+d+he
swAhA/ spyi gtsug bcing ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyis shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma dza lod k+She pa b+hi ri b+hi ri hUM/ chab bteg pa'i gsang sngags te/
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ta saM b+ha ra pad+ma a sa ne dza la ba ti ku ru ku ru hUM/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /oM pad+mo
pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra swAhA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+me su pad+me pUr+Na ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma le
swAhA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags te/ lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib
mo dang / sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad du bgyi'o/ /oM a mo g+ha bi ma le dzi
hwA gra saM sho d+ha ni pad+ma ka ma la dzi hwA swAhA/ lce spyang ba'i gsang sngags te/ dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te kha bshal la lce'i dri ma yongs su dag
par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma dang ku mu da'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro/ /so dang / rkan dang / mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha gan+d+ha ba
ti su ru su ru pra b+hu ru di bya gan+d+he pad+ma pra b+he swAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal ba'i ril bu/ tsan+dan dang / na la da dang / spri ka dang / ut+pa la dang / gur gum dang /
@#/ /gla rtsi lhan cig blang ba bgyis la phye ma zhib mor btags nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gsang sngags stong
rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod du stsal nas bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na/ rtag tu kha nas ut+pa
la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du the tshom med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang dgyes/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po gnyis pa/
bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur pas/ /don yod rig sngags bla na med/ /rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyid pas/ /dus kun rul dri spang bar bgyi/ /mkhris pa bad
kan snabs dag dang / /de bzhin du 'jig myur du ni/ /kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung / /su la tshig dag smras pa ni/ /de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur/ /lha rnams dbang du mchis
pa dang / /bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang / /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / /zla ba nyi ma nyid
dag dang / /thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis/ /'di ni kha na mur bgyid na/ /tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo la/ /mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu mi min dbyangs
'gyur te/ /dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs/ /tshigs bcad stong ni klog pa dang / /sngon bklags pa ni nyams mi 'gyur/ /hUM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang / /lha gang dkyil 'khor
gnas pa'ang mchis/ /phaT ces bgyis pas gdug pa dang / /bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig /gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang / /brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa/ /
thams cad mod la 'byer 'gyur zhing / /khas bub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /ril bu kha na thogs na ni/ /dus kun tu ni mkhas pas 'gyur/ /grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te/ /
thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur/ /tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur/ /ril bu 'di ni bcang bgyis na/ /don yod pad+ma dri ma med/ /ril bu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur/ /
oM ma la bi ga te/ pad+ma bi ba re/ sany+tsa ra ba tsa re swAhA/ a mo g+ha sid+he sho d+ha ya hUM/ nA ga pus pa'i shun pa dang / u shi ra dang / tsan+dan dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka
ko la dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / pra pu na da ri ka dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / u gra dang / su gan+d+hi ka 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhib
@#/ /tu btags nas gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba'am/ chab dron pos khrus
bgyi ba'am 'tshal pas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma shin tu dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis pa bton pa tsam gyis/ sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang / /gdon
kun 'joms pa 'grub pa dang / /nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi /mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs/ /bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod
la ni/ |dri ma kun zhi som nyi med/ /dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar/ /bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/ /gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar/ /zla ba nyi ma bzhin du
mdzes/ /gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa ni/ /lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur/ /mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur/ /ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur/ /tshangs par spyod min tshangs
spyod 'gyur/ /thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur/ /tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur/ /mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang / /rtag tu bro nad ma mchis 'gyur/ /lus la
lha yi dri rnams 'byung / /pad+ma ku mud mnyen pa'i lus/ /sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te/ /lha yi tsan+dan dri dag ni/ /mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med/ /rtag tu bde bar nyal ba
dang / /bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang / /lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang / /gdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur/ /mi bzad dgra
rnams kyis kyang min/ /lus nyid sbyangs pa bgyis nas su/ /bzlas brjod brtson pa'i sgrub pa bgyi/ /legs pa'i sgrub pa'i las bgyis na/ /de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /
rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi/ /ci 'dod yid la
bzlas pa yis/ /rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur/ /thog mar lus sbyang cho ga bgyi/ /de nas gsang sngags legs par spyod/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma lo tsa ni di bya/ driSh+Ta pa ri
shud+d+ha/ su ru su ru pad+ma/ ak+Shi sha d+hu ru b+hu ru sa man+ta bya ba lo ki ni swAhA/ ldong ros gi wang rgya mtsho dbu ba sa ha dza/ /ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la/ /gsang
sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs/ /'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin
gyis/ /kun pas bkra shis shis 'di mig nad kun/ /'joms par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rmi/ /yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ /ngan par snang dang ngan par
@#/ /blta| |nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang / /lhag ma spags pa bsgoms nyes dang / /bza' nyes gnod
bsgribs gnod sbyin dang / /srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag /thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ /mi snang bar ni the tshom med/ /mig gis bzang po mthong ba dang / /rmi lam
bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas/ /lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /mig yongs su sbyong ba'o/ /oM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha pad+ma a me g+ha mu khi ba ra ba ra
ba ra de swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis gi wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po
lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /snying po dang nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs te dbral ba'i dbus su
thig le bgyis te thig le lan gcig bgyis pas dpral ba'i steng na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis/ /
gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang / /srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid/ /thams cad 'jig 'gyur the tshom med/ /sems can gdug pas gdug bsams
kyang / /phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas/ /de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te/ /me la phye ma leb bzhin no/ /rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas/ /'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang / /blon
po che dang mdun na 'don/ /btsun mo tshogs bcas dbang du 'gyur/ /dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag /thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur/ /rgyal rigs dmangs rigs nyid dag ste/ /
thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur/ /mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur/ /rig sngags la ni thams cad dang / /gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste/ /de dag thams cad dam tshig
gi /rjes su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcur srung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing / /rtag tu grub pa bla med stsol/ /thig le 'di bgyi grogs med rgyu ba dag /chom rkun dang ni chom po
g.yon can dang / /g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa/ /kun nas bsgral bar 'gyur te som nyi med/ /seng+ge stag dang dom dag dang / /glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang / /wa dang
gdug bcas srog chags dang / /so gdug sprul kun mgo nas za/ /gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas/ /de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te/ /nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
ser ba me dang tshig pa dang / /char pa mi bzad mtshon cha byad/ /mkhas pas thig le 'chad pa'i lus/ /khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don/ /
@#/ /thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur/ /shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang / /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags
'chang gis bdag dran par bgyid cing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ /de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun na bdag
mchis nas yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par
bgyi'o/ /don yod grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji
skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par bgyid na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag
gis stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ bdag gis ma nongs so/ /de lta bas na/ rig
sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tshom ma
mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang sngags bzla ste/ oM a mo g+ha bA sha d+ha ra pra sa ra hUM/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/ gzhon nu mas bkal
ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o/ /oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra Na mu ru mu ri di bya ka shi kaM/ saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/ gos kyi
gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha bsta N+yod k+Shi pA mi bo d+hi ni pad+me swA hA/ gos brtag pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM da byo da ka

saM b+hu ta a mo g+ha ba ru Na tsa re b+hi k+Shi na ts+ya hUM/ khrus kyi sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM a mr-i ta a mo g+ha pad+ma a sa ne/ baR+Sha ni tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te/
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni ku ru ku ru swAhA/ bdag srung ba ste/ yungs kar dang / chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro/ /oM
a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ ma hA pad+me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thi hUM/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM sarbA tra a mo g+ha ba ba ti tiSh+Tha rak+Sha tu hUM/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa bsrung ba
ste/ thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o/ /oM trai lokya pad+ma a mo g+ha kra ma ne mi li mi li swA hA/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o//
@#/ /oM pad+me ma hA pad+me sa ra sa ra/ sa man+te na pa ri baSh+DA ya/ a mo g+ha pA she na su ru su ru swAhA/ tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o/ /oM bi tsi
tra a mo g+ha bstA na raM ga bi shud+d+ha ya/ ki Ni ki Ni swAhA/ ba dan gyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha sha ra badzra tun+Da tha ra tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags te/
lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM bi pu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ra bi shud+he si ri si ri swA hA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /su dag der zhugs nas mtho ris kyi
sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /oM nA nA bi tsi Ta/ a mo g+ha puSh+pa/ pha la tA kI r+Na pU ra ya pa ra pa ra hUM/ bum pa gang ba'i

gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha rat+na bi ma Na/ ka Ta da tsa/ a driSh+Ta bi bya gan+d+ho dz+wa la s+pha ra Na/ sa man+te na dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ pog phor gyi gsang sngags te/ lan
bdun bzla'o/ /oM dz+wa la ba ti/ rat+na g+ha ta/ si ri Ni tu Ti tu Ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM di bya b+haM dza na a mo g+ha pad+ma ba re pU ra ya hUM/ kham
phor gyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha saM pu ra Ni dro Na gan+d+ha pa ti swA hA/ thig le'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM sa ra ni sA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha dza ne
mA da ne hUM/ ril ba mgrin ring gi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM rat+na di bya/ rat+na kum+b+ha ba ti sA ga ra/ saM pU ra Ni swAhA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM

bi tsi tro dz+wa la nA na raM ga b+hi b+hak+ta ya saM sho d+ha ya tu Ti swA hA/ tshon rtsi'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM di bya a wa lo ki ni bi b+ha dza yaM tu sa man+te na sa ma ra Na swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o/ /oM na nA pra hA ra Na a mo g+ha mu drA dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ phyag mtshan bri ba ste/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha rat+na su tra d+ha re ki Ni
ki Ni swA hA/ thig skud kyi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor ram/ ri mo bri ba'i ras sam/ gzhan gzhi ci yang rung ba la yang gdab par bgyi'o/ /

oM bi pu la ba re bra be sha ya/ oM mo g+ha pad+me hUM/ sgo'i cha bye ba'i gsang sngags te/ sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM su b+hi b+hak+ti su maM ga la dra ra bA ban+ti/ oM di bya b+ha dza

na/ a mo g+ha pA sha na ba re/ gi ri gi ri hUM/ oM saM bU rna ru phyid bya ba dza ni/ oM mo g+ha pad+me swA hA/ lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /oM bi bi d+ha rU pa hA ro ba k+Sha ra Na/ tsa la tsa la/ a mo

g+ha ba ti swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM di bya gan+d+ha nu sa ra Ni a mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swAhA/ mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM gan+d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/
@#/ /a mo g+ha pra s+phu ra hUM/ dri'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM ni rma la kA ya sho d+ha ni di bya gan+d+ha pra bu ra Ni pU ra ya hUM/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te/
lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM g+han+d+ha tsU r+Na pra pU ra Ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM sa man+te na/ bi ma le gan+b+ho t+ta re swA hA/ skul ba'i gsang

sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM di bya gan+d+ha pra pU ra Ni sA ga ra dza la di bya a d+hi Sh+Thi te ka la sho d+ha ra pU r+Na pU ra ya dza ya sid+d+he swA hA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya
rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM ra sa sA gra pa ti/ sar+b+ba bi d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hi Sh+Thi te saM pU ra ya hUM/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM di bya

b+ho dza na/ saM pU ra ya/ bi pu la pra b+he swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM tri shu kla b+ho dza na ba li bi pU la ra sA gra ba ti su ra pra su ra hUM/ zas dkar
gsum gyi gtor ma'am/ gtor ma gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM pha la ba ti swA ra ba ti di bya ba na spa ti/ ta ra ta ra tu ni swA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te/

lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM di bya ku su mot+pa la nA nA puSh+pa pra baR+Sha ni b+ha ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM bi bi d+ha la ta puSh+pA pa kuN+Thi ta ba na spa ti a ha ra saM
pU r+Na kuM b+he swAhA/ me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM ma hA d+hu pa me g+ha pa Ta la sany+tsa dA ya/ sa man+te na hUM swAhA/ dug pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa

gcig bzla'o/ /oM a tha ra pa Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la de ba mu khe swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM b+hi bi d+ha ma Ni kan ka rat+no dz+wa la puSh+mi ma Ni a mo g+ha ma Ni swA hA/ cha zhing
rgyan pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM pad+ma ka re bi ma lan kha/ ang+gu li/ sa ma sa ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM sarba gu Na pra Na ta/ shi ro ban+d+ha nA ya na maska ro mi/ mi li mi li tu ri Ni swA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM da sha di sha a

b+hi ban+d+ha na pra sa ra hu hUM/ bskor ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM bi bi d+ha yu d+ha dz+wa li ta pa ni/ pra dz+wa la pra s+phu ra hUM/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM di bya a mo g+ha bi pu la swa re ma d+hu ra ni ra g+ho Sha ru te na ra Na ra Na hUM/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do/ /oM

rash+mi dz+wa la sa man+te na/ a ba b+h+wa sa ya ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi khe swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM d+hu ru d+hu ru a pa ha ya shI g+ha dza be hUM dgug pa'i
@#/ /gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM duSh+Tha sa do bi bo d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba re swAhA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags
te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM bi tsi tra ma Ni bi bu la brta ni hUM/ /bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM bi tsi tra ra dz+wa lo di bya/ /ku su ma
ba re puSh+pa ra ti swAhA/ me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM di bya lo tsa ne a mo g+ha pra ba re/ sarba di bya a d+hi Sh+Thi ta/ sid+d+hi sho d+he bi lo ki te swAhA/ dgug
pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+me sa man+ta/ shu b+ha ne ta ra ta ra gats+tsha swa b+ha ba na ma swAhA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags
te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM di bya saM pU ra Ni nA gabi lo ki na hUM/ mkhar gsil gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM baD+Ta spu ra Ni spu ra ya/ a

mo g+ha bi ta sa man+ta pra b+he swAhA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM dur b+ha saM s+tha ra bid+d+h+ya a tiSh+Thi ta pra sa ra su ra su ra/ ri Shi pU dzi te swA hA/ rtsa gding
ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /oM dz+wa la du ma dz+wa la shi khi rash+mi gar+b+he swAhA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM pad+me ni pad+ma
sa ne ba re nA ga b+hu ba ne swA hA/ 'bab chu dang / mtsho'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /oM kha ga tsa ri Ni/ ga ma ga ma ya pa da pra tsa ri Ni hUM/ len pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan

brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /oM sarba tra a mo g+ha b+hi Shi ka ma hA tsU Da bi ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsi tu ma/ pra ba ra pA Ni b+hu dze pad+me d+ha dze swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzla'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na/ dgos
pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med
khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i me tog dang / gdugs dang / ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ro sna tshogs kyi
mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma bzang po rnams pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu
@#/ /rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la so so'i
gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ dgos
pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang / gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags
'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /
sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o/ /cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang
sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rig
sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur 'gyur ro/ /de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/ /shin tu rgya che zhing bag tshad ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur
sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang / dpal stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'di la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par mi
bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson
par bgyi'o/ /bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o/ /bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang /
snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar
bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ /sangs
@#/ /rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o/ /'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas mngon sum
du bsgom par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim mo'i gzugs la phyag rgya bgyis te mdun du rtswa'i gding ba gting na skyil mo krung
bcas te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ /dbang la don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig /'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang / sems can dag pa lag na
pad+ma can/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang / lha dang klu dang
gnod sbyin dang / srin po lha min gsang ba pa/ 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang / drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs/ /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / drang srong tshogs
dang de bzhin du/ /zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang / /de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang / /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur/ /sgrol ma bdun ni
'du bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang / /mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can/ /de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang / /rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni/ /lcags sgrog rdo rje
lcags sgrog dang / /lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI/ /dpe med pho nya mo dang ni/ /'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang / /pad+ma ko ti ut+pa la/ /pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du/ /ti se yi ni
rtse mo na/ /'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma dag dang / /de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu /mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang / /rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du/ /bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig
dang / /sum cu gnyis nas lha dag ni/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis/ /de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do/ /de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mgon po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa la blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /bram ze'i cha
lugs don yod zhags/ /mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med/ /mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang / /de bzhin rgya mtsho'i klong dang ni/ /mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dag/ /de bzhin
@#/ /zhal ni bzhi dag dang / /mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang / /de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni/ /rgyun lta
bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /mgon po thams cad ston par mdzad/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag med/ /byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba/ /mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi /chu bo gang+ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs
'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon/ /phyag rgya bcing pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong ba chen po'i rnam par
gzhan mthong ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang / chos kyi 'khro lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan/ /de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas/ /de la yid gnyis
som nyi the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gshung ba'am mtshams med lnga/ /mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags
pa la/ /kha zer nyid dang dam chos bslu ba dang / rgyal ba'i gsung spong mnar med gzhol ba dang / mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang / bskal pa 'bum mo
thams cad skad cig grol/ /phyag rgyal gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam/ /thos sam mthong ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang / /sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med/ /don
yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang / /'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang+ga yi/ bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar
'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang / /gsang sngags mthong nas
bsod nams phung chen gyis/ /bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de ni dpag tu med par som nyi med/ /de nas rig
sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas/ /gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang / /yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang / /rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang / /sna
tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing / /dpung pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i stan bshams par/ skyil mo krung bcas nas ni
byams sems dang / snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas/ /phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi
@#/ /zhing / rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson/ /shin tu rig pa tshig gzhan mi smra bar/ /shin ti rig pas srung ba'i cho ga bgyi/ /shin tu bkra
shis bla ma de nyid gus/ /bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang / /sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni/ /phyag rgya 'di
bcing bar bgyi ste/ lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying gar gzhag go /phyag rgya 'di ni/ don yod pa'i
rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do/ /mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM a

mo g+ha bi ku ra bi ta sa man+ta a wa lo ka ya na mas+t+rai ya d+h+wA/ a d+hi Sh+Thi ta a mo g+h+ra pa pad+me/ tsa ra bi tsa ra sany+tsa hUM hUM/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par blta ba don yod pa'i
rgyal po pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum
phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gsar gyi kha dog lta bu
brkyangs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/
dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams
srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chad pa thams
cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so/ /don
yod dam tshig mchog grags pa/ /pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing / /mdzub mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyid la sen mo mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan

te rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+maM ku sha sa man yA na/ gr-i h+na gri h+na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa hUM/ phyag rgya
@#/ /bcing ste/ bcings ma thag tu'am bzlas pa tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so/ /zhes
bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes pa skye bar
'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / /yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog
thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo
phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par
'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar
bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang pa'i phyag rgya ni/ pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang / /me tog la sogs dri rnams dang / /phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang / /ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni/ /gtor
ma mchod yon rab tu dbul/ /bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang / /tshon skud sna lnga tshon phye 'o/ /gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog /'di ni dngul
ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs/ /thams cad du ni don yod mchog /go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs/ /gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya
'di ni| bag tsha ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni/ grub pa dam pa lags so/ /spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA satwa a ya tu mi
ha maN+Da le/ bi ri bi ri pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /phyag
na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug /lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang / /de
bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min de bzhin du/ /nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste/ /de kun skad cig
@#/ /'du 'gyur zhing / /bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med/ /lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i mtshams su bya ste/ gung mo
rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcings dang / /dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi/ /srung ba'i las la bag tsha med/ /phyag
rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang / /gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu/ /mtshams bcings dkyil 'khor bcings pa dang / /srung ba'i
las ni bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha badzra dr-i D+ha pad+ma ban+d+ha sa man+te na ma hA sa man+ta rak+Sha n+tu maM/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas don yod phyag rgya ste/ grub ldan sems can
kun smra na/ /don yod pa yi phyag rgya ni/ khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par bzhag ste srin lag kha gdengs la sor
mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni/ don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags/ /phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang / /'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba
dang / /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang / gsang sngags dam pa bsrungs bgyis na/ /rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur/ /

dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur/ /oM badzre badzre/ a d+hi Sh+Thi te pad+mo bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ pra be sha tu s+t+rai ya d+ho nu ga ta na d+ha
ri tu Ti swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis/ /de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu/ /g.yo bar 'gyur bar so ma nyi med/ /phyag na pad+ma'i lus
'bar nas/ mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis/ /rtag tu blta shing mdun na mchis/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang / mtho ris sgo
rnams 'byed par 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na/ /gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing / /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na/ gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do/ /bde
chen 'jig rten khams dag ni/ /sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis/ /gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog /nye ba'i
nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par gro/ /gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid/ /dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar/ /phyag rgya bcings pa
tsam gyis ni/ mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid/ /dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur/ /mi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar
@#/ /'gyur| |phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/ /mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang / sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /sems can kun la rtag tu sdug /de
bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste gung mo pad+ma'i ral ba'i tshul du bgyis te spyi bo'i ral ba sa la bzhag pa
ni| pad+ma'i ral ba'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni/ don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o//
oM a mo g+ha pad+mo dza le bi sho d+ha ya hUM bi ri bi ri bi ma le swA hA/ phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis/ bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags 'di/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du
bzlas nas su/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas/ rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis/ /mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur/ /mi gtsang spyod pa gzang ba dang / tshangs
spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur/ /bsod nams phung po lha bzhin 'bar/ /zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes/ /'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug /
gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub/ /grub pa don yod zhags pa yi/ /don yod de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te/ bsrung ba'i phyir ni so ma nyi
med| |mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /sems dpa' mchog sbyin dag pa po/ /mchog sbyin rgyun du thams cad du/ /nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing / /tshe 'phel rtag
tu nad med 'gyur/ /de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur/ /thams cad du ni las 'grub ste/ /gnod pa kun las rnam par grol/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /thams cad
du ni bkra shis mchog /khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag no/ /don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no/ /lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan/ /srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskums pa ni/
pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par bzhag /phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di/ /skyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su/ /phyag rgya 'di dag bcings bgyis shing / /
mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas/ /bcings pa tsam gyi mod nas ni/ /skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur/ /kun nas go char gyur nas ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren
thams cad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas/ /lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong / /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu/ /de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros/ /
bgegs med par ni las 'grub pas/ /bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med/ /oM a mo g+ha badzra dr-i D+ha pad+me shwa ra hUM/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas mthe
@#/ /bong pad+ma kha phye ba ltar bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang /
phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/ /oM pad+me shwa ra a mo g+ha ba ra da/ b+hi ri b+hi ri swA hA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems pa'i bsam ba rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyis rig sngags 'chang de la legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ /rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar
mdzad do/ /mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol
tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /phyag
rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la
phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis
nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol te/ rig sngags 'chang / /legs so legs so/ /'di ni/ bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no/ /zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang
ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur shog bu/ gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no/ /khyod rjes su bzung zhing
byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig /rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig /snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la goms par gyis shig /khyod 'di
@#/ /nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod pad+ma'i nang du brdzus te skyes nas
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar tshig gzhan
mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas
nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang 'bum
phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob par
'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar ldog par 'gyur ro/ /
bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya stong bcings na/ tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
gyis rnam par rol ba'i don yod pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po
dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna
tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod
sgrub pa 'bum lags so/ /'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten las bzlas pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang
ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyis brlabs
bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcings te skyil mo krung bcas nas sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang / 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dran pa dang / blo gros dang / gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa
tsam gyi mod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las gyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par
'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams
kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po
gsum pa/ thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste khar gtad la/ srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo pad+ma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di
brjod do/ /oM tu ru tu ru pad+me a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grub/ /las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi/ /'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis/ /kun rig myur du 'grub
par 'gyur/ /myur du ston pa stsol 'gyur te/ /rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog /mchog kun rab tu stob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa/ /sgrib pa
thams cad las ni rnam par grol/ /bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel/ /bkra shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje bcing ba shin
tu bcing / /rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi/ /mdzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas/ /snying ga dag tu rab tu brkyang / /don yod pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / snying po
gsungs pa dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams cad 'grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha

hr-i da ya/ pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA maN+Da la hr-i da ya hUM/ snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi/ /grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med/ /
thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dang / de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med/ /shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya gsung / /shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /shin tu
bkrus pas gos gtsang bgo /gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing / /sems can kun la brtser gyur nas/ /rtag tu bla ma gus par bsgom/ /rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing / /
@#/ /pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi/ /myur du las 'grub myur du ni/ /pad+ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'thob/ /myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug 'thob/ /myur du
sems can kun phan ldan/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyang pa tsam gyis khar pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyen du bsgreng / mthe bong yid tsam bkug
la lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la mthe bong yid tsam bkug ste gung mo don yod pa'i zhags pa bgyi ba ni/ don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga
chen po'i mig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM pa shu pa ti pA shrA d+ha ra sa ha
sra ra sh+mi pra ti ma Na Di ta kA ya/ a ka ri Sha ni sany+tso da ni/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha sid+d+hi hUM/ phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o/ /de nas don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du gdeg cing / slar yang rang gi gnas su bzung zhing gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/
lan bdun du yang gdeg go /don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni/ /bsam pa mchog tu dag pas bgyi/ /bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub
thams cad dgug pa dang / /mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag /ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin/ /mod la grub pa bla med dang / /med la thams
cad dgug par 'gyur/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min nam mkha' lding / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir/ /thams cad de yi
mod la 'du/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag /de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyi'i phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'du
bar 'gyur/ /mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur/ /yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad/ /
gang dag mnar med song ba dang / /sems can mtshams med lnga bgyid dang / /gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang / /gang dag dam chos spong ba dang / /phyag rgya 'di mthong
'dzin bcug dang / /bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun/ /'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong / /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /
phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang / /gsang sngags zlog par bgyid pa dang / /rig sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /mngon du mthong bar
@#/ /blta bar bya/ /tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni/ /brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi/ /sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams/ /phyag rgya bcings sam mthong tsam gyis//
de kun 'byang 'gyur som nyi med/ /thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar te mkhas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la mdzub mo nor bu bgyis te gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni/
yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/ lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM s+t+rai ya d+h+wa nu ga ta/
a b+hi Sh-iny+tsa tu/ sarba s+t+rai ya d+h+wa/ a b+hi She kai pad+ma ma Ni su pad+me/ a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hi Sh+Thi te hUM/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi
rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams
cad kyi gtso bo gcig pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /spyi gtsug rdo rje pad+ma bcing / /rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang / /mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi/ /rang gi gdong gi khro
gnyer bzhin/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che/ /las kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi/ /thams cad sgrub bgyid phyag rgya ste/ /kun sgrub dam pas gsang sngags pas/ /'di dran grub
pa kun gyi mchog /oM kro d+ha rA dza d+ha ma ma hA a mo g+ha ha na ha na/ sarba du Sh+TaM hUM/ phyag rgya 'di dran tsam gyis kyang / /mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis/ /gdug pa kun ni rnam
'jig ste/ /ri rab kyang ni snyil ba bgyid/ /phyag rgya bcings par bgyis pa yis/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid/ /sems can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu /bgegs
dang log 'dren gdug pa ste/ /de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis/ /lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang / /bram
ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa/ /thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni/ /mchis par 'gyur bar som nyi med/ /rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag la/ /mthe bong mnyam du bteg nas ni//
gung mo yid ni gung mo nyid/ /yid tsam bkug nas bsgreng bar bgyi/ /'di ni pad+ma chen po yi/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste/ /grub pa bla na med pa yi/ /thams cad kyi ni dam pa
lags| |thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar/ /mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la/ /mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni/ /dkar sham chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/ /'di ni kun grub bla na med/ /
@#/ /rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyar dam bcings shing / /shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la/ /khro gnyer bzhin ni de bzhin khro ba dang / /phyag rgya chen
po kun 'dod rab tu sbyin/ /lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar brkyang nas ni/ /gsang ba de brkyangs gung mo bskums nas su/ /mthe chung brkyangs nas lcags sgrog pad+ma yi/ /
tshul du snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang / /dkyil 'khor lha kun
dga' bar 'gyur/ /thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang / /kun gyis srung bgyid som nyi med/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni/ /thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin
legs byas te/ /snying gar bzhag pa gnod sbyin pho nya mo/ /'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags/ /dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la/ /gung mo lhag ma
bskums zhing mthe bong bzhag /pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol bdun gyi/ /grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun/ /nad
kun nye bar zhi bar som nyi med/ /don yod pa yi grub pa bla med kyi/ /cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma
bcing / /mdzub mo bskums pa bgyis nas ni/ /mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi/ /'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste/ /cho ga zhib mo'i pad+ma lags/ /pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar/ /
mdzub mos mkhyud la gung mo ni/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /rgya mtsho'i klong gi kha lta bur/ /rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /'di
ni las kun bgyid pa'o/ /grub pa kun gyi bla na med/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bong gnyis/ /lcags sgrog lhag ma bskums nas pad+ma'i tshul/ /snying ga'i gnas su
bzhag pa mgrin sngon gyi/ /'di ni dogs med las kun phyag rgya lags/ /lag gnyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te/ /g.yas g.yon du ni bzhag nas su/ /kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du
gzhag /byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyi ba ni/ /zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste/ /de bzhin du kun gyis mi thub pa'o/ /mthe bong mnyam par mnyam bgyis la/ /sor mo'i rtse mo
bskums pa dang / /mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul/ /rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya lags/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum/ /g.yon pa brkyang
ba dbang chen gyi/ /phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms/ /lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni/ /lag pa gnyis po brkyangs nas kyang / /snying gar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /'di
@#/ /ni rgyun du gshin rje lags/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyangs nas su/ /sor mo bsgreng ba'i thor to dgug /g.yas pa snying gar bzhag nas su/ /mthe
bong dang ni mthe chung dgug /lhag ma rnams ni brkyangs bgyis te/ /'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste/ /klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so/ /lag pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis
la| |sor mo phying ga log tu sbrel/ g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dag /snying ga'i gnas su gzhag bgyi ste/ /phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi/ /gnod sbyin thams cad skrag
par bgyid/ /lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang / /mthe bong mdzub mo bkug bgyis la/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyangs nas su/ /mdzub mo gyen du bsgrengs ba ni/ /'di ni
tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi/ /mthe chung sor mo bkug bgyis te/ /drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /lha
rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o/ /lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la/ /blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste/ /lha min thams cad 'gugs pa yi/ /khyab 'jug phyag rgya
'di zhes gsungs/ /g.yas pa bI dza pU rar bgyi/ /g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi/ /mthe bong mthe chung bskums pa ni/ /'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa/ /'di ni
drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs/ /g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas su/ /mdzub mo brkyangs nas g.yon pa ni/ /dkur brten khu tshur bcings nas gzhag /sor mo rnams ni
brkyang bar bgyi/ /drag po rgyun du lta bgyid pa/ /de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi/ /gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs/ /gyen du lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas/ /sor mo gsum ni
brkyangs bgyis te/ /mthe bong mdzub mo bkug pa ni/ /'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa/ /'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo gsum/ /bkug nas sor mo
gnyis gnyis brkyang / /skar ma'i tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa/ /'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs/ /gsang sngags chen po phyag rgya 'di dag ni/ /las dang don kun grub pa sgrub
par bgyid/ /sdig pa thams cad spong zhing nyon mongs kun/ /nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byang / /las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i/ /las sgrub

don yod grub pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM pad+ma tA re tA ra ya pad+ma b+hu dze hUM/ oM ma hA pad+me shwa raM ge hu ru hu ru swA hA/ oM b+h+ri ku Ti pad+me ta ra ta ra hUM/ oM pad+me pAN+Da ra bA si ni kuN+Da

kuN+Da swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba ra de sid+d+hi sid+d+h+ya n+tu hUM/ oM sarba tra ga mi ni a b+ha ya ro dri Ni hUM/ oM a mo g+ha na tA re tA re ya pad+me b+hu dze hUM/ oM dA ru la ru la pad+me a mo g+ha hUM/ oM
@#/ /ba Da ba mu khe ni krin+ta ya duSh+Ta hUM/ oM pad+me nI la kraN+The shwa ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru hUM/ oM so mya ba da ne pra si ta shU sa ya hUM/ oM pad+me shwa ra si d+ha ya hUM/ oM
a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM sa ma ri ta re ta re hUM/ oM nA ga pad+ma ni hUM/ oM yak+Sha d+hi pa ti mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM a mo g+he brah+ma ra te hUM/ oM shi ri bar de a mo g+ha b+hu dze hUM/ oM a

mo g+ha rA dza pad+ma nA b+he/ sa ra sa ra sa man+ta b+hu dze swA hA/ oM ra dra ru Ti mi li mi li swA hA/ oM shak+ti d+ha re a mo g+ha pa ti swA hA/ oM sa ha sra ki ra Ne hUM ru hi swA hA/ oM so ma pra
b+he hUM| de bzhin phyag rgya gsang ba yang / /phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags s+tha dad sgrub/ /gsang sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las/ /rtag tu kun gyis mdor na
thams cad bgyid/ /gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang ma dag /legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas/ /dri zhim dri yis dpung pa dang / /lag pa yan lag byugs nas su/ /
phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na/ /gsang sngags lan re bzla bar bgyi/ /phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang / /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni/ /brgya stong phrag ni
'bum phrag 'bum/ /phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad
kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig thams cad
la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma
mchis par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin par mdzad pa rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /
rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dgra dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /
rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong
bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur
@#/ /nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /
nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /skyon gyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /legs par dran zhing lus shin tu yongs su
dag par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag
thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig ces shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par
'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro/ /ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du skye bar
mi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de na/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par bgyid/ /khru gang kho na'i tshad dag gi /dkyil 'khor lham pa bri bar
bgyi| |gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis/ /dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las grol ba dang / /de nyid dag ni 'grub 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du gang gis go cha yis//
rtag tu cho ga bgos par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i ni 'bar ba dang / /mdzes pa rtag tu stsol par 'gyur/ /cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste/ /gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub/ /
phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun kyang / /'jig par 'gyur te som nyi med/ /gnod pa kun las
grol 'gyur te/ /nad kun las kyang de bzhin no/ /pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam/ /mi thub pa yi dgra kun las/ /rtag tu legs par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu gdon las
srung ba dang / /dus kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang rnams bde bgyi'i phyir/ /de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing / /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /
phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag /dgos pa kun gyi rjes mthun par/ /gang dang gang du bkod pa dag /de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /pad+ma kha bye zhes bgyi ba/ /pad+ma 'dab mas
mdzes pa dang / /kun nas 'khor bar 'bar ba'i phreng / /rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi/ /phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung / /'di dag thams cad 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje rtse gsum
@#/ /rdo rje'i mda'/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang / /pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan/ /pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis/ /rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid/ /pad+ma'i
khu tshur de bzhin du/ /pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma bsgyings/ /pad+ma'i lcags kyu thal mo sbyar/ /pad+ma'i lcags sgrog pad+ma'i gzeb /rtag tu pad+ma sems dpa' dang / /nor bu pad+ma
rdo rjer gsungs/ /don yod pad+ma de bzhin du/ /pad+ma'i ral gri pad+ma'i dril/ /rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang / /nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug /de bzhin zhags
pa gtun shing dang / /chu srin 'dzin dung 'khor lo byed/ /bI dza pU ra se'u 'bru/ /zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang / /thob 'dzin dang tshems shing dang / /me tog phur ma bgrang
phreng dang / /rdo rje rtse lnga don yod zhags/ /don yod grub pa de dag ste/ /thams cad pad+ma'i steng du dgod/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba/ /gang dang gang du dgod pa ni/ /lag
pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham/ /'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi/ /kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyis klubs par bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni/ /ra
ba'am rtsig par bgyis pa'am/ /ci yang rung ba de dag ste/ /de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /rtag tu sdig pa thams cad spong / /mnar med
gnas su gtogs pa dang / /mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid de/ /thams cad skad cig tsam gyis 'byang / /sems can dag pa dran bgyid na/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sems
dpa' sa bcur rab tu gnas/ /'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas/ /gang lags dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin ni/ /rgyun du spyi bo lag na thogs//
gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/ /rgyun du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang / /rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba yis/ /de dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags/ /gsang sngags sum cu rtsa
lnga'i tshig /rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub/ /de ni dus rnams kun tu yang / /ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro /rnam grol dkyil 'khor rab myur bar/ /myur du sangs
rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /'od dpag med kyi sras po yi/ /thu bor 'gyur bar som nyid med/ /'jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas/ /skyes sras rtag tu thu bor 'gyur/ /'dren pas
'di ni chos nyid dang / /chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi sug par
@#/ /phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na/ phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhing che ba mchis par bsgrags so/ /de la
gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha maM dza li mi li mi li tsi li hUM/ oM a shwA sa yak+Sha Na bi ga te hUM/ oM a b+ha ya ba re de Di hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te d+hi ri d+hi ri hUM/
oM pad+ma hr-i da ya muSh+Ti hUM/ oM bi sa ra bi sa ra sarba mA lAn+ta rA dza ya hUM/ oM badzrim+b+ha hu ru hu ru hUM/ oM a ku sha a mo g+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM ka pa tsa ma tu ru tu ru hUM/ oM a

mo g+ha shaM ka li mi li hUM/ oM a mo g+ha tsi na tA ma Ni tu ti tu ri hUM/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni tsi li tsi li hUM/ oM badzra tu Ti tsi li hUM/ oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya tsa ra tsa ra shud+d+ha satwa hUM/ oM
