g+ho Sha ba ti tsi Ti tsi Ti hUM/ oM bid+ya khad ga tsin+tA ya sha trUM hUM/ oM tri ma la pa ri shud+d+he b+hi Ti b+hi Ti hUM/ oM su ru su ru hUM/ oM ma Ni ma Ni hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti dza ye hUM/ oM bo d+hi

tsiT+Ta pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM pad+ma pA sha bi shud+d+he hUM/ oM badzre ba she b+ha ba tu mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM tsin+ta ma Ni ba sha ba ra de hUM/ oM tsakra pA sha swa ni ra g+ha ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM/ oM

tri shu lI pA sha bi lo ka tA ra ya hUM/ oM nA ga pA sha ban+d+ha ya kaD+D+ha ya duSh+Tan ga na bA sha pA ta ya hUM/ oM dza lot+b+ha ba d+ha rA ya hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra bi ma le bi sho d+ha ya an+d+ha kA ra rash+mi

ba re hUM/ oM shrI bo d+ha ya hUM/ oM bi dza ya pur+Na ba re hUM/ oM pha lod b+he be tu re hUM/ oM pUr+Na maN+Da le dza ya hUM/ oM sa ha sra rash+mi ki ra Ne hUM/ oM sarba duSh+Tan pra ha ra shA sA ya hUM/ oM

ma na bi sho d+ha ya mA lA bi ma le hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti su gan+d+ha ba re hUM/ oM pA sha sa ha sra gu Ni te k+Sha Na k+Sha Na hUM/ oM badzrod k+She pa su tsi mu kha tsi Ti tsi Ti hUM/ oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta pA
sha ha ste hUM/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+d+ha sid+d+h+ya sA d+ha ya hUM/ lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dag/ /de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dang /lhan cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni/ /phyag rgya mthong
ba kho nas kyang / /sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub/ /don yod zhags pa rnam grol ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor
dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni/ nor bu rin po che dang / me tog dang / pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / bgrang phreng ba dang / dung
dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug tho dang / mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / mtshon shak+ti dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa dang /
rtse gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang / be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse
@#/ /gsum dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / byi ru dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yu ba sbom
po pan dang / lag pa dang / gtsug phud dang / nor bu sgron ma dang / 'od dang / 'od zer dang / gtun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug ma dang / dgra sta dang / snod zlum po dang / bum
pa dang / brag dang / ri dang / lhun po dang / sbrul 'khyil pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srun dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / rig sngags
kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ral gri dang / gri dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mu sun di dang /
mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi dang / mche ba bzhi dang / zlum po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / pad+ma'i dung
dang / urda dang / gos dang / seng+ge'i gdong dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la ping+ka dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gdong
bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtse gsum dang / bum pa gang ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / pad+ma bzhin dang / pad+ma gsum
dang / rgya mtsho dang / me tog dang / phur ma dang / glegs bam dang / ri dwags kyi g.yang gzhi dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang /
mkhar gsil dang / so mang dang / kha khyer dang / ska rags dang / gtsug phud dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / phreng ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje sde dang / phyag rgya
mtshon cha 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin/ /rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di/ /don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran/ /ras sam gos sam rtsig pa'am//
ci yang rung ba 'dri bgyid pas/ /dogs med legs gsal legs 'byor pas/ /tshon gsal kun tu pad+mar gzhag /phyag rgyu kun nas 'bar bar bgyi/ /thams cad srog las
byung bas ni/ don dang las rnams kun stsol cing / /phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog /de ni mod la 'bras bu ste/ /'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis
brlabs/ /sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi/ /rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs/ /de lta bas na mkhas pas su/ /rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcangs na/ /sangs rgyas rnams
ni dgyes 'gyur te/ /sras kyi thu bor som nyi med/ /phyag rgya rim byed dam pa 'chang ba gang / /'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi thu bor 'gyur/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang
@#/ /ba yi| |rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na med/ /phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag /'di 'chang ba la myur du grub par 'gyur/ /de nas don yod pa
las thams cad pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste/ de nyid grub pas ji lta bu'i/ /cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin/ /so so so sor 'tsham pa yi/ /de
dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi/ /de nyid grub pa'i ji lta bu'i/ /mtshan nyid gzugs ni ji bzhin pa/ /de nyid bsgrubs pa zhags pa ni/ /skud pa lnga las 'grub 'gyur te/ /gsang
sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te som nyi med/ /ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang / /arga kha che dar dag gi /skud pa shun pa'i skud pa ste/ /skud pa 'di dag bkal
nas de kho na nyid kyi chog dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pa ras skud kyi rgyu las blangs te tshad bzhin bkal nas rtag tu smyung ba bgyis la legs par bkrus pa gos
gtsang ma can tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan
pas dran par bgyi'o/ /de nas shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas brgyad sgril du bkal te don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar pas pad+ma kha phye ba thogs pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis
bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lus phyed pa sor bzhi ba'i tshad du bgyi'o/ /bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/ des pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer
gyi bzhin dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ dngul lam gser las bgyi'o/ /de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa
dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga'am/ chos brgyad la legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma
bgos nas zhag gcig mchis te skyil mo krung bcas nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te tshig gzhan mi smra bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhags pa gzhag par bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur
bar bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o/ /a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru
ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ /mar me yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa'i
@#/ /steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la yang ci 'byor bas mchod par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags
'chang gis zhags pa de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te ma 'khrugs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod
re re bgyis te zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing stong rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du gdugs re re mchis par bgyi ste rngo ci thogs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /
mchod bar bgyi'o/ /kha zas ngan pa spang bar bgyi'o/ /lhag ma dang sbags pa spang bar bgyi'o/ /gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar
bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni/ me'i kha dog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur
ro| |don yod pa'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub
kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di grub kyi/ /khyod kyi byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa khug cig /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongs su gtogs pa yongs su
rdzogs par gyis shig /'on te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bus bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yid la bsam zhing smon pa
bzhin lag pas 'phangs na/ gsang sngags kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid de/ thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de logs su don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te mod la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa'am/ /mnar med par mchi ba'i zhig na
yang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / /mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchi bar 'gyur zhing /
ji srid 'cho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod
par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas
@#/ /'phang bar bgyi'o/ /'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par
'gyur ro/ /gal te 'tshal na/ lo'am/ lo brgya'am/ stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/ /nam byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed nas
de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ phyir bkrol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung gi nang du 'phangs na/ dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/ /
g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs na/ mtshon cha dang / go mtshon dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / mu si ni da dang / 'khor lo dang /
thag mdung dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lad thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro/ /chab dang / yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis
te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor bas mchod par bgyi'o/ /gang gi don du bsam pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ /'on te mi snang ba sgrub par 'tshal na/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te g.yas pa dang g.yon pas
gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan
gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag
'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lo bye ba bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non
pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /char pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na/ ji tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char chas pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa
bgyis na/ char pa bkag par 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas rig sngags
'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la lag pas zhags pa blangs te gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang /
zhags pa bcings te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phangs na/ de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa
@#/ /dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs
pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen po dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char che ba dang / dus
ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag chad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po
bcings pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur pas don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi/
gsol bar yang bgyi'o/ /mchod pa dang / gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang / so ma nyi bskyed par mi
bgyi'o/ /cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsum pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyis cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas skad cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub par
'gyur ro/ /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o/ /
mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu byang
chub dgug par bgyi'o/ /de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi
mchog phug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / thang la rgyu ba
dang / nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / rgyu skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / ri
la rgyu ba dang / 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa tshegs
@#/ /chung ngu dang / rtsol ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang / som nyi bskyed par mi bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas
legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ gtsang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ /
byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas brtsams te zla ba nya ba'i bar du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa
la dus gsum du ci 'byor ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi/ /dus gsum rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi/ /nyin par dus gsum lan
gsum ste/ /mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi/ /'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'di/ /skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste/ /ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang / /arga'i skud pa
gsum 'gyur du/ /de ni legs par tshad bzhin du/ /khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bgyi/ /'khor lo rnam pa gsum las bgyi/ /rgyar ni sor bzhi'i chad lags te/ snying por bcas
shing mu khyud bcas/ /kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag /gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi/ /chos bstan legs par brgyan pa yi/ /bzang po'i stan la gzhag par
bgyi| |spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi /sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod/ /de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan bshams par
bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste mchod pa bgyis la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas tshes bco
lnga'i zla ba nya ba la nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi zhing bdug
pa rnam pa gsum po a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang
nas zhags pa 'bar zhing 'khor lo nam mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi stod dang / spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /ri mo'i gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'khor la zhags
@#/ /pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po bgyis la don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa
brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing / g.yas
pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo'i tshul la brten nas blangs te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i
rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor
ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /dam pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong
rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis ci bka' stsal pa
de bgyi'o zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bran gyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gi
gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par gyur pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar bgyi'o/ /phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan
gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o/ /zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad phye
bar 'gyur ro/ /'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / phug dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / gseg ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam mi bde ba thams cad
bsal ba dang / bcom pa dang / bshig par 'gyur ro/ /gtan pa dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / lcags sgrog rnams dum bu dum bur chad cing gyes par 'gyur/
nyams par 'gyur/ /'jig par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor ba rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar
'gyur ro/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ /rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur
ro| |me tog sna tshogs kyi ra ba shin tu dri zhim pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i
@#/ /tshul mngon sum du bgyis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas
gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba dang / g.yo ba dang / ldeg pa dang / 'ur 'ur chem chem ste/ lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig
sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman bud med kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis
klubs pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba/ bI dza pU ra thogs pa mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de
mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thams cad dang / stobs thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor
lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid nyams par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
bud med de dgod pa dang / oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bzla bar bgyi ste/ kha bub tu 'gyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chab de la reg par mi
bgyi'o/ /don yod rgyal po bzla bar bgyi ste/ de nas mig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na/ rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bzhu bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab
'byung ste/ blang bar bgyi/ /byug par bgyi'o/ /kun tu byugs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyur ro/ /mig la byug na/
phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang
dang / gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes la 'tsho ba dag ji ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang dag da ltar byung ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod
rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la kun nas byugs
te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis pags pa'i mdog lha'i gser dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /skra sngo la cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro/ /mig lha'i ut+pa la sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyur
@#/ /ro| |tshe lha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor
bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor
bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yid la bsam pa dang / yid la brnag pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i btung ba chen
po bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par bgyid do/ /
dgra thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / gtubs pa dang / gsheg pa dang / brtsal ba dang / gyes pa dang / phye mar
bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /yang na sman gyi bud med de'i skra kun bton te ska rags su bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gang du bcing pa de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro/ /
gang du zhugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/ /klu thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / mi'am ci
thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar
'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing slar yang ldog par 'tshal na/ sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/ /reg par mi bgyi bar lag pa'i
phyag rgya gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na
sdod par 'gyur te/ kha cig gi lag na ni/ bum pa gang ba'o/ /kha cig ni/ lag na gdugs so/ /kha cig gi lag na ni/ lha'i gos thogs so/ /kha cig ni /lha'i nor bu rin po
che thogs so/ /kha cig ni/ dri dag go/ /kha cig ni/ me tog dag go /kha cig ni/ phreng ba dag go /kha cig ni/ rgyan dang lhab lhub sna tshogs thogs so/ /kha cig ni/ byug pa
dag go/ /kha cig ni/ dri'i phye ma dag go /kha cig ni/ spos chu'i rin po che sna bdun gyi snod bkang ba dag go/ /kha cig ni/ lha'i 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dag go /kha cig ni/
lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ga dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog
@#/ /mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / bar shi ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa
dang / sna ma dang / yu ti ka dang / klu'i me tog dang / kon+ta dang / gan+d+ha bar shi ka'i me tog dag thogs so/ /kha cig ni/ lha'i tsan+dan go shiR+Sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po'i bdug
pa dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug pa thogs so/ /kha cig gi lag na ni/ rma bya'i bsil yab thogs so/ /kha cig gi lag pa na ni/ ral
gro'i| |kha cig gi lag pa na ni/ mdung thung ngo / /kha cig gi lag pa na ni/ rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mnga' bo che dang / mdung dang / gtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa
dang / gzod kha gnyis pa dag go/ /kha cig ni/ go cha dang / ya lad bgos nas bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas 'du zhing mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni/ rin po che sna tshogs
kyi snod dang / gser gyi snod dang / dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis bkang nas
thogs so/ /de dag thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs
rgyas yid la bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyi'o/ /mchog tu brtse ba yid la bgyid pas tshig
gzhan mi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing lam drang po nas 'jug par bgyi ste/ seng+ge'i khri la mngon du mchis nas don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa thog mar seng+ge'i
khri'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal bo/ /bam po bzhi pa/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas steng
du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o/ /des dgra thams cad pham
bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'og tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis na/ de nas 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags
'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan
pa dag 'dun par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen po nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do/ /
@#/ /dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi char dang / gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi me tog
dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / lha'i me tog bkra ba sna tshogs kyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du bdud rtsi'i
bcud 'tshal te mchis nas 'bul bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
reg par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas bags pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /skra lhag par sngo ba dang /
mig ut+pa la sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal ba 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro/ /gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na/ de'i
bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal ba blangs te lha'i chab tsan+dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo
rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / /ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /ji
ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/ /gang du bcud
kyis len mchog 'dis reg na/ 'dzam bu chu bo gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rtsig pa'am/ /ri 'am/ ka ba'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa'am/ /rdza bo'am gos
sam/ bong ba la reg na/ de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo'am/ lha mo'am/
mi'am ci mo 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang de gos gtsang ma bgos nas legs par khrus bgyi'o/ /tshe brgyad dam/ /bcu bzhi'am/ /bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o/ /'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa'i stan
bzang po'i steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas bzlas brjod
bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongs su 'khyil la 'khor t+lo'i gdengs ka'i tshul du
@#/ /mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu gnas pa'i mtsho'am/ mi 'am ci gnas pa'i mtsho'am/ lha mo gnas
pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang par bgyi'o/ /'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang dran par bgyi
ste| ji lta bu'i don yid la bsam pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsam pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i nor
ram/ dbyig gam/ gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUR+ya'am/ shang+ka shi la'am/ byi ru'am/ sa le sbram mam/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgyan
nam/ gzhan yang gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor ba can dag don du gnyer na/ zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi ste/ de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do/ /gang dang gang du
'phangs pa de dang der ji ltar yid la bsam pa de nyid shin tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram
ze'i rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ rje'u rigs kyis ci dang ci bsam pa 'grub par bgyid do/ /skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'i ming nas brjod
de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro/ /tha na ri dwags dang / bya dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he yang 'dren par
bgyid do/ /gang gi mid nas brjod de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na/ de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te ji ltar yid la bsam pa de bzhin du thams cad 'grub
par bgyid do/ /zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du
zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' las babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du
mchis te ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/ /'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas
blangs te don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang / rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i stan la ji srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing
slar bde ba dang / ma snad pa dang / ma smas pa dang / legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nags khung du 'jug par 'tshal na/ gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang
@#/ /bgo bar bgyi zhing nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa
tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams cad bcings nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang
la phyag bgyis nas rig sngags 'chang / khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
snying po bzlas te lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o/ /zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam par drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dbus kyi
nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dwangs shing rnyog pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan+dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/ ha cang mi grang ba/ ha cang
mi dro ba/ reg na bde ba/ ro dang ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas lha'i
me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba thogs to rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzum pa dang bcas
pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rig sngags 'chang / khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig /rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi
ste| 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub ste/ bdag nyid kyi ma dang / sring mo dang / mngag gzhug ma zhes gar bde bar
brjod la de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo/ kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o/ /de yang rig sngags 'chang / /khyod rang
gi gnas su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying
po bzlas so/ /de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / gser dang / gos dbyangs pa dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu
dpyangs par gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar
@#/ /bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te stan du bting la nor bu rin po che
chen po de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o/ /bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pa nor bu
rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /nor bu rin po che chen po de las kyang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab de las blangs
la skyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o/ /'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /don yod snang ba
nor bu gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
lam thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bur rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur shing / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i
bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste nga'i rig
sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs/ /
khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste/ /sgrol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na/ de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te/ blangs
la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o/ /oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas
mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /sgra cung zad
'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur
ro| |tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga slong na/ de'i tshe 'di lta
@#/ /bur 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi skra 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral pa bton nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul pa
na skra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkug nas srad bu la nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te mgo la btags pas ni/ ji ltar yid la bsam pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston
par 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/ /mgul du btags pas ni/ mi gda'
bar gyur nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur
ro| |dpral ba la btags pas ni/ lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ glang po che bcu'i stobs dang
ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yon
pa la btags pas ni/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing
bdag gi nor du 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo
'khor dang bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du
gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang / gcan gzan dang / ri dwags dang / gdug pa dang / gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i
srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bral g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ tshal lam/ /ser ka'am/ ri 'or ram/ phug ga ma/ dgon pa'am/ /bsti gnas
gang du zhugs te zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /byin pa g.yas pa
dang / rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na/ chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
byin pa g.yon pa la btags bas ni/ nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /brla g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod
@#/ /chen por zhugs na/ dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang
gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang ba bzung zhing lag pa g.yas pas bud med de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu
'jug par bgyi'o/ /gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing me tog gis chal bar bkram pa bgyi ste/ rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o/ /bkrus shing lag
pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis
yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por
'gyur ro/ /gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni/ bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras dang / 'bras dang / gos dang / chos dang / nor bu dang /
mu tig dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su grub par bgyid do/ /srong mo zhes bgyi bas ni/ dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing yan
lag spong bar bgyid do/ /nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur/ /lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ /lha'i khyim
dang / gzhal med khang stob par bgyid do/ /mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni/ gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas
sam/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsam pa bzhin du bgyid
do/ /nags sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs
su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug /ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor
lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar
'gyur| khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du 'greng ba/
@#/ /mgo 'bar ba/ mig dmar ba dang / mchu dang lce dmar ba/ sen mo dmar ba/ skra sngo ba/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus pa 'phyangs po mchod phyir
thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/ sprul ltar lce sgyur ba/ stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag na dgra sta dang / dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur
lta bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste/ brtan par bgyi la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo bcad la khrag mang
du byung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o/ /byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid lus mi chod pa dang / mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin
gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /mig gnyis phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na/ lha'i mig tu 'gyur ro/ /rkang brus te byugs na/ tshe bskal pa bcur 'gyur zhing
thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtshor 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /snying phyung ste 'tshal na/ nam mkha' la mchi'o/ /khrag
gis snying gar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /lce bcad na/ ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad bklag par bgyid do/ /gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe
khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /'khor los zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la brdab par bgyi ste/ lan
gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur te/ zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan
thams cad bgyid pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na/ gyen du bltas nas don yod rgyal
po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing nam
mkha' go 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/ lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul nas bcing bar bgyi zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan
stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lha bcings pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na/ lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang / ci zhig don du gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o/ /zhes brjod
@#/ /par bgyi'o/ /gal te gzhan bsam pa zhig mchis na/ mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu
'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tshal bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen por longs spyod par 'gyur zhing / 'on te mi 'tshal na/
lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang / yid la bsam pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad
grub par 'gyur te/ de la som nyi dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /'khor lo'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang pad+ma'i zhags pa
sgrub par 'tshal pas rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /nub gsum mchis sam/ nub lnga mchis sam/ nub gcig
mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ ras kyi skud pa'am pad+ma'i skud pa bai DUR+ya'i kha dog lta bur tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing
khru nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te/ de la yang pad+ma bgyis te rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma kha phye ba sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis pad+ma gser gyi 'dab ma dang / dngul gyi 'dab ma
dang / bai DUR+ya dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / rin po che ka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste/ de nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o/ /zhags pa'i thor to gcig
la ni/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o/ /de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos kyi stan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o/ /ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la dkyil 'khor gyi steng
du dri'i pad+ma bsam par bgyi zhing dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa gad bas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing a ga ru dang / tsan+dan
dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ /mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o/ /pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re
nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ /zhags
pa de la yang mchod par bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
@#/ /te nyin mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang / mchod pa bgyi'o/ /de nas pad+ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzum zhing bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la bsgom par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du bltas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag
nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad
ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang / nga'i bu snying las skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod
pa'i mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang / grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis pad+ma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyi/ ji
ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig /khyod yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni/ yongs su rdzogs par bya'i/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni/ grol/ khyod skye ba
dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na/ khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni/ yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad
pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni/ yongs su thar/ 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rig sngags 'chang / khyod byang
chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i snyed kyi bye ma dang
mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni/ ldan/ rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni/
byas| khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni/ lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni/ grol gyi/ ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog
khyer cig /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te gnas
@#/ /gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ /nam dgos pa de'i zhags pa blang par bgyid de/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma ni/ 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g.yon par bzhag la lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sems
can nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis nas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur
ro| |de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos
pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o/ /zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni/ rang gi mgul du btags la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas
brjod bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor
phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung ston par mdzad/ yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang / sdig pa che rabs
stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur/ lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang / ser
sna spangs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur
ro| |mchod par 'os pa dang / bla ma'i gnas su yang 'gyur ro/ /nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug mdun na mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do/ /de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'dor bar
'gyur ro/ /bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal pa mnyam pa bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras
@#/ /pa'i lus pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar ton du bgyis nas sa bcu la
gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen po la lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
gzhal med khang dang / gnas mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mchi bar
'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gis gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs
sam| gnas sam/ khang pa'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor gyi khyams sam/ 'chag sa'am/ khang pa brtsegs ma'am/ spyil po gtsang ma phyi bdar legs par
bgyis pa'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi 'byes pa khru gang ba'am/ khru do ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ grwa kun nas cha mdzes pa/ sa dang sbyar ba'i
lci bas shin tu legs par phyi bdar bgyis la rtswa sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi
dbus kyi snying po la pad+ma rgya chen pos 'byes pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa/ tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing 'byes par bgyis la/ snying po ni/ rin po che ka ti ka las
bgyi'o| |pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la gra bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o/ /pad+ma'i bar gyi zur zur du ut+pa la sngon po legs par
bris la| kha khyer gyi phyi rol du nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la chab la
me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa/ bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha' ba/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la ping+ka dang / bya'i
tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do/ /mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang / me tog
gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang / thal mo'i phyag rgya bris la sgo bzhi
@#/ /rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o/ /de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i gdan bzang po bshams te de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od
dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob gzhag par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /me tog
sil ma dang / dri dang / byug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o/ /yon chab dang
zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / mar me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o/ /pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos
gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /legs par khrus bgyis nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas
la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o/ /snying
rje mchog tu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyis na/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ ji tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag
med 'bar bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor chen po de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags
'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser spungs pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing yid kyi
brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mi gda' bar gyur pa dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnyid thob nas ji ltar nyal ba tsam
mam mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / 'jig rten dang / yul ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha'
dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /
@#/ /'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur
te| skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung na/ nam mkha' la 'phur
bar 'gyur ro/ /lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa grub pa rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor khri brgyad stong
dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ shing shun dang / ras skud dang /
kha che dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/ tsan+dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po
la sogs pa'i mgo dang / sbrul gyi ska rags bcings la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o//
de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /legs par khrus bgyi'o/ /ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/ /rtswa'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs
gyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pa zhags pas mnan nas don yod pa'i snying po khri bzla'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po stong bzla'o/ /de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de
bzung nas nam mkha' la 'gyur par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams
cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang / mthu dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje dang 'dra
bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro/ /lha'i lo khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par
bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsam pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas 'gugs par bgyid do/ /phyogs bcur 'phangs te khro bo'i
rgyal po bzlas nas skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyi ste/ som nyi mi bgyi'o/ /gal
te lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ 'byung po'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad
@#/ /zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyid de/ som nyi mi bgyi'o/ /zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
bgyis te mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phangs par bgyi'o/ /'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang /
gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis
te bran bzhin du las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod bgyis te lag pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na/ mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur ro/ /phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo
rje'i zhags pas brdabs na/ phug thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing / 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyur ro/ /lam ngan pa dang /
mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang / dbugs gdug pa dang / srog chags go na sa dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su
gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /mi drang po dang / lam drang por ji ltar rang gi gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos
pa thams cad bsgrubs te slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje zhags pa las thams cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang
nor bu'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor bu btsal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje'am/ bai DUR+ya 'am/ shel rang byung ngam/ margad dam/ in+d+ra nI la sor mo'i
tshigs lhag tsam shin tu phyis la shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gis dkris pa/ ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me
tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsi mdzes pas kha bsgyur ba/ shin tu tshang la bab par bkal pa/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i tshad
tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la thor to gcig shos su ni/ nor bu'am gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos
gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /legs par bkrus nas ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang
@#/ /ldan pa bgyis la grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing / bog phor gyi snod bshams nas a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru ka'i
bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o//
me tog sil ma dang / dri dang / rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /btung ba ngan pa dang /
kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / spags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri tshig stong bzlas nas
lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no/ /lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po
lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te yungs kar re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang
mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bco lnga'i nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas mchod pa cher bgyi ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci
yang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po las nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas skyil mo krung bcas te
mchis nas nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas gdeg par bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang sa
cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nor bu'i zhags pa de yang
'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas las nor bu'i zhags pa
blangs pa na sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na
mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od
@#/ /kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba stsol bar
'gyur ro/ /phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhag nas rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/
rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub bo/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod rgur sgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig /yid la
ji ltar bsam pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos shig /rig sngags 'chang / khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
song zhig /'on te bde ba can lta bur 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i
sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang /
ba dan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor
bgyis la me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don
yod yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di lta bu'i yid la bgyid pa chen po 'di lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang
bsam nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu
@#/ /brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po lnga pa/
dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang /
'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros chen po shA radwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa tshogs dang
bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon
mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
lo| |tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad+ma tsan+d+ra ma Ni ma N-i/ /a mo g+ha ma Ni su ma N-i/ ma hA ma N-i/ sarba ta thA ga ta a laM kA ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra sany+tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa ra shwa ra

ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ phra ba ra ma hA bo d+hi satwa pad+ma d+ha ra pad+ma sa na pad+ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ pad+ma gau ra/ pad+ma a laM kri ta ta nu/ sa ha sra

b+hu dza sa ha sra ne tre nA nAd b+hu ta/ pra ba rA+e NA/ mu dra bi b+hu Shi tA sa ha sra b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/ sha ta sa ha sra rash+mi pra ti maN+Di ta shA rA ri/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Na d+ha ra/ ma N-i ka

na ka /badzra bai DUR+ya/ ma ra ki ta/ in+d+ra nI la pad+ma rA ga b+hu Shi tA shA rI ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi tsi tra/ tsa ra NA/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pra h+ma/ biSh+tu ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ lo ke

shwa ra| ya man+te shwa ra/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ ri Shi ga Na/ ku mA ra/ se nA pa ti bo shA d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA b+hu ta ba shA d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She k+ta sa ma

ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga wan/ pU ra ya ma A tA shAn+ta ta ra ya pU ra shA ya ya satwa na/ ta ra dza ya duSh+Ta/ bA ta ya big+h+nan/ mA ra ya tri dwa sha mA laM/ sa ra sa ra pA paM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT

phaT/ sid+h+ya sid+h+ya/ ma hA tsi n+tA ma Ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi pU la sid+d+hi/ ma ma tri b+hu ba ni de byA pra yats+tsha/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM
@#/ /bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti pA sha d+ha ra/ a na n+ta bi kurbA na/ rid+d+hi san+d+ha R+Sha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ga ga ne bi pu la bi mA na/ san+d+ha ri Shi

ka /na mo stu te bi bu la pu N+ya/ ko Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM hUM/ a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tu mAM/ pi pu la kI rti ka re swAhA/ b+hu ba swAhA/ b+hu r+b+hu ba swAhA/ a mo g+ha bi pu le swAhA/ ma hA tsin+ta

ma Ni sid+d+he swAhA/ ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni sid+d+he ba ra de swAhA/ sarba sid+d+he ba ra de swAhA/ oM bi pu le shwa ra/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid+d+he hUM phaT swAhA/ don yod nor
bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na/
nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams
bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor
dang / gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char gyi sprin
chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de
bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur
zhing mchod pa'i char chen po yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsam pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur
ro| |'on te mi 'tshal na/ nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i
'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe pa skal pa chen po brgya stong
phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /'on te babs na/ lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang / gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /
'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /sems
@#/ /can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu
srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de
bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang /
lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad
pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung
po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /
lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams
cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang / chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba'am/ nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des
legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas ci 'byor bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la
bgyi'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyi snying po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ /yid la
bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos
dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob dang / rin po che'i
ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon shing dang / dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs
@#/ /bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsam zhing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil
'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma
mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum du bzla bar bgyi'o/ /des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim gro bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po
dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyi rig
sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid stsol bar mdzad do/ /nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag
tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /
nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rims kyis ma lags/ dug gis ma lags/ dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/
chus ma lags te/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma
lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba dang / sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur
@#/ /ro| |dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang
dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/
bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gdugs
par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing smyung ba lan gcig bgyis te bzlas brjod byas
na/ de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur
zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad
kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la sa lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsten pa tsam mam/ cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na/ phyir mi
ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin
gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil
'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /
rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum
pa'i rus pa'am/ gum pa'i sha'am/ gum pa'i ro rul ba'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na/
sems can gang gang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam
som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong pha'am/
@#/ /dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chad bar bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ klog
par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ sgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ 'bri bar bgyid/ 'brir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid bcangs na/ mthong ba'i chos la dge
ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyis
nas mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos grim par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin
nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsam ste bsam pa'i las thams cad bgyis na/ thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa dang / bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par
'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa 'di
de bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te lag pa g.yon
pas lcags kyu blangs na/ mi gda' bar gyur nas gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang /
ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid
par 'gyur ro/ /mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub
pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /gtsang ma'i gnas sam
phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ /me tog sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gang
@#/ /bas brgyan cing spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i bdug pa gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan
bzang po bshams te shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o/ /dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de
nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /
de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i 'og tu tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi
ste/ zhags pa dang / de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba'am/ lha gda' ba'am/
klu gda' ba'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gda' ba'am/ 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba'am/
g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba'am/ tshe nyams pa gda' ba'am/ tshes 'phos pa gda' ba'am/ rgyal srid gda' ba'am/ grong thob pa'am/ yul thob ba'am/
grong khyer thob pa'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shang+ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang /
rgyan gda' ba'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / mig 'phrul smra ba'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ gter smra ba'am/ 'bru smra ba'am/ bud med 'phrog pa'am/ las sgrub pa'am/ gsang sngags
sgrub pa'am/ dbang du bgyi ba'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na gda' bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'am mi dge ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /lo'am/
lo phyed dam/ gnod pa'am/ 'tshe ba'am/ yams sam/ mi ngas sam/ mi ngas chen po'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung dam/
gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ji ltar ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang bsam zhing gang
gnyer ba 'grub pa'am/ mi 'grub pa'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don
yod gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhag na/ ji tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches na/ nam
@#/ /mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma 'char kar nyi ma la bstan na/ nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar
'gyur ro/ /zla ba tshes pa la bstan na/ zla ba babs nas 'dod rgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ /chu klung chen por bstan na/ rin po che rnams 'byung bar
'gyur ro/ /nags khung du bstan na/ sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro/ /ri phug tu bstan na/ sman
thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/ /'bru'i phung po la bstan na/ 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur
ro| |ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan te spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na
mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i mngon sum du bstan na/ yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon po'i
tshogs dang bcas pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shang+ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang /
