dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par
'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na/ ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsam pa bzhin me tog dang /
'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan bsgrengs pa'i rtse mor bzhag ste rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi stang ngam khyams su bzhag
la| 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o/ /don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /lan brgya
rtsa brgyad tshang nas ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /nor bu dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub la sogs pa me tog dang / 'bras bu'i char 'bab
par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan
@#/ /ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus bas par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur
ro| |'jigs pa dang sha 'khon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa nas gcan gzan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sems
can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don yod yid bzhin kyi nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho
ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la/
lag zungs kyi ngos dngul las bgyis te gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o/ /shing shun gyi skud pa dang / a rga'i skud pa dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig tu khru bcu drug byung ba shin
tu tshad la bab par ba kum pa/ sgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas
gos gtsang ma bgos te zhags pa dang / ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste gzung bar bgyi'o/ /khros pa'i gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung
bcas te mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad pa bzla bar bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad
tshar nas ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los bsgyur bar
'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /lo khri brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste khros
pas hUM zhes bgyi bas mnan na/ mi gda' bar gyur nas mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar
'gyur ro/ /tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro/ /'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdug pa thams ca dang /
'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul gyi dbus su lan gcig bskor na/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad gtubs par 'gyur/ /rengs par bgyis
par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing /
@#/ /gnas thams cad stongs par 'gyur ro/ /phug gi sgor bskor na/ 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs thams cad gtubs par 'gyur ro/ /sgo dang / gtan pa
thams cad gtubs par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/ /thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad
ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des skud pa
lnga las bsgrubs te tshon rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du gtubs la bsgrub par shin tu 'os pa las bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me
tog dang / ra sa'i me tog dang / ldong ros dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / nA ga pus pa dang / shing arga'i 'o ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag bsal te dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam
du btags shing / spyi bor legs par sbrus te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sbrul 'khyil ba mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka nas yongs su
'khyil ba gser gyis g.yogs pa legs par sbrel ba ni/ zhags pa'i mchog lags so/ /rig sngags 'chang gi legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma
'gos nas pa'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te dris mchod par bgyi'o/ /me tog gi sil ma dang / bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o/ /ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan
par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su stan bzang po bshams te de'i steng du klu'i zhags pa bskyil nas zhags par bgyi'o/ /sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni/ kha shar
phyogs su ston no/ /dkar gsum gyis gtor ma gzhag par bgyi'o/ /mchod yon zhags bsil dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru
ka rnams bsreg go /'bras yos dang / yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te
rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o/ /thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas tshang ba
dang / khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o/ /sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ /rgyun du sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ /
stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni/ /sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du/ /stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas
@#/ /klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas
nas sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du smra bas
rig sngags 'chang zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzung ste bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o/ /des na rig sngags
'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs dang / gtan pa thams cad gtubs shing bcad par 'gyur ro/ /zhugs pa tsam
gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing klubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la
dbul bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags
pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis zed nas btung bar bgyi ste/ tshe nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi
bdag po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /mthu dang / brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la don yod
rgyal po'i snying po shing kA ra bI ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas bya ba par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsam pas mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /char mi
'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan gcig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /char ha cang che ba'i dus su sbrul
gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag na/ char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /grang ba'i rlung ngam ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang bar sngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir
bskor na/ dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /grang ba'i rlung dang / ser drag thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /lo khyud 'khor tshang bar mtshams
chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin don yong rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs la/ lag
pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyid na/ nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod rgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo stong stong 'tshal ma stsol bar 'gyur
@#/ /ro| |de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung
nas dpyid dam/ ston ka'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te nam mkha' la 'phangs na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog
gang yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa dang / kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la khro bo'i
rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / lhab lhu ba dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags
'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i
steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa bzhag la yungs kar la don
yod rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor
na| rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul
gyi dbus su 'phangs na/ sbrul gdug pa mig bgrad pa/ lce bsgyur ba/ mig me mdag ltar dmar pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi
pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ /de
nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i rtsid pa dang / rtsid pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du
bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus
bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig gis bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs nas
'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi
@#/ /bdag por 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa lag par thogs nas dur khrod du zhugs na/ dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te gnas kyi sgo thams cad
'bye bar 'gyur zhing / /khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ro'i mgul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de
smra bar 'gyur zhing ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bkrol na mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas gnod
sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang / thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid
'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/ las thams
cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ rig sngags
'chang la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mos bsgrub
par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o/ /gal te ma zhig tu bgyid na/ bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gos dang / nor dang /
'brus yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse bas phyi bzhin
'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /thams
cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do/ /nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag
rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do/ /rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas rnam thos mchis nas nyin gcig
bzhin dong tse stong stong stsol bar 'gyur/ /gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa yang stsol/ /bsod nams kyang bgyi'o/ /nag po chen po'i mgul du btags
la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcag gis gdeg par bgyi'o/ /nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba na rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi
@#/ /bgyid par slar yang khros pas gdag par bgyi'o/ /de nas mchi ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma zed de thig le bgyis na/ mi gda' bar
gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang thal mos gdeg bar bgyi ste/ de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyug pa rig sngags 'chang gis
byugs na/ nam mkha' la mchis nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ nag po chen po rang gi gzugs
kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ci 'tshal
ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga
de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i/ /rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi/ /cho 'phrul
sna tshogs gzugs bstan te/ /lag pa stong dang mig stong dang / /mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs/ /khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni/ /gdul
bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to/ /gsang ba 'di yis gzugs bstan pa/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig sngags grub pa bla med pa/ /de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyir ro/ /de
bas rig 'dzin shes rab can/ /'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang / /bde can lta bar 'tshal ba dang / /de nyid
'jig rten 'das pa yis/ /'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal la/ /mchog tu gus par bgyi ba yi/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyi/ /de nyid gus par dad pa dang / /shin tu dang ba nyid du
bgyi| |grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bsten te/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur/ /don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog /don yod grub pa'i 'jig
rten 'das/ /don yod 'bras bu dam pa po/ /don yod kun tu grub pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon/ /'jig rten dbang phyug
mchog sbyin pa/ /don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba/ /mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur/ /don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad/ /de lta bas na kun bsgrims
te| |bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas/ /ji ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin/ /rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs/ /rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing / /zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs
@#/ /dang / /de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang / /rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang / sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang / /khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi
ba dang / /lha dang klu yang ston pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni/ /'byung po lha min dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu/ /
'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan/ /gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni/ /dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang / /zla
gzugs rgyu skar ches grangs dang / /'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan/ /sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas/ /gdul ba'i don du
'gro ba'i lam/ /sems can rnams la bstan pas na/ /de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi/ /mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /ji ltar mthun pa
bzhin du sgrub/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub/ /gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang / /gang du sems ni dga' 'gyur ba/ /gom pa gang gis
phyag rgya dang / /gang gi dkyil 'khor char 'bye ba/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon/ /kun tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso/ /don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po/ /don yod pa yi
grub pa 'thob/ /don yod dgos pa thams cad dang / /grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur/ /zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas
don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi chog bshad par bgyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad
'joms pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad zlog pa'i mchog /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol
bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa ma bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa'i mchog /nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab
pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i
mchog /de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu
rnyed par dka' ba/ lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma
@#/ /mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu
mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa bsrung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags
so| |de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam/ /ca co ma mchis dben par ni/ /zhi
ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi 'o/ /zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi/ don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms/ /rgyas pa rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad
phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba po/ /gdug sems can rnams dred ba dang / /skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul
spyod| |gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste/ /gsang sngags sgrub pa bla na med/ /'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o/ /me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang /
de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa 'ang dgug /khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul/ /pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi/ /cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi/ pad+ma la ni ge sar bgyi/ /gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po
ste| |de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi/ /legs par byugs shing shin tu nag /shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang / /shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi/ /bkra
shis phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi 'o/ /gdug pa me tog la sogs pa/ /bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod/ /thog mar me lha bkug nas ni/ /de nas sbyin
sreg las rnams bgyi/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa/ /legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi/ /de la mtshams kyang bcing
bar bgyi/ /bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang / /gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / /de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang / rgyun du a ka'i shing sbyar te/ /dri yi shing rnams
nyid dag dang / /mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag /nyi shu gcig dbul me ston bgyi/ /de nas me yi lha dgug go /oM na mo ag+ni dz+wA la/ ma hA dz+wA la/ dz+yod snra pra b+ha maN+Da la/ sar+b+ba

bde A hu ti rak+ti ni rata tuSh+Na dz+wA la/ d+hu ma shwa sa/ a tsi ShA mu kha triSh+Na/ ra sh+mid pa ag+ni sh+tsa bi tu taSh+tsa hU ta sha na mu khan te/ sar+b+ba de bA nAM/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha ma hA biR+ya ma hA dza ya/ ma hA bA la/ nir

ma ri shan/ sar+b+ba da ha na pra pu la A ka sha sa mu gad ka sh+tsa a pa pra sad kA shan/ maN+Da la pU dzi to/ ma ni ta sar+b+ba tra di pa bya rU pa bi ShA ra da A bA hA na sar+b+ba ta tra gA na/ de ba hu ta/ sha na

@#/ /hu tra shan+ta ma si bi d+ha ma kan/ an+d+ha kA rAn/ muk+ta ra sh+mi ma pri yaM ku gan+d+ha pha lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra dza/ sUk+Sh+ma su tI k+Sh+Na sh+tsa mr-i ti sa na dzi bi na/ pri yo ba sh+ma

puSh+pa b+hasma pa s+t+ra tsa b+ha smra ba s+t+ra ni/ se ba kaM /b+hasma sany+tsa d+ha ni t+yan+d+hu ma mA ku la/ dza ya se/ ba ka sid+d+ha ra sa d+ha ra sa grA tsa ra sarba tra pra d+ha ba ri shA/ sarba tri ni ra ma ri sha No/ /ni t+ya spriSh+Ta

d+haSh+Ta na mun tsa si/ dwA tring sha b+ha ban de pa ag+ni mu kha de bA ta/ e ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA na ta/ a tha pa ra Na/ /de ba de ba na/ bi shA ra da/ a yAn+tu sA d+ha shi g+h+raM ka ra ma sA d+ha
ya tad twa ta/ a dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru hUM phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du/ /bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi/ /gu gul yungs kar mar
sbyar la| |spar bdun spar bas me la dbul/ /mchod yon snod rnams dbul pa yang / /de bzhin sbar ba'i sbar bas so/ /dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang / /bdug pa rgya chen dbul
bar bgyi/ /de bzhin 'bras bu sbar bar dbul/ /de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi/ /ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du/ /nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /de nas rig sngags
'chang gis su/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang / /blag sha u dum ba ra dang / /sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang / /kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang / pad+ma
ut+pal thang shing dang / /de bzhin dri bda'i tsan+dan dang / /byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang dri bda'i shing / /'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang / /sha mi shi ba'i las
lags pas/ /mchod yon de bzhin rtsa dag ste/ /de dag gis ni me spar nas/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o/ /'bras yos tsan+dan phye ma dang / /a ga ru dang du ru ska/ /kun tu ru la sogs
pa dang / /du ru skar bcas spr-i ka dang / /spang spos pri yang ku blangs te/ /de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing / /mar ram mar gsar lan cig brdzi/ /don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni/
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / nam phyed na me
lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rig
sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyi/ mchog slongs shig dang thams cad sbyin no/ /de
nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams bslang bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang
@#/ /gis mchod yon gyi snod dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing
'bras bu'i shing sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung
nas dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur
bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i rig sngags kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar
'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na/ cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun
du mchis na/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga de
bsgrubs zin gyi/ mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no/ /zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis/ ci bsam pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza'
bgyi'o/ /'tshal pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod rgyal po'i
rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po drug pa/ gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu
bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /gang+gA'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya
stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod pa'i rab tu gnas pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang /
tshal dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni/ gser gyi me
@#/ /tog/ kha cig ni/ dngul gyi me tog /kha cig ni/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go /gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ta ma la dang

tsam ba ka dang / lcug ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang / gan+d+ha bar shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yu thi ka dang / ta ra na dang / kub pya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal
dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang / yid du mchis par 'gyur

ro| |lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing lha'i tsan+dan gyi dri chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad+ma dang /
ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i char gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dang / mi
'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rig 'dzin dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing
lha'i 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la
thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar du/ chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba nas yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do/ /de bzhin du grub pa bla na
med pa chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu
rnyed par dka' lags so/ /phogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur
ro| |don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / chog zhib mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid
du gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
@#/ /lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams
kyi rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan ba'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag
'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'on te skal pa chung ba sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams
su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad
kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig bur
'gyur ro/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan zhing don yod pa
thob par 'gyur ro/ /'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar
'gyur ro/ /dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dus bgyis nas skal pa mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus
te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le bgyis na/ thams
cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /dgos pa
@#/ /thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma ma shar bsres te bsgril la
bsgongs nas mar dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ des 'og tu shing kA ra bI ra'i me sbar nas bsgongs pa re re la
lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i nang na sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang yungs
kar dang / me tog ci snyed pa dang bsres te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / khro bo'i rgyal po
lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang
nas rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang / khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyi/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po longs shig ces stob par bgyid do/ /
de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o/ /blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad
'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /pags pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba drug khri brgya
stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang
gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di nyin gcig bzhin sh+lau ka stong
klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang phyis
dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/
mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs
@#/ /pa de 'tshal na/ bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa
dang / mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas skye bo 'bum zas stsal bar 'tshal na/ 'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/
gnas gtsang ma gcom bskyungs par shing kA ra bI ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po chab
dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug nang du stsal lo/ /de nas char bgos te thog mar
dkon mchog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og
tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med
dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slong mo ba rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o/ /ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal
par kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang snod de gang ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bar du
gcod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dag thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par
mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro/ /nga ro lha ltar mnyen zhing snyan
la dga' bar bgyid pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stob par
'gyur ro/ /tshe brdzes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te dkyil 'khor
gyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o/ /phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma
snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang
@#/ /lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal
zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi
dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do/ /gang gi phyir yon sbyang nas skal pa dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang /
gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par
'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis
te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /sgron shing dang arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /
spyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /
nub gsum du bgyis na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub lngar bgyid na/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur
nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub bdun du bgyis na/ rig 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nub thams cad du bgyis na/ brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa
gsum ris gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing ma
mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ /arka'i shing
@#/ /gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig
sngags 'chang / legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /nga mnyes par byas kyi/ rig sngags 'chang / smros shig dang / mchog
sbyin te/ gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no/ /gter smra bra'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba'am/ gsang sngags
smra ba'am/ cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po nyid dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa'am/ gos 'thob
pa'am| ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob pa'am/ nor 'thob pa'am/ 'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar
bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob ba'am/ gzungs 'thob pa'am/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa'am/ ro langs bslangs pa'am/
rig 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa'am/ nags su 'jug pa'am/
ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ji ltar yid la bsam zhing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam
gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma'i ze ba'i dbus
nas brdzus te skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag
rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas pa/ chog zhi ba mo mtha' dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te byang chub kyi snying pa la thug gi bar du kha don du gnas par bgyi'o/ /de nas
la du'i spyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des kha zas la la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo par bgyi'o/ /de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /shin tu
dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do/ /de
@#/ /nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te khye'u de'i lag tu gtor ro/ /khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags
'chang / ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang /
'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no/ /rig sngags 'chang / longs shig /'di ni/ khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog
yin no| |de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba da blangs te khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grogs shig gyis ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /khye'us smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub
pa'i grogs bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang / /gang gi tshe dgos pa byang ba de'i tshe gu gul dang tsan+dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas don yod lcags kyu lan
bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /arka'i shing gi me sbar ro/ /sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par
bgyi'o/ /las thams cad bgyi'o/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis mchis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod
sbyin dang / srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la du de la reg par bgyis na/ nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad
zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba
phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe'i tshang lha'i bskal ba drug khrir 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / skyes pa
dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du lhung bzed na
la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang gtugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /la du la don yod zhags pa'i snying po
lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa de yang gser bzang por 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te klu'i gnas su 'phangs na/ de'i tshe rgya
@#/ /mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur te/ bsgo na char mi 'bab pa bsgo ba
bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do/ /ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char ches na/ bsgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gums par bgyid do/ /rlung dang / grang ba
dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do/ /phug gi sgor la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnun na/ phug gi sgo
thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas rig
sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman
gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na/ 'byung po
dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur nas thams
cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro/ /rma ma byung ba'i mi ro la dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la/ gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na/ ci dris
pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza'
ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar
skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba'am/ tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/
zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/ /cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /
mig sman 'grub pa dang / ril bu 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / rigs ma dag pa dang / dgra chad pas
@#/ /gcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyur ro/ /nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas
bskal ba las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar stsal la la du blangs na/ ro
'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang
du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par
'gyur zhing nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dpal lha mo chen me'i
lag par stsal na/ dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
nas khug ma'i nang du stsal te mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste/ ji tsam du bsal ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /gang na
shing gcig pa'am/ 'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdeg na/ 'dod rgyur bsgyur ba dbang du
gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi gtsug tu bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyis
na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas te nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /las
thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur
bgyis na/ ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan
@#/ /pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par
'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi rig sngags 'chang de'i yon
sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis na/ me
thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ /de nas arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar la la du de med thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste mar dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi bsres
pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags
'chang / legs so legs so/ /bdag tshim par byas so/ /bdag dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang / bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyi/ rig sngags 'chang
ji ltar yid la bsam zhing 'dod pa smros shig dang mchog sbyin no/ /rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o/ /me lha des kyang
thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na/ 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams
gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no/ /lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do/ /'bar ba bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na/ skra nyag ma gcig kyang
'tshig par mi bgyid do/ /me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel na/ cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /lus la bab na/ ji ltar tsan+dan
bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na/ tshig par mi 'gyur ro/ /chab kyi nang du stsal
na/ 'gum par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du dgos pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa gang dang gang
du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyur
ro/ /du ba dang / rlung dang / me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa thams
@#/ /cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod me 'bar ba/ /bla med 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshal na/ /yid bzhin nor
bu lta bu dang / /gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas/ /phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug gi /kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid/ /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'tshed pa bla na med pa
'grub/ /bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags/ /nor sgyur smra ba bla na med/ /gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa/ /sgrub pa bla na med pa lags/ /ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na/ /
nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs/ /lan gcig dgos pa sgrub pa na/ /legs par las bgyis nor bu dang / /rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la/ /gtsang mas bzlas pa'i
las rnams dang / /gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang / /don yod chu dang me dang ni/ /me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi/ /me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste/ /de dag thams cad gcig

spungs pa'i/ /yam sreg cho ga bla na med/ /tsan+dan dang ni seng ldeng dang / /pa tang kA ra bI ra dang / /arka sha mi smyug ma dang / /shir sha kA nA ka ri ka/ 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing / /
blag sha dang ni sna ma dang / gan+d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi/ /rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas/ /pad+ma dkar po ku mu da/ /ut+pal me tog lo ma rtsa/ /bi dza pU ra bil ba shing / /sin du ba ra tsam
pa ka /dre ka bi tsu marde tsa/ /sa ha ba la tsi dra ka /shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi/ /yam sreg shing gis las bgyis te/ /yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg
bgyi/ /bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang / /mtshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang / /srang gcig tsan+dan dkar po nyid/ /srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste/ /de dag bsres
pa'i rdzas rnams dang / /de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag /zhig ga dag ni bkang nas su/ /me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi/ /sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag
legs gsal ba/ /gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi/ /gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa/ /dri zhim dri yis bsgo bar bgyi/ /ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang / /me tog 'bras
bu nyid kyang dgod/ /bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni tshangs ba dang / de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang / /me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod/ /dbul ta 'o mas ma dag
ma dgum/ /'o mas zhi gzhi bar bgyi/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis snun par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga de la mchod par bgyi'o/ /de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am/ /dngul gyi
@#/ /sgrom bur zhi ga nas nor bu blangs te sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i
mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo ni/ zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin mo ni/ nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu
de bzhag na/ 'tsho ba dang sred pa dang 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na/ me
chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i
dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang / go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu
bzhag nas gcig pu g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na/ de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams bam par gyur
nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pa rol gyi dpung dang / d+r+ga'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dgra dang
mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas na gnas
pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs na/ chab thams cad kyis phyir mi tshugs
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu thams cad mdun du mchis nas bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bsgo ba
bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par
'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la
longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni/ nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar
ba chen po lags so/ /de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste rang gi gzugs su blta bar 'tshal na/ de nas rig
@#/ /sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /lus legs par bkrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o/ /shing arka'i yam sreg shing
gis me sbar bar bgyi'o/ /yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas don yod lcags kyu gu
gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams
cad bsam pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsam pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la
bgyis shing bsam pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas mig sman sgrub par
'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ /nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi za ma gtog bgyis la de
nas mig sman so bi ra dang yung ba nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid nas thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /
de'i steng du u shi ra dang / yungs kar dang / tsan+dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /shing arka'i me spar bar bgyi'o/ /lan
stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la/ ldong ros dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni/ thams cad du mgul
la legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de nas mig sman gyis byugs na/
nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal ba khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig
le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dbang du gyur nas mchis
par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na/
@#/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te/ bar chad bgyid
par mi 'gyur ro/ /bde ba sgrub pa'i mchog dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ de dag thams cad dbang du
'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyang mig mi 'dzum par blta bzhin du bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du
'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang / dbyig dug dang / sprul gyi
dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman/
bskus na/ smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yul der g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na/ thams cad
las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /
rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ rims nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dug
mi zad pa 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na/ dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stod las thar par 'gyur ro/ /mig
bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro/ /klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba la yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang /
brjed byed kyi zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po khros pas gsad par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis
'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar par 'gyur ro/ /nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na/ rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos
pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzum par don yod rgyal po'i snying
po lan bdun bzlas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang / 'bru rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na/ rmi lam bzang
@#/ /po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad
stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na/ mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na/ rtag tu mchog stsol par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /gi'u wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig
la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro/ /don chen po 'grub par
yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dang / blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo chen
mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nag
po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na/ gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags
dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing / lan 'ga' yang slar
zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ /bkres pa'i mig la bskus te grong du zhugs na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bsod snyoms
pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na/ kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sme ba dang / ling tog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang /
mtshan mo 'thob pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i
mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang mtshungs pa/ 'dab bzang gi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang / don grub pa yang thob nas dbang
phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / don yod me lha
dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o/ /grub pa kun gyi bla na med/ /don kun grub pas mod la ni/ /mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid/ /dbang phyug skal pa
@#/ /phun sum tshogs/ /mod nyid kho nar 'thob 'gyur bar/ /the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing / /yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so/ /gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos
dag dang / /legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo/ /sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba/ /'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas/ /'dab ma me tog 'bras bur
bcas| |arka'i shing dang blag sha'i shing / /yam sreg ngag gis me sbar la/ /sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas/ /'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang / /zho dang sbrang rtsi mar
dang ni/ /yungs mar dag dang bskyes pa yi/ /sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang / de nas don yod lcags
kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang / ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /
de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /gos
sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug gi 'byor
pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus te don yod zhags pa'i
snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na/ nam mkha' la rdzu
'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur
ro/ /bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na/ nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /'byung po
dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na/ thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ /
bam po bdun pa/ mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig 'dzum par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzla
bar bgyi'o/ /de nas ma mo dang lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas
@#/ /mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gi'u wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis/ /rig sngags 'chang
ba bde myong zhing / /lha dang lha min mchod pa dang / /sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang / /dbang du gyur pa dam pa dang / /mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang / mi snang shin tu rnyed dka'
dang / /mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang / /nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang / /ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang / /thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang / /klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin
chu klung che bsgral dang / /rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyes pa dang / /de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang / /nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid/ /sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ /
g.yul dor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de/ /rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid/ /gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing / /rims rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid/ /sngon
gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing / /sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ /dbang phyug stsol cing skal pa stsol/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid/ /'thab pa 'thab mo
rtsod pa dang / /'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ /bcing pa dang ni shing sgrog dang / /khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog /rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis/ /gsad par 'os pa sel bar
bgyid/ /da lta 'di la brten pa na/ /mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing / /mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang / /gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os/ /
lus can snying du rtag tu sdug /rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i/ /rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur/ /dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni/ /rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang / /
bud med kun dang de bzhin du/ /skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi/ /rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur/ /gi'u wang bla na med pa po/ /'di la gang dag rtag brten na/ /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
ste| |mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod pa bgyid/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang / /rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so/ /gzhan yang lha ni mang po
dang / /klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang / /'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang / /grul bum mi min lto 'phye che/ /dri za lha min nyid dag dang / /nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te/ /de dag thams
cad srung ba yi/ /ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ /rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur/ /gi wang grub pa dam pa po/ /de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang
@#/ /ba yis| |gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas/ /gtsang ma yi ni gos bgo ste/ /gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su/ /dmar po chen po nyid dag dang //
gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyar la/ /zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su/ /don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas/ /rgya dar gyis ni kha dgum mo/ /de
nas seng ldeng gi shing dang / /arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / 'bras dang / til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar
du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te snod kyi nang du stsal nas de
nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis nas nam mkha'
la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /lo dgu khri dgu
stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag

por 'gyur zhing / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis
par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /mig la bskus na/ ji ltar nyin bar bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur
ro| |sa'i phug dang / thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /chu klung chen po'i nang du
zhugs na/ khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chab la gnas pa gang
lags pa de dag thams cad du dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus mtha' dag
byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ ya lad dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang
du zhugs na/ btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang phyug du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang la blangs pa de dag thams
@#/ /cad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa
dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la byugs na/ su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang /
'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las bgyis pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro/ /
mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar
'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro/ /char ha cang ches na/ lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha chang char che ba
gcod par 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum pa brdabs na/ de'i mod la
klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na/ de'i tshe lan lnga brdeg pa dang / /klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong
bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te lan bdun bsnun na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin
pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ bskus pa
tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ rims zhags gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/
nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na/ mod la nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /sha bkra dang /
mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro/ /g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum
bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis myos par bgyis pa
thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar par 'gyur ro/ /lto na ba dang / skran dang / dmu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / gzhang
@#/ /nad dang / tshad pa dang / gcin sri ba dang / gsung pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skam la bsros nas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyis lan
'ga' yang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshogs mar gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te lug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa yang byugs te mgo la thal
mo brdabs na/ phug gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnas de na gnas pa gang
lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa gnyis la byugs te me 'bar
ba'i nang du zhugs na/ me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas bzung ste rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang / bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas
su zhugs shig /rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/
thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brla gnyis la byugs na/ tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyang
du 'gyur ro/ /byin pa gnyis la byugs na/ 'bab chu chen po pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na/ nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams
cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o/ /gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang /
sman gshong du zhugs na/ skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang / sman gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / de na gnas
pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / nags tshang
tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi
gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le bgyis
nas snying la cung zad ci bsam pa dang / yid la bsam zhing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lto la thig le bgyis na/ kha zas dang btung ba'i ston
@#/ /mo 'dod rgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na/ ji
ltar bsam zhing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgral tshigs la byugs na/ ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i mal dang / stan 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba la
byugs sam/ gnad dang / gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na/ ji ltar bsam pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub thob par 'gyur ro/ /mjug do la byugs na/ rta'i bzhon pa thob
par 'gyur ro/ /nyin bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong
bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags pa na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro/ /zhag bcu
bzhir bgyis na/ mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na/ thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ /ka la ping+ka'i dbyangs
ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal na/ bya rog lta bu dang / mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /btson
rar stsal ba dang / shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang / khong sgril la byugs na/ byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /'thor bar
'gyur ro/ /tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/ tshes bco lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang
spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /nub gsum du khrus bgyis
na/ gsangs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad
kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas
gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na/ bu bzhin du phang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa
dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lus thog thag tu byugs na/ gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum
@#/ /bur 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /mda' 'phangs na/ lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro/ /gi'u wang gi ril bu mgul du btags nas
'brog dgon pa dang / ri dang / nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags
pa dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas pa la btags
na| thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzi ba med pas pha rol
zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lta
'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byin pa g.yas pa la btags na/ dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad
stong du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gi'u wang gi ril bu khar bsres la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas
mthon por 'dzegs te phyogs gang du bsam pa'i skye ba dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na/ mod la bkug par 'gyur
te| mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te/ yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ /lag pa
g.yas pa 'am/ lag pa g.yon pa la gi'u wang gi ril bu btags na/ gang du reg par nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor dang / mu tig dang / shang+ka shi la dang / byu ru dang / sa
le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bya tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal
mo brdabs na/ 'tshed pa dang / 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du
mchis na/ tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /chang tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na/ chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bang ba'i sgor thal mo
brdabs na/ 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na/ bu ram gyi khu ba dang / sha kha ra'i glegs bu
@#/ /thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na/ grong khyer na gnas
pa thams cad gnyid dkrogs par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bo'i sgor btab na/ bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na/ mtshon cha dang / go cha rnams rengs pa
dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor btab na/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa dang /
rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /dung la byugs nas mthon por bus na/ sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byad dang /
dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgor bus na/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
ro/ /phyugs lhas su bus na/ 'o ma thams cad 'phrog bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /ra lug gi lhas su bus na/ ra lug gi 'o ma 'phrog bar 'gyur
te/ gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na/ thams cad sgren mor gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /rdza rnga la byugs
te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te/ tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug
tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na/ nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa
dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi ngas dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa rnam
pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba zhi ba dang / rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid
cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po
