dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus
bgyis te spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag cing / sems can thams
@#/ /cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arka'i shing dang / sha ma'i shing dang / shing 'o
ma can nam ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang /
zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang
bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo / /de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor
yug tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba
dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo dang / gcan gzan gdug pa can dang / sprul dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa
dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgyar khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas
ma lags/ nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa
dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'khrug pa dang / skrod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / sdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems
can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /
nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang /
sman dang / nags tshang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa
myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yul de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu
nad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar tshor ba dang / yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang /
@#/ /gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i
phyir rtag tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu srung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur
ro/ /rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te yongs su skyong ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped pa bgyid bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pa thams cad zlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs
su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par srung bar
'gyur ro/ /gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong
dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa
bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par dgongs
par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi
tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la
bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su srung ba dang / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du blta
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal pa dang / dri chu skyo ma bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na/ mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /nad
gyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na/ rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dri chab dang thal bas
@#/ /khrus bgyis na/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /btson ra na mchis pa'am/ phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos
la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa dang / dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro/ /me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so//
de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni/ ma bsgrubs par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang / /shin tu bkra shis mchog
dge la/ /legs bar khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag /sems can kun las brtse ba dang / /snying rje dam bas brgyan pa dang / /don
yod zhags pa'i rig sngags tshe/ /grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal/ /bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag /'grub par bgyid de som nyi med/ /'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag
de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na/ /lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyi/ /phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la/ /bsod nams
phung po khri phrag skyed/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang / /sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ /smyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig /mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa/ /
dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen pha mas de bzhin du/ /bde ba can du myur du mchi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzang myong 'gyur ba'i/ /nyon mongs pa las thar par 'gyur/ /
rtag tu sangs rgyas byang sems dag /mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med/ /de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/
bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de nyid 'grub/ /don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi/ /mdun du ba lci'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/ /gru bzhi kho ra khor yug
tu/ /tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis/ /gru bzhi lhag par thig gdab bo/ /ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag /dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su dbab/ /tsan+dan dkar pos bri ba ni/ /
dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dang / /'dab brgya gur gum gyis gtor cing / /pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu/ /ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni/ /spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yis/ /yungs
kar ldan pa gzhag par bgyi/ /a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul/ /bum pa gang ba dgod par bgyi/ /me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi/ /mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go/ /rig
@#/ /sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi/ /legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang / /gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang / /dkar
gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su/ /dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag /dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad//
'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te/ /bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /bgrang phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi/ /mdzub mo dag ni mthe bo dag/
brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi/ /yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag /ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par/ /legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta/ /tshig gzhan mi
smra bzlas brjod bgyi/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis na/ sa chen po yang
g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod
zhags pa zhabs mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bla'o/ /lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang /
shin tu rab tu dga' bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g.yas pa nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mig sgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/
rig sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la
dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /lus 'jam pa dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / mnyen par 'gyur
ro/ /skra cung zad 'khyil ba dang / mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro/ /mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang /
gnyer ma dang / skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji tsam du 'dug ce na/ 'phags pa spyan ras
@#/ /gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar
'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la mchi ba'am/ mi gda' bar bgyi ba'am/ lha'i mig 'thob pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la blta ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa'am/ gzungs
rab tu 'thob pa'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am/ gtsug lag smra ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra
ba'am/ nor sgyur ba smra ba'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ phug tu 'jug pa'am/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ gnod sbyin dgug
pa'am| srin po dgug pa'am/ ro langs bslang ba'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa'am/ ri la rgyu ba'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa'am/ sman blta ba'i phyir 'jug pa'am/ ral gri'i rig
sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa'am/ yul 'thob pa'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung
chen po rab tu gzhom pa'am/ bskrad pa'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar gang du
'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral pa
dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du
stsal te tsan+dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bsgos nas 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar
bgyi'o| |khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/ /zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba
'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar
@#/ /'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /phug gi gnas phye ba thams
cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /
gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes
brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lan stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas
lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i
byin gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa
thos par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /skra cung
zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid
kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur pas khrus bgyi'o/ /khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu thams cad kyi
dpon por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams
@#/ /cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa'am/ mi bden pa'am/ yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'am/ skal pa dang ldan
pa'am| skal ba dang mi ldan pa'am/ byung ba'am/ ma byung ba'am/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs
te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'jig rten so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba'am/ thams
cad dbang du gyur nas bzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par 'tshal lam/
don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'tshal lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i
cho ga zhib mo sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te
ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / ri dwags e na ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba/
drung na nor bzang pus mo g.yas pa pheb pa/ g.yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad
kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'i steng gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o/ /gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du khrus bgyis
nas nyin zhag gcig mchis te rig sngags 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o/ /chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /snying rje chen pos gdungs
pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o/ /gal te 'di lta bu'i tshogs mi bgyid na/ bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang
ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po skyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par 'tshal
ba'am/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal
@#/ /po'am/ btsun mo'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor ba'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs
brnyan bgyi'o/ /de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor
dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng gzhag par bgyi'o/ /me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o/ /spos chab
kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o/ /mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o/ /pog phor lnga las a ga ru'i bdug
pas bdug par bgyi'o/ /dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
dri dang / phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bdag nyid la dbang bskur
bar bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzla bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag
bgyi'o| |bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang / sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar
bar mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb
'bar bar gyur nas legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/ grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i
ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na/ 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad stsol
@#/ /bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na/ de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs te dbang phyug
dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rtag tu rjes su
'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/
bam po brgyad pa/ des ci 'byor ba'i gser la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur
gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par 'byes pa byas te li khris thig btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su ril pa b+h+ring ka ra dang / bgrang phreng
bri| me tog sna tshogs bkam la bum pa spos chus bkang la me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing / pog phor
lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltams te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing /
me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings
la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te yid kyis phyag byas la/ lus kyis kyang
phyag byas te bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo / /de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra
'byung ngo / /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni/ dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang gi
mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags
@#/ /pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni/ skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang
gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad+ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ /rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs
so| |zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do/ /gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba
bskrun par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams
cad dang bral bar 'gyur pa dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa
thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la tsan+dan
dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o/ /me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing tsan+dan dkar po'i
bdug spos kyis bdugs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ /dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing /
bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu gzhag par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo / /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang pa pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan
brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo / /rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i
'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te ming brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gang bsgo ba de byed
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
@#/ /po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po
bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na
'dug par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug
par 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams
cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ /zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me
tog dmar po bkram la bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o/ /ras
la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir byams
pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dwags kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po
brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o/ /brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing
sgra grags par 'gyur la dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang / thal
bar brlag par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par
'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ sa'i 'og gi sems can mun nag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthus mun
@#/ /nag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
gnas su brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal ba thub par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de
nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan
dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la/ kun du ru dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gan+d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa
las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral ba'i thor tshugs dang / e na ya'i
pags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs/ gnyis pa zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi pa
dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi
'og tu ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po'o/ /gong du ni/ 'od dpag med do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs su
bsgos la chos brgyad nas tshes bcu lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing tshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/
dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rig sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o/ /gra bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin
rje dang / chu lha bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /gra bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag go /sgo bzhi ra dri dang / gtor ma dang
bum pa gang ba gzhag go /dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang / mchod yon gyi snod gzhag go /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya zhing a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/
spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya'o/ /ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa/ srid du khru
bcu drug pa/ thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig /thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btags te sbrul 'khyil ba bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag
ste gtsang mas gos gtsang mas g.yogs par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya
lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing pa byas la bdag bsrung ngo / /khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la dkyil 'khor bcing pa dang / phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o/ /de
nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas
ras kyi srang bu'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /legs so zhes bya ba'i
sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyi/ longs la dgos pa thams cad byos shig /khyod kyis yid
bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma grub pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab
par byed do/ /gang la dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byad
dang / dug dang / dbyig gi dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jug par 'gyur ro/ lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur
ro| |de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la zangs kyi gab tshe bzang po'i nang du bcug ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs
drung du gzhag par bya'o/ /nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te blang bar bya zhing dgos pa bya'o/ /nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/ /rig
sngags 'chang de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo
@#/ /stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal ba brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du
'gyur ro/ /rang nyid nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ /'bru dang bcas/ bran pho dang bcas/ bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog rnying pa de bsdus la/
gla rtsi dang / bri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / gur gum dang / spang spos dang / swa ma ka dang / spr-i ka dang / na la da dang / bo la dang / yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags
pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni/ dug med par byed pa'i mchog pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang / rims
nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do/ /btsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dbal dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / de thams cad la ni/ bskus na bde bar zhi bar
'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo / nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na/ sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsung ngo / /tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do/ /thig le byas
te g.yul ngor song na/ thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /byad 'joms shing / dug dang / dbyig
dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de bzhin no/ /zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na/ de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams
bde bar thar par 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo / /klad pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni/ byug par bya'o/ /mig na ba la ni/ mig sman gyi thur mas so/ /so na ba la ni/
khar mur ro/ /lto ba na ba la ni/ chu dron dang ngo / /rtsib logs na ba la ni/ mar dang byug go/ /yan lag dang nyin lag na ba la ni/ bsku bar bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni/ lag mthil
la bsku bas so/ /nad tshabs po cho la ni/ sku mnye dang khrus bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni/ sna nas gtang ba'i las bya'o/ /bdug pas ni/ gdon thams cad las
@#/ /rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni/ mtshogs mar thig le bya'o/ /snying na ba la ni/ chu dron dang lan tshwa bsres pa'o/ /khyim zhi bar
bya ba la ni/ 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la ni/ /ba lang gi
lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog phor bzhi bzhag ste/ a
ga ru dang / du ru kas bdug go /gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o/ /
khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ 'thab
pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las
rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dgug par 'dod na/ pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas te brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo/ /gu gul dang / mar dang / yungs
kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te shing arka'i me sbar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas
pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de/ de ni/ sems
mi bzod do/ /tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug ste mchog thams cad sbyin
par byed do/ /yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do/ /gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la 'dug cing / chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor
gtor na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to/ /hi ran n+ya ka shi bu la yang sbyin par
byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na/ rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs
@#/ /kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing arka'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas
dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo / /de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing rang
gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nag po
chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nag po chen po'i
steng du gtor na khugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang
du 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do/ /thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /

mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na/ mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ las thams cad
byed par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so/ /mtshan mo longs spyod par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /gtsang mas
gos gtsang ma bgos te khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos
lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o/ /de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/
srung ba/ nad thams cad sel ba/ byad 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /khyim srung bar 'dod pas arga'i yam sreg shing dang / pad+ma dang / yungs
mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/
khyim chen po srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad
@#/ /dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i mi ngas
thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar
'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi
sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po blon po dang
btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shing
a pa marga'i yaM sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams las lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ yul gru stong thob par 'gyur
ro| |'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/
mtshan mo zad pa dang di na ra brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /me tog ku mud dang / pad+ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'dab mar bcas pa dang / yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me
sbar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba byas te gtsang mas khrus legs
par byas la gos dkar po bgos te tsan+dan dang / pri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ nam phyed kyi dus su
gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la shing bil
ba'i me sbar te bil ba'i me tog dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o/ /gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o/ /yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
@#/ /pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du snod por nas btud de rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams
cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la
gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres
pa rnams las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te chu dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na/ de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung
bar 'gyur te blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /ba ru ra'i shing gi me sbar la til dang / 'bras so pa dang /
mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang
bcas pa dang / dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i yam
sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur
ro| |'bras phub lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro/ /a ga ti'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang /
mar bsres pa dang / arga'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ nyin re zhing 'di na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyur
ro| |pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bras yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ gser brgya phrag stong 'thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo
bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klung chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o/ /de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po
@#/ /dag sbyin par byed blangs la/ phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa bya'o/ /tshes
bco lnga zla ba nya la smyung ba byas te nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
mar dang / sra rtsi bog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na/ sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thams
cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /shing arga dang / til dang / yungs kar
dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na/ zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / tsan+dan dkar po bsres pa
las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyas pa dang / mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bcu bzhi la kA ra bI ra'i me tog dang / lan tshwa sna bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma
can gyi yam sreg shing yungs kar la bsres pas drag shul spyod par bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa'i tshe pad+ma dang / tsan+dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na/ ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba de blangs
la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na/ ha cang char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir gtor na/ mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /sprin la mngon du phyogs
te gtor na/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi sde mnan pa ni/ til dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni/ sa bon
bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /phug sgrub pa ni/ shing arga'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /arga'i lo ma dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na/ phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /
nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu da dang / rgya spos dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du
gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shing pa la sha'i me sbar te na le sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs
nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog dang / kA ra ni kA ra'i me tog dang / ut+pa la rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma 'ongs
@#/ /nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la 'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /a shwat+thas yam sreg shing byas la shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang /
arga dang / tsan+dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor
dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na/ 'bras so ba dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te thams
cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing / khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i cho
ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya ste/ ras khru
do gru bzhi lham pa/ kha tshar ma chad pa/ skra med pa/ thags ran bzang ba/ shin tu dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can/ bsnyen gnas
la gnas pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum za ba dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi'i snod gsar pa bzhag ste/ pir
gsar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa'am/ bzhugs pa'am/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ e
na ya'i pags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal zhi ba/ spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag
med bzhugs pa/ zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o/ /phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal
gyi phyag rgya bya'o/ /phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la mdzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang phreng 'dzin par bya'o/ /phyag gnyis don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o/ /phyag gcig na rtse gsum/ gnyis pa na pad+ma/ gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa zhags pa tha
mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang pa'i snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyis snod thogs par bya
zhing / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ sku me tog sna tshogs kyi bkra bas mdzes par bya'o/ /ri po Ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi
@#/ /zug pa| khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i phreng bas
brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag
lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o/ /ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing / /sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshos
mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang / bzhad dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngur pas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan
pa'i ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang / seng+ge'i khri bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o/ /g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
par bya'o/ /nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go /g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o/ /g.yon du dri med
'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang / nor bzang pus mo btsugs pa bya'o/ /pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus su gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa lag
na mtshon cha thogs pa ste/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad+ma'o/ /pad+ma'i stan la skyil mo krung phyed bcas la lus cung zad btud pa mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du
drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o/ /de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du rdo rje'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po
dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang ri'i bar du brgya byin dang / tshangs pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu pho nya mo
pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa 'brel par bya'o/ /lha mo chen mo dpal dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo
bya'o| |dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o/ /dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o/ /ri dang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o/ /ri'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che
sna bdun gyis spros pa bya zhing ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gis brgyan cing / mtshe'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng+ge dang / stag gis gang
ba dang / klu'i phrug gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o/ /g.yon du gsar ba chen po lnga bya'o/ /'og tu klu'i rgyal po lnga bya'o/ /thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi
@#/ /phor ba thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs
te lag na me tog dang / pog phor thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/ /steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang / shAkya'i rgyal po dang /
'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed
pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa rnams
lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes
par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no//
ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang ston par 'gyur ro/ /nyam thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston
par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis thebs pa dang / nad tshabs chen pos gzir
ba dang / nad sna tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad mthong ba tsam gyi mod la nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams
cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol
bar 'gyur ro/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang po mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po dang / sil snyan dkrol pa mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis
legs par brgyan par byas te grong khyer chen po'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyim mam/ grong du zhugs na/ ras kyi sku gzugs bzhugs
pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / ming ngas dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa zhi
@#/ /bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib
gnod zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu
phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong phrag
bdun du tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs sgrub pa'i
cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad+ma'i mtshe'u
'am| ut+pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog gi skyed mos tshal lam/ 'bras bu'i kun dga' ra ba'am/ khang bzangs gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa/ rtswa dang / shing
bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang / gyo mo dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus pas gang ba dang / shi ba'i ro rnams spangs
pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang / nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa/ lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gang nyams dga' ba/ kha dog dang / gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang / yungs kar la bzlas te kun tu
gtor ro/ /sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni/ mchog yin no/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor nas kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad
phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi skad cig kyang mi
gnas par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo / /srog chags sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems dang / sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
zhing lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ cha 'byes
@#/ /pa gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang / rta babs bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/
tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas tsan+dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga'i tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar bzang po gdams te
dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri par bya'o/ /dang po ni/ dkar pos bri'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ dmar pos so/ /gsum pa ni/ ser pos so/ /bzhi pa ni/ nam mkha'i kha dog gis so/ /lnga pa ni/
mig sman gyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar pir gsar pa dang / tshon dang / snod gsar pas bri bar
bya ste| dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa khor khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing / pad+ma'i phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas
bcom ldan thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go /g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o/ /g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa bzhin khro gnyer can/ 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang / dri med 'od 'phro bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang /
gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba thogs
pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas pa g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha dang log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o/ /
g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i tho tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /
g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs can ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo
dang / 'bras bu dang me tog gi lha mo bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu khor yug tu gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong
gzhag par bya'o/ /grar rgyal po bzhi go cha bgos pa gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang /
@#/ /zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog bya'o/ /phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung du lha dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs
can no| |de dag gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o/ /grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi
rnam grangs gzhag go /grwa gcig tu shi bA ba ha gzhag go /de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gzhag go/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po
ki li ki li zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa/ lag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa thogs par bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad+ma rigs mdzes ma lag pa pad+ma'i rtse mo
nas 'dzin par bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa thogs par bya'o/ /de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos
chus bkang ste dar las bcings la rnam pa thams cad dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste steng du sna ma'i
me tog gi gdu bu gzhag par bya'o/ /tsan+dan dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / pog phor bzhi bzhag cing a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug go /tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi
srad bu mchod phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing / thor to gcig tu me tog pad+ma'i gdub 'khor dang / mu tig dang / rin po ches
spras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te yungs dkar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te de la gdab
par bya'o| |tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi'i phye mas bgos la bgo bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang / zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par
bya zhing / gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /ro dang / dri sna tshogs kyis
bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang / dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi ba rnams sha dang / khrag dang / kun
dong dang / ke'u dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spangs te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o/ /me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal dgram par bya zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
dang / lda ldi dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhag par bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya/ spos sna brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar
@#/ /gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu pad+ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya
zhing / dus gsum du khrus byas la gos gsum bgo bar bya/ grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o/ /'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang
bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing 'jig rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+ma'i rigs pad+ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor
chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang bsam pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig thams cad
la don yod par 'jug go/ /chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par
grol ba dang / bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / lha dang / mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi bgo
skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags la brten par 'gyur ro/ /brdeg pa dang / spyo ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / sreg pa dang /
bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so/ /gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong 'gyur du 'bab par 'gyur
zhing gzhan gyis phyir bzlas cing dgrol bar mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du
phyogs par bzhag nas don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing / khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzla bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bum pa de yang 'bar la ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun
du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/
rig sngags 'chang / legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang grub/
khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyi/ las thams cad byos shig /de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa chog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de
@#/ /blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te rgyu skar rgyal la khrus byas pa'am zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la lus
thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur te rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang / mig lnga yongs su
dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu sku ston bzhed par yang 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par
'gyur ro/ /rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin dang /
tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba
dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gsang ba ba brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang / bskyab pa
pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur zhing / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /shes pa don yod pa dang / shes rab don yod pa dang / thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus
thob par 'gyur zhing sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol
gnon pa don yod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sa ya snyed sa ya
brgya phrag brgya stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya bar
'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po dgu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas
@#/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das| bdag la pad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /rig sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags
kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la blta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so/ /na ma s+t+rai ya da d+hA nu ga ta pra ti Sh+Thi te b+h+yaH/ sarba bud+d+ha po d+hi

satwa b+h+yaH/ na ma pra t+ye ka bud+d+haR+ya shra ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaH/ a tI tA nu ga tA pra t+yud pan ne b+h+yaH/ na maHsamya k+saM ga tA nA ma/ na maHsaM myakasaM pra ti pan nA nAM/ na maHshA ra dwa ti bu tra ya ma hA ma

ta ye/ na maHAR+ya mai tre ya bra mu khe b+ha/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa AR+ya ga Na ba re b+h+yaH/ na maHAR+ya a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA

pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA r-i Sh-i A R+ya gaN pa re b+h+yAHna ma skr-i twA AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong+gI r+N+NaM/ a mo g+ha rA dzan nA ma hr-i da yan/ ta thA

ga tA saM mu khaM b+ha Shi ti ma hA twA pa raM d+h+ye/ a hi mi dA nI mA bar+t+ti ya Sh+ya mi sid+d+h+yaM tu me man+t+ra pa dAHsarba kAR+ya Ni/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sar+b+ba satwA nA ny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha wa tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi

ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ si ri si ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha ste/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ mahA

shud+d+ha sa twa/ e h+ye hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hA pa d+hA pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+tha ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la ny+tsa la/

bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/

hi hI hi hI/ hu hU hu hU/ oM kA ra ma hA pra h+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da/ ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti

maN+Di ta shA rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tA pa tA pa b+ha ga wA na/ so ma A di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ bra h+men+d+ra/ ri Shi ga na/ a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/
@#/ /sa nad ku mA rA/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi nA ya ka ma hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/
g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ li ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu

ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ b+ha ga wA na/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sar+b+ba satwa sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sar+b+bo pa sar+g+ha b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba gra he b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba dz+wa re b+h+yaH/ e waM ba d+ha/

ban+d+ha na/ tADa na/ ta rdza na/ rA dza tsau ra ta ska ra/ a g+ni/ u da ka/ biSha shas+t+ra/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yaM ga tsa tu ra AR+Ya

sa da t+ya saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mo na d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha ma na bi d+ha ma na/ Sha Ta pa ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha

Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ e Ne ya tsar+m+ma kri pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra ma hA b+hu ta ga Na b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha

ya ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dz+nye pa bI ta rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra si kri ta ma ku Ta/ ma had b+hu ta ka ma lA laM kri ta ka ra ta la/ d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha a

pra kam+b+ya| ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sA ba ra Ni bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba bya d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sar+b+ba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba satwa sa mA shwA sa ka/ na mo stu te swAhA/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis 'khor mang po
ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur ro/ /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka
dang / man+dA ra ba'i me tog gi char chen pos pus mo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to/ /sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ /mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang
nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang / lhab lhub dag gi char phab bo/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po / gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po lags so
legs so/ /yid bzhin gi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di
@#/ /bshad pas rin po che'i char chen po 'bab bo zhes zer ro/ /de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas
dus gsum du khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum za bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste mchod pa byas la yungs kar 'bru
re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas na/ tshes bcu bzhi nas bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar
'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams gcad pa dang / zhi bar bya ba la a ga
ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug spos bsregs la thal ba dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bkal pa'i srad
bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na/ rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad la mar dang til mar la
bzlas te zangs kyi snod du sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog snying po dang / pad+ma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste bcos pa 'di ni/ grub pa yin te/ zas dang / skom dang /
bsku ba dang / sna nas gtang ba'i las bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byad gcad na/ mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas te lus la bsku zhing tshigs mas dril la lus kyi dri ma byin par byas te gong bu las gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te mtshon gyis btab nas dug sbyar
ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byad chen mo 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /srung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi
shu rtsa gcig bzlas te de bzhin du mdud pa por ba byas na/ srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / dngang pa thams cad dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs
pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /lto na ba la tshwa chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na/ lto ba'i nad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dug gsad na/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te
byin na dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /mig na ba la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na/ mi nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sdang ba'i
dug mi bzad pa la 'jim pa la bzlas te byug pa byas na/ dug med par 'gyur ro/ /so na ba la ka ra bI ra'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i so shing ngam/ shing ba gu'i so shing la bzlas te
@#/ /zos na so nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams bcad pa thams cad ni/ tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi
la btags te phyogs bzhir btsugs na/ mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na/ gdon thams
cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /srog chags kI Ta dang / lhog pa dang / mgul pa 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go/ mgul 'gags pa la bldag pa
byas na| mgul 'gags pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /mig nad la spos chu dang / shing pa la sha'i chu dang / pa la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba'am/ shing
mngar gyi chu la lan bdun bzlas te bkrus na/ mig nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba na ba la til mar dang shu ti zangs kyi snod du btsos pas rna ba bkang na/ rna
nad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / mi snyan pa thams cad la chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkru ba byas na/ thams cad las rgyal
bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung dang / stobs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil
'khor byas la bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
mchod pa byas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo 'di mchod de bklags pa byas na/ zhi ba chen por 'gyur te/ thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i yid
du 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /chu des bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te tsan+dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snying gar thig
le byas te rtag tu dran par byas na/ mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /khyim thams cad srung na/ pad+ma dang / na gu li dang / shing arga'i me tog mar dang bsres pa las
sbyin sreg byas na/ khyim srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gdon thams cad las srung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /yang las thams cad la nor bu sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di
dag bsags la cha mnyam par byas te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o/ /dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / mA gu li dang / gan+d+ha

nA dang / ba ru Ni dang / in+d+ra ba ru Ni dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / ta ga ra dang / tsa kra dang / ma hA tsa kra dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su man da rnams phye ma zhib mor byas te char pa'i chus
@#/ /sbrus la tsan+dan dang / gur gum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar
nor bur byas te yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste ras kyis g.yogs la
grib mar bskams te blangs la/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzla bar bya zhing / khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te mgo blos
bzung na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bla
ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang gzi byin 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa
dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad kyang
rtag tu mthun par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /byad mi bzad pa dang / dug sbyar ma dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags dang / g.yeng byed kyis mi tshugs shing thams cad
'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dpal dang / gzi byin dang / bsod nams dang / bkra shis dang / dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu ston pa bzhed par 'gyur/ thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /skal pa bzang po thogs pa med pa yang 'phel
bar 'gyur ro/ /dbung pa la btags na/ glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa dang / dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson
'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za'i
gdon dang / brjed byed kyi mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /nam yang de la rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na/ gdon
thams cad dang / rims nad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / bcos pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med rnams la
@#/ /ska rags gsar pa btags te khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gsar pa bgos te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ skal pa
bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim thab dang rtag tu rjes su mthun par 'gyur/ khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur/ shes rab
mchog tu 'gyur/ thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur/ de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi thob par shes par
bya ste| shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nor bu 'di btags na/ thams cad du srung ba byas par 'gyur zhing / dug dang / mtshon dang /
mes mi tshugs so/ /dug byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba skye bar mi 'gyur zhing
bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang sprin dang ser ba gnon na/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser pa thams cad mnan par
'gyur ro/ /bzlog par bya na/ bal po se'u'i lcug mas bzlog par bya'o/ /dran pa bskyed na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don
yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas na/ 'di bklags pa tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur zhing thos pa
mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du byar 'dod na/ lus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa de thams
cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /pus mo gnyis la byugs na/ chu klung chen po pus mo nub tsam gyis pha rol tu rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dmag gam/
g.yul ngo'am/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ ri khrod dang / tshad tshing dang / ri sul dang / dgon par phyin pa na sgreng ba byas na/ bde ba dang / bde legs su rgal bar 'gyur zhing / chom po
dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar med par 'gyur ro/ /btson ra thams cad du song ba na byug pa byas
na| shing sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / lcags sgrog gis bcing pa thams cad chag grugs su 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid la bskus na/ mtshon cha mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mig gnyis
