la bskus na/ gnyid log pa'i tshe rmi lam chen po rmi bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar bsam zhing smon pa snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad
@#/ /cing thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de la mig nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /kha'i nang du bzhag na/ gang bslangs pa sbyin par
byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa la dpral bar byug pa byas na/ byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/ thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil du
bskus nas glang po che la reg na dbang du 'gyur zhing gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba'i dbus su thig le byas na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par
'gyur ro/ /mid pa la byugs na/ mgrin sngon bzhin du bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /'o ma dang sbyar te mig la
bskus na/ mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur
ro| |thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gnas kyi mtshor por na klu chen pos char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /char ha cang che ba'i tshe chu dang bsres te nam mkha'
la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin la bltas te sar ba'i rgyun la gtor na/ ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag pa la btags na/ gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par
'gyur ro/ /rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags te me'i nang du zhugs na/ mes mi tshugs shing tsan+dan bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro/ ral gri la byugs te g.yul ngor song na/ lus thams
cad gcig tu 'bar bar gyur nas pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /nad chen pos thebs pa'i nad pa tshabs po che la phye ma byin
na| nad tshabs chen po las thar par 'gyur ro/ /tshad pa dang pho ba na ba la chu dron las btang na/ mod la yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /rtsib logs na ba la dar ba las btang na
zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad la ni/ zhun mar dang / til mar las sbyar te sku mnye dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba'i nad dang / snar blugs pa dang / byug pa byas na/ nad
thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phug gi sgor khor yug tu byugs la snying po lan bdun bzlas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la/
khro bo'i rgyal po gsang sngags lan gcig bzlas brjod byas nas zhugs na/ phug gi sgo chag ste rang gi khyim du 'gyur zhing sdang ba thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang log
'dren thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /khar bcug ste mi smra bar snying po'i mdo brjod par byas na/ lan brgya phrag stong bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
@#/ /kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shing rta'i srog shing la byugs na/ g.yul ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /zong la gtor na/
rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo'i gdong bkrus na/ mgo yang bar 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le byas na/ thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'dod pa
thams cad sbyin pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ bdag srung ba/ gzhan srung ba'i nor bu gang dang gang la sbyar zhing bzlas pas thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs
dang log 'dren rnams la til dang chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byur ngan pa med par bya na/ ras la dkyil 'khor
zlum po bris la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma
bgos te a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya zhing spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam pa byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la byur ngan pa thams cad med
par 'gyur ro/ /dbul ba nyams pa'i don dang / ma grub pa dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa bsal na/ gser ram dngul gyi bum pa spos
chus bkang ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te blugs na/ de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad
tshar gcad na/ til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal na chu la bzla'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar bya na/ dus gsum du lan gsum
gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcing ba dang lcags sgrog dang khong sgril gzhom na/ nyin re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so/ /rgyal po
dbang du bya na/ lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /chom po dang rkun po rengs par bya na/ rA dza ko shA ka'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg
gis so| |me rangs par bya na/ seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mer bcug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /chu rengs par bya na/ ka la ka'i sa bon chu'i nang du btab
na chu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /dug gzhom na/ rma bya'i sgros so/ /mtshon rengs par bya na/ shing gnam lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba la bzlas te gtor na mtshon cha thams
cad rengs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin sgrub na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas na ting nge 'dzin stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rig
@#/ /sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa cha shin tu mdzes
pa byas te tsan+dan gyis mchod par bya zhing gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon
du phyogs par bzhag nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag la mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog phor bzhi spos chu'i bum pa'i dbus su gzhag par bya zhing / a ga
ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /bum pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhag par bya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing spos kyi mar me
bzhi bltam par bya/ mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ ba dan gyis brgyan par bya zhing dkyil 'khor byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa
brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku
ston par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can brgya stong mang po gdul na/ ri'i rtse mor stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas
so| |sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas rdo rje'am/ mdung rtse gsum la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas tsham ngam bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po'i
bsdigs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te khros pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsor te nam mkha' la 'phangs na/ bdud la sogs pa sdang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/ /
las thams cad grub pa dang / gsang sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang / bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya
bcings te stong nyi shu bzlas na/ grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'dod pas stong sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku gdung dang bcas pa la mig gtad
de khri bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs mnan te khri bzlas na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mnan te bzlas brjod lan stong byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul ba byas na/ 'phags
@#/ /pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi sku gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing thams cad du don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/ ma bsgrubs ma bklags par 'grub cing cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
snyoms dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtse ba dang / byams pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par bstan to/ /go cha bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa
thob cing bsod nams kyi phung pos 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pas rtag tu mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing bar
bya ste/ srung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing go cha bgos par 'gyur ro/ /
gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na yang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal
po'i cho ga zhib mo mchog las khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la shes rab dang byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan to/ /na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra badzra d+ha re b+h+yaH/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ baM

ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha sta/ ka la ka la/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ri ta/ tsa re shwa ra/ e h+ye hi/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ba

ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA pa shu pa taM pe Sha d+ha ra/ ha hA hi hI hu hU/ oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha
sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga wA na/ so mA di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+men+d+ra/ ri Shi ga Na/ de ba ga NA b+h+yartsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/
mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru da/ biSh+Nu bA sa b+ha/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+tA ba lo ka/ bi lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ mu

ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na/ tA Da na/ tardza na/ rA dza taska ra ag+ni/ u da ka/ bi Sha shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ba la bo d+h+yaM ga tsa tu rAR+ya sad t+ya sam pra kA sha

ka/ ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA tsi t+ya na d+h+ya kA ra pra sha ma na mi li mi li/ e Ne ya tsarma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si na ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe
@#/ /ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra si kri ta/ ka ra bu Ta d+ha na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha a pra kam+p+ya/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra

ka/ ba hu satwA san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ sar+b+ba mA rA di pra duSh+Ta pra marda ka /sar+b+ba sid+d+h+ya shA pa ri pU ra ka /a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi She kai ra/ b+ha ban+ta/ a mo g+ha rA dza
hUM phaT| na mo stu te swAhA/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga snga ma de lta bus las thams cad pa don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo zhes bya ba grub pa mchog las thams cad pa'o//
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA ka ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+hA pa ra da pa sha hastA
ya| mA hA/ shud+d+ha satwA ya/ A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga wA na/ pad+ma ha sta/ ba ra da ka rAM gu le/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ri/ pri sA da/ shI g+h+raM A gats+tsha/ ma hA be ga/
bi b+ha shI ta ra sh+mi/ ha sa ha sa/ a mo g+ha shud+d+he/ sa ha sa ha/ tsa la tsa la/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga wA na/ a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ ma ma g+han+d+ha pu Sh+pa sa ma mardza ni yaM pra
tIts+tsha/ tri rat+na sad t+ye na/ a mo g+ha sid+d+he swAhA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug pa a ga ru'i bdug pa la
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba gan+d+ha ba ti si ta/ a mo

g+ha b+hu dza/ ba ra dA ya/ sar+b+ba gan+d+ha mA l+ya/ bi b+hu Shi ta pri ye/ tsan+d+rar+d+ha shri ra si pri ye/ gan+d+ha gan+d+ha nu le pA na sA ma ma pri tits+tsha/ ba ra ba ra ba ra d+ta ya swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas te
dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ma hA pra b+ha

su bi ma le/ brah+ma be sha d+ha re/ su ma ti ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ bi tsi tra puSh+pa mA l+ya bi b+hu Shi te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya pra mo da na ku ru pra tIts+tsha
ma ma puSh+pa ba re swAhA/ me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA
ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ba ra de/ sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga wA na/ sa ma ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta shI sid+d+he/ b+ha ga wA na/ a ba lo kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwa a wa lo ka ni/ a mo g+ha
pa ti pA sha haste/ sid+d+he sid+d+he/ sid+d+ha ba ra de/ sid+d+h+yan+tu te/ bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sata t+ye na/ tu ru tu ru sad t+ya sa ma ya pA lA ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
@#/ /dbang phyug dran par bya ba'i rig sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/

ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu re d+hu re/ badzra d+ha ra/ pad+ma dza be/ bi ga tA ba ra de/ be ga be ga/ b+hu Tu b+hu Tu/ sar+b+ba bi dza pri ye/ bu d+d+ha d+ha rma saM g+ha sad t+ye na/ mi li
mi li swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas te sbyin no/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA
ru Ni kA ya/ a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na kA ya/ b+ha ga wA na/ A ha ra A ha ra/ pad+mA sa na pad+mA b+hu dze/ shwe taM ge/ shwe ta su dze shwe ta ma l+ya bi b+hu Shi te/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/
dz+wa la bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sad t+ye na swAhA/ mar me'i sngags te/ lan bdun bzla'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/

ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi ri bi ri/ pad+ma pA Ni a ga mA ga ma a mo g+ha tad twa sid+d+hi sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ga ga na rash+mi sany+tso di ta/ sar+b+ba bid+ya d+ha ra bi sho d+ha ne/ a mo
g+ha sid+d+he swAhA/ spos chu'i dri zhim po'i bum pa la lan bdun bzlas te khrus bya'o/ /khrus kyi rig sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/

bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu me d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu me/ pad+me pad+ma ni ra b+hA se/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha ka pa tsa na pra b+ha sa bi ma le/ shud+d+ha rA shI/ shud tsi
shud tsi| shu tsi go tsa ra sid+d+he/ pad+maM ga ba ti/ pra ba ra Ni swAhA/ gos kyi rig sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas pas so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa

rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shA me sha ma ya/ shAn+te me/ ma ma swAs+t+yaM naM ku ru/ shAn+to si mi sar+b+ba pA pa shAn+ta shu d+d+ha ka l+yan be ra dze/
shAn+ti bi dza ya/ dza ya sid+d+he b+ha ga wAn AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya sa ra sa ra swAhA/ mal cha la bsngags te nyal na/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad mi mthong
ngo / /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga prA kaR+Sha Ne/ di ba bya dza la/ dza lA ba he/

dza la saM k+Sho b+ha yaM nA ga dza la saM sho d+ha ni pad+ma sa re/ pad+ma bi shud+d+he/ pA Ni dza la saM sho d+ha ya/ A da man d+ha ra d+ha ra sa le le swAhA/ chu'i sngags te/ khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i
chu blangs la lan bdun bzlas te spyad do/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwAM hi ti ka rA ya/
@#/ /a mo g+ha ba ra pra dA ya/ sarba satwaM man na pA na pra dA ya/ de ba nA gA da yA b+ho dz+ya bi d+hi d+ha ra ma nu pra dA ya/ sa ka la b+hu ba ne/ b+hu ba na bi sho d+ha
ni/ san+ta rbA yaM pra b+ha ra bi shud+d+he swAhA/ dbul ba'i sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA k+'a tu Ni kA ya/

sar+b+ba de bA su ra na ma skri te/ sa ma sa man+ta pra pU ra ne/ sa ma gan+d+ha ba b+ha si te/ ga ga na bi shud+d+he/ muk+ti pra b+he/ dza ye/ bi dza ya/ dza ya ni ra mA l+yo pa na ya te/ puSh+pa mA l+ya

gan+d+ha bi sho d+ha na/ bi sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+he pad+ma bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ me tog nyid dor ba'i rig sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA/ /na ma A R+ya a ba lo ki te shwa re ya/

bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hI sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra Ni na d+ha re b+har Ni ban+d+he/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ shukra bi sho d+ha ni/ shu kra mA la ling+gi ti/ shu kra bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+ha bi
ma le swAhA/ rtswa ku shAm/ ras kyi srad bu'am/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rta gcig bor ba byas na/
khu chu 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/
bi ma le dz+wa le/ pra b+ha si bi ra dza/ sUR+ya ba ti dza ya pad+ma mA la d+ha re swAhA/ me'i sbyin sreg gi thal ba la lan bdun bzlas te kun tu gtor na/ bgegs dang log 'dren
thams cad kyis nam yang mi tshugs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dza le dza le/ dza
la ba ti/ dza la pra b+ha wa ni/ nA ga sra ba Ni/ dib bya bI ri Ni/ mi li mi li swAhA/ nye reg gi rig sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA k+'a ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ri Ni ha ri Ni/ ping+ga li ping+ga li/ hi ri hi ri/ b+ha ga wAn/ ni tsa la pra tsa la/ pri tI tiSh+Tha mAM rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma
bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sad t+ye na swAhA/ stegs bu'am/ rtswa ku sha bting ba la lan bdun bsngags so/ /stan gyi rig sngags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba maN+Dal ni
ba si na de ba tA nAM/ na mo bid+yA de ba tA nAM/ sar+b+ba ka la pa sid+d+ha nAM/ na ma AR+ya a pa la ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga ba
te pad+ma sun+da ri/ ma hA bid+yA de ba ti/ tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma sun+da ri/ be ga ba ti/ su ru su ru swAhA/ nyin re zhing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang spos chus
@#/ /pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes pa dang / gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma mchod nas bzlas brjod lan bdun byas na/ nam yang bgegs
thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHkro d+ha rA dza ya/ na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na maH

sar+b+ba sid+ya ku la baM sha s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya pra b+ha bi ni/ sar+b+ba big+h+nan pra sha ma ni/ A ha rA/ saM ha ra/ pad+ma bi Tho ba biSh+Te/ ma Ni ka Na ka bi b+hu She ta/ ka
ma la b+hu dze/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ tA rA ya ba ra ma/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya/ dza ya tre ne tre/ ba ra da b+hu dze/ sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga wA na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/
b+hu ru b+hu ru/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ bi b+hu Shi ta ta nu/ ma hA b+ha ya ha re/ A lo ka ya/ bi lo kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwA ba lo ki ni/ ba ra ba ra de swAhA/ las thams cad pa'i
rig sngags te/ khyad par du ni rig sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i las mi rnams bsrung bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki
te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ pa ra pa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sa man+te na/ a mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/
tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sad t+ye na swAhA/ thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas yul bcing ngo / /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba
lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ di shA ban+d+ha ni/ a mo g+he/ a pra ti ha te/ mu ru mu ru/ su ru su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sar+b+ba
big+h+Nan bi nA sha ni/ pad+ma sa ra pi phu Shi te/ bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sad t+ye na ban+d+ha/ a dzi ta ba de swAhA/ spyan drangs te phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma AR+ya
a be lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ pi ri pi ri/ ba ra ba ra/ pra b+ha ra bi
mA na d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga wA na/ A r+yA ba lo ki shwa ra sh+tsa/ b+ha ga wA na/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pad+me swAhA/ me tog ji snyed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas te snyim pa nas phul na/ slar gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po
khro bo chen po'i snying po'i mchog sgrub na sgrub sla ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /cho ga zhib grub grub pa che/ /khro bo'i rgyal grub grub pa mchog /don yod pa
@#/ /ni grub pa'i mchog /rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya'o/ /don yod rgyal po khro chen gyi/ /snying po dam pa sgrub pa na/ cho ga zhib grub grub pa
che| |khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa mchog /grub pa'i mchog ste don yod pa/ /rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya/ /gang brjod pa tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo'i mchog 'grub pa/
sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong gis gzigs par 'gyur ba/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa
'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba/ bsod nams kyi phung po bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ stobs dang brtson 'grus skyed pa/ cho ga
zhib mo thams cad don yod pa/ de kho na nyid sgrub pa 'grub pa/ dran pa tsam gyi mod la ni/ /sa gzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la/ /sum cu'i lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing / /lhar
bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas/ /klu rnams 'dir ni yed yed cing / /gnod sbyin srin po 'bros 'gyur ba/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /rig sngags rgyal po bla med
kyis| |phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas/ /dpung dang bcas shing bzhon bcas pa'i/ /lus skyes 'bar ba'i phreng can kun/ /'dar zhing kun tu 'dar yed yed/ /rgyal po chen
po bzhi po yi/ /gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing / /de dag thams cad 'dus gyur nas/ /'jig rten dbang la skyabs dong zhing / /bcom ldan mgon po bskyab tu gsol/ /
thugs rje'i bdag nyid bskyab tu gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i snying po rig sngags rgyal po'i snying po 'di gang gis bklags pa tsam gyis
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu 'grub cing / dran pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/ dngos grub dang
mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA

ya| na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me pad+me/ pad+me d+ha ra bi b+hu Shi ta/ b+hu dze/

tsa ra tsa ra/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ bi tsi tra mau la d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka badzra bai DUR+ya laM kri da shA rI ra/ ra ra ta ra/ ta tA ya ta rA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti bA ra Na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pa sha haste/
@#/ /ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha ya ka /sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ba ra da pad+ma sa na pad+ma gau ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka /a b+hi She ka te ma hA kA

ru Ni kA ya/ ba la ba la/ ma hA be ga d+ha ra/ bi kri tA na ya na/ daMSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA te dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pi lu la dza na ba ra da ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti bi Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/

pra ba ra pu N+ya saM b+ha ra/ su ga ta d+ha na sa mA d+ha/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ duSh+Ta da ma ka /rau dra pra la da ma ka /kro d+ha rA dza ma hA be ga d+ha ra/ sa ma sa ma ma hA s+tha

ma prap+ta/ tsan+d+ra sUR+ya a ti re ka pra b+ha sa la ma la sarba ma la bi sho d+ha ka /sar+b+ba ri Shi ga Na sa n+ta ti ma hA ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha dzi na laM kr-i ta dza Ta/ dak+Shi Na tsan+d+ra laM

kr-i ta shir/ ma tha ma tha/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hu ta ga na b+ha na dza ka /ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ga Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/ na k+Sha tra mA la sar+b+ba big+hAn bi nA shA na ka ra/ pa ra mai tri ci t+ta ma hA kA ra

Ni k+Sha /pa ra pa ra/ pa ri pUr+Na maN+Da la sau mya mu kha/ Sha Ta pa ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka /mi li mi li/ e Ni ya tsarma ni ba san/ bya g+h+ra tsa rmod ta ri ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba thA ga ta a

ba lo ki ta/ tri ne tra tri shU la d+ha ra/ badzra dz+wa la d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ ya ma wa ru Na ku be ra rU pa d+ha ra/ nA gen+d+ra rU baM d+ha ra/ bi ma la bi shud+d+ha de ha sar+b+ba pA pa sha ma

ka sar+b+ba bar Na bi sho d+ha ka /sar+b+ba ka li bi Sha na ka/ stai lo kya ba shaM ka ra/ sar+b+ba satwa bi sho d+ha ka /bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta shud+d+he/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ a

ba lo ki ya mAn/ sa ma sa ma/ sar+b+ba karma me sA d+hA ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha hri da ya sid+d+he/ guh+ya ni pa si ni ba ra da hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swAhA/ grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di
bshad ma thag tu 'byung po'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing /
gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas ba spu langs te skrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya
byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / skrag par gyur pa'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srongs pa gong ba thams cad
dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / lha dang / klu gang dag chu na gnas pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang / lha
gang dag lang+ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad dang / gang dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / nam
@#/ /mkha'i lha thams cad dang 'khrugs par gyur nas nam mkha' las babs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa'
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / ut+pal dang / pu N+Da rI ka dang / man+dA ra ba dang /
man+dA ra ba chen po'i char dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam ri bo po Ta lar phab ste lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len cing / ha ha zhes ca co dang ga
zhi'i sgra bton nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don du rig sngags chen po 'di bshad do/ /zhes ched du
brjod pa chen po ched du brjod do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gang na ba der song ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po'i cho
ga zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshad do/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po rig sngags chen po'i snying po 'jig rten mgon po thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das/ cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po grub pa'i mchog las thams cad grub pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i mchog cho ga dang yo byad
du bcas pa bshad pa/ sras gru bzhi pa/ kun nas cha legs par phye ba/ kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skra med pa/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong
dang ldan par byas pas tshon lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar bar bzhag la bri bar bya ste/ dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral ba'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs
shing rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ thor tshugs kyi g.yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ ri dwags e na ya'i phags pa gyon pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i steng na pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa/ zhal
g.yas pa 'jigs su rung ba khro gnyer can/ thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu zla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin sgyur
@#/ /cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad+ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs pa/ gsum pa
don yod zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyan gtod par bya zhing / bzhi pa
dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang ba khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang bcas shing lus
btung par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mig gtod par bya'o/ /g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dzem bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing
don yod pa'i zhags pa la mig gtod pa bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o/ /
phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na pad+ma thogs pa bya'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o/ /ral pa gcig
ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o/ /gong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna
tshogs thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje
'jigs su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra ba bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po Ta
la na gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu pa/ mthong ba
tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yongs su thar
par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong bas mthong ba tsam gyi mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar med pa la
gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa thams cad
kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ shi
@#/ /nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas tshe rabs brgya stong phrag lnga bcu rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ /
byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na/ lhag par mang du byed pa
lta ci smos te/ de ni/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/
dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'am/ btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig
gis ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod
na| des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas pa yin no/ /gang zhig khro bo
don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te chus dbang bskur na/ des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du de ltar shas par bya'o/ /gang gis don yod
par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan gsum
bzlas te bskor ba lan bdun byas la/ chu'i mchod yon dang / lha bshos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes smras na/ des khyod kyis 'di ltar
shes par bya ste/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam
grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la mig gtad
de lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis sbyar la snying gar bzhag cing / tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan
@#/ /ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brgya stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong
phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zhib mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang /
don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod pa des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas gnas
gtsang zhing dben pa/ dben par gnas sam/ 'chag sa'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ phug gam/ ri'i rtse mo'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang par gtsang sbra dang
byi dor byas te ba ser mo'i lci ba legs par mnyes la/ ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bskus la spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod par bya'o/ /dri chab kyi bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis bkang ste ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ me tog dang / bdug spos dri zhim po dang / gtor ma dang / me tog gi
phreng ba nyid shu rtsa gcig gzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya/ 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya/ stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang
ba'i snod gzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang / sbyar thug dang / khaN+Da kha d+ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lag pan dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par
bya| a ga ru nag po dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / ga pur dang / kun tu ru dang / shi ri pA sa ka dang / cung peng rnams snod du bzhag nas a ga ru'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin sreg bya/
me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bltam par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs
par byas pas tshes bcu bzhi nas bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rig sngags
'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te dri chab kyis dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung
du 'dug ste bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya/ de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal
@#/ /bo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas kun tu snang bar byas te lan gsum bskor ba byas
nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral pa'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags
'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur/ mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag
gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/ phyag na pad+ma'i pad+ma lo
ma g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra 'gyur bar 'gyur te| rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis don yod
pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyi/ las thams cad byos shig /khyod kyis don yod grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa grub bo zhes nas de nas 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do/ /'di ni/ grub pa'i mchog bla na med pa
ste| ma bsgrubs par las byed pa'o/ /de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod pas me tog pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te
gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul la/ yang lan bdun bzlas
nas me tog snying po blangs te gang la byin pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa la byin na/ gnod thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyis thebs pa la
byin na| nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor gtor na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi ro bsregs pa'i
sa'i steng du gtor na/ sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mnar med pa na gnas pa'i sems can la gtor na/ skad cig de la
yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nyal ba'i sngas su bzhag na/ rmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing yid
du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa 'am bud med gang gi steng du gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing grib ma bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i steng du
@#/ /gtor na/ de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi steng du bzhag na/ 'gugs par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /mig
sman sgrub par 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mig sman ldong ros la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ grub pa'i rtags gsum ston par 'gyur te/ 'bar ba dang /
dbu ba 'byung ba dang / dud pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des mig la bskus na/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi gnas
thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le byas na/ phug thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur
ro| |yan lag dang nying lag la bskus na/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ spyi bor thig le byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog
sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /mig la byugs na/ khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad
'grub par byed do/ /mtshan mo mig la bskus na/ nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha phug nas dor bar bya'o/ /
rang gi lus la byugs na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed
par 'gyur te/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na bza' ba dang snying gar bsku ba byas na/ nag po chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi gzugs
ston par 'gyur ba nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs mang po ston par 'gyur/ zla ba dang / nyi ma ston par 'gyur/
ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / sau bi rA ka dang / gur gum dang / kra ku d+ha la don yod par grub pa khri bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i
rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te thams cad du mi smra bar bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btags la ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon
du phyogs te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la tshes bco lnga nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te phye ma zhib tu btags te/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /
khro bo'i rgyal po dang / don yod pa grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/
@#/ /mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la nyin zhag gcig myung ba byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du
'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i zhag pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya
byas la| khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu mig la bskus nas don yod par grub pa'i gzungs bzlas par byas na/ bskus pa tsam gyis 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po Ta la dang bcas/ /gzhal med khang dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta la na gnas pa
mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med chos 'chad pa mthong par 'gyur/ chos
bshad pa de yang thos par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing chos 'chad pa'i gsung gi sgra de yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rigs su skyes pa
dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa gang yin pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing rmi lam du ston par mdzad do/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong par 'gyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin
par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thebs pa
thams cad la mig sman 'dis bskus na/ nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /dug thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis dug med par
'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad la mig la bskus na/ mi mthong bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / g.yo can dang / chom po dang / rkun po thams cad kyis mi
mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshon gdab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug la mig la bskus na/ thams cad las rgyal zhing lan thebs
par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul do thams cad du mig la bskus na/ g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing dpung gi mchog rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i
@#/ /tshe mig la bskus na/ rgyal po bcun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi smra bar grong khyer du song na/ skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang /
bu mo grong khyer na gnas so chog thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mig g.yas pa la bskus na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mig gis mthong pa de thams cad dbang du
'gyur ro/ /mig g.yon pa la bskus na/ rigs ngan thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste don
yod pa grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ de nas don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ thams cad kyis bzung ba byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon du mthong ba thob par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad 'grub par
'gyur| sngon gyi sgrib pas mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su skye ba dran par
'gyur| lha thams cad kyang mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /phyag g.yon pa mnan te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod byas na/ bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so/ /gang gi
tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa byas na/ lha dang / klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad bar phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su mnan te klu la sogs pa thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling
mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyur ro snyam du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ gang dang gang du song ba der skyes pa'am/ /bud med dam/ /rgyal po 'am/ rgyal mo'am
dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la gang bsam pa dang / gang bcol ba dang / gang smras pa'i las de thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /
@#/ /dbu nas bzung ste bzlas na/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang bsgyur cing bsgo ba bzhin byed par
'gyur ro/ /thog mar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas bzlas pa bya'o/ /zhabs gnyis mnan te stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na/ sa 'og yan chad dbang du byas
par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ mngag gzhug pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas pad+ma'i mtshe 'ur bor na/ pad+ma
zad mi shes pa 'byung zhing pad+ma dus thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /ut+pa la la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ut+pa la'i mtshe 'ur bor na/ ut+pa la sngon po zad mi shes
pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nam yang nyams par mi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog dang / gan+d+ha bAr+Shi ka dang /
yU thi ka dang / na ba mA'i me tog rnams kyang dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu dang me tog la lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas te skyed mos tshal lam/ nags tshal gyi nang du gtor na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu zad mi shes shing dus thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /dpal chen mo
dgug par 'dod pas spra tshil las lha mo dpal chen mo skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa/ brang rgyas
pa byas la/ 'bras bu dang / me tog dgram par bya zhing ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / tsan+dan dkar pos mchod pa byas la ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya zhing sngar
tsan+dan dkar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal
lha mo chen mo la tsan+dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing gnyis ka la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya/ gtor ma dkar po dang / dri chab dbul bar bgyi/ /mchod yon
stong dbul bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang tsan ma dus gsum du khrus bya shing gos gtsang ma bgos pas mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas don yod pa'i
zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byas la ci rnyed pa'i dri dang / pheng ba dang / me tog la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpal lha mo chen po'i
mgo la gdags par bya/ me tog gzhan gyis mchod pa bya zhing tsan+dan dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags
@#/ /'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya zhing / yungs kar re re zhing bzlas la dpal lha mo chen mol bsnun par
bya ste| stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur
ro| |dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gser du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo bkug par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na/ nyin re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dpal lha mo chen po la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing mchod
yon gyi snod kyang gzhag par bya/ dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya/ sbyin par bya/ longs spyod par bya/ bsod nams kyang bya zhing / dpal lha mo chen mo la
dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/ /dpal lha po chen mo rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas don yod pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar
bya zhing / tsan+dan gyi rim bu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar stong rtsa ba rgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad tshad pa dang / dpal
lha mo chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i nor bu dang / gser dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus snang la zhal pad+ma kha phye ba lta bu/ spyan ut+pa la sngon po
ltar gsal ba/ pad+ma bsnams pa/ gdan pad+ma nor bu dang / rin po che dang / gser mang po'i pad+ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa
lha'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba mdun na
'khod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs par mi bya zhing sems dga' bar byas la gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzla bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma

AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA a mi g+ha ba ra dA ya/ tad+ya thA oM pad+mi Ni pad+ma te tra pad+mAM ge/ pad+ma d+ha re/ pad+ma pa ti/ pad+ma

pri ye/ pad+ma gau rI/ pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma sa na pra tiSh+Thi te/ a ba li ki ta pri ye ba ra de ba rA dA yi ni pra si ta pra sA d+ha ya ku ru ku ru/ AR+ya a ba lo ki te ba ra de hu ru hu ru pa raM gi ni

tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma bi b+hu Shi te pad+ma bri ye pad+ma gau rI bi tsi tra bi mA na d+ha re b+ha ra b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra sma ra sa ma ya/ a ba lo ki te shwa ra sa me/ sat+ya a d+hi Sh+Thi te de bi a mi b+ha pA
@#/ /sha ba ra de hUM/ na mo stu te swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis lha mo dpal chen mo phyag brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur
zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshur shog /thugs las skyes pa/ gsungs las skyes pa khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo
dang bcas pa grub kyi/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la zhugs shing / /nga'i gnas la rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams
cad byos shig /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzung sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA
ya/ na ma AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti mA tri dza ne tri ba ra ba ra a ba lo ki ta ba ra de k+Shi ri na sra
ba tu| a ma ba a ma ba bi pu la kI rti ka re pra ba ra b+hu dze a mo g+ha pA sha ti ste swA hA/ de'i 'og tu lha mo dpal chen mo'i nu ma gnyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur
te/ 'o ma'i rgyun de khas bzed de 'thungs pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur/ /skra cung zad 'khyil cing 'khyil la
mig ut+pa la sngon po lta bu dang / tshig gsal zhing mi'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma
med pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/ /cho ga zhib mo mang po 'grub par 'gyur/ tshe lo stong phrag bcu thub par 'gyur/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med byang
chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu gzhal med khang mchog na chos bgro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /nor bu chen po pad+ma
la lta ba zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am/ ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur
thams cad du stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor
@#/ /rim par phye ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo zab pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyi gnas dang /
klu thams cad kyi gnas dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas dang / phug dang / khung gi gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas
thams cad sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa bla ma
gcig pu 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams
cad grub pa chen por 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sreg byas na/ rig sngags 'chang de la bu bzhin du byams pas rang nyid bsnyen bkur
yongs su spyod do/ /'dod pa thams cad dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu
tig dang / baiDUR+ya dang / shaM kha shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i bar thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /yul ka shi ka'i gos
bzang po mang po sbyin par byed cing lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba'i bar dang / bdud rtsi'i bar du sbyin par byed do/ /gnas thams cad du song ba na yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can ji lta ba de bzhin du rig
sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang
phyug chen pos dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin chen po gsang
pa pa'i 'khor rnams dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yongs su bskor bas nyin mtshan du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po
pad+ma la lha'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
@#/ /bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
ma gang la la zhig gis lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang / lha'i gser dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog mang po dang /
lha'i gos dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lha'i dri dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam gyi phung po byas nas de dag de bzhin
gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de lta bus so sor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo gcig gi bar du dbul bar byed/
mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i til mar rgya mtsho tsam gyis bkang ba'i mar me bltam par
byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par
lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'di ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur
zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su
bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo de yang mchog
thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal lha mo chen mo gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye
ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ dpal lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin
pa'i phyir ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / zhi ba
@#/ /dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul la spyod pa dang / las sna tshogs gzhan dag pas dpal lha mo chen mo las mchog tu bstan to/ /dpal lha mo chen mo ni/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no/ /dpal lha mo chen mo ni/ don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa sbyin pa'o/ /don yod pa'i grags
pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o/ /don yod pa'i nam mkha' gzhal med khang 'chang ba'o/ /don yod pa'i yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o/ /dpal lha mo chen mo ni/ don
yod pa zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas su ma cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus legs par byas
la| dri chus bsangs shing ba las byung ba lngas byugs pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing / chang dang / sha dang / beg cong dang / sgog skya
dang / ke'u rnams dang 'dres pa dang / 'bags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma can yongs su spang
bya| sems can ngan pa dang / rten pa dang / ngan g.yo can dang / gsod skyen can dang / skye bo ngan pa can dang / khrel med pa dang / snying rje med pa dang / byams pa
dang bral ba dang / thub tshod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /gnas ngan pa dang / gnas brtan ngan pa dang / sgom nyes dang / bza' nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa yongs
su spang bar bya/ gcig gis gcig 'bags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing dri dang bdug spos kyis bsangs te mi smra bar bzlas brjod byams pa dang / snying rje
dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / yid bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing / snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems su byas nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen
mo la tsan+dan gyi bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / dus ji lta ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pa bi lo ki te gan+d+ha sa re/ a mo g+ha dza la saM wa ra
Ni pad+me saM b+hu ri ta ra ta ra mu di te b+huM swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / mchod yon dbul lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
@#/ /dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas la a ga
ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing ji snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyil mo krung du
'dug la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la/ snying po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na/ bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed
par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur te/ yid la bsam pa thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad
sbyin par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di
nyid la nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthar thug par
'gyur| nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / dgra bo thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul ngor
'jug pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor ba byas na/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang / rmugs par
byas par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i snying po dang / gsang sngags ni/ /'di yin no/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAR+ya a ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni

kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya pad+me ni ba ra de dz+wA la dzA la pra sa ri ta pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ snying po'i rig sngags so/ /oM a ba lo ki te pad+mi ni ba raM gi ni tu ru tu ru hUM swA hA/
nye ba'i snying po'i gzungs so/ /don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag
tu bzlas brjod byas na/ mtshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug dus kun tu ston par bzhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad las yongs su grol
@#/ /bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por la gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul du btags na/ gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te nag po chen po
dang / ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa yang gdon thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /skud pa nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongs su grol bar
'gyur ro/ /gzhan dag la ni/ thams cad du srad bu dkar pos bsal bar bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad la gi'u wang la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig bzlas te thig le byas na/ thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs
pa thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil la thig le byas na/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /smin mtshams
su thig le byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mgul bar byugs na/ rje rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dpung pa gnyis la
byugs na/ rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba'i skra mtshams su thig le byas na/ bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na/
dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na/ dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang mthil la bskus
na| chu klung chen po'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho'i bar du rgal bar 'gyur ro/ /dpung ba gnyis la byugs na/ gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyur/ pus mo gnyis la byugs
na| me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na tsan+dan dang spu shel tse ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro/ /ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na/ mtshan
mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing gal te de bskal pa stong du bzhag pa zhig na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lto
la bskus na/ ji srid du lto chus ma bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang / btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /pho mtshan la bskus na/ khu ba 'gags pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /ba
las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thung na/ lus dag cing dri ma med la gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sgom nyes dang / bza' nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa
@#/ /dang / blta nyes su mi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rmi
lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ gsang
sngags dang / sbyor ba dang / gtor ma rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug rnams kyi lan 'debs par 'gyur zhing thams cad rgyal bar
'gyur| phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho
rangs kyi dus su mi smra bar byas nas zos na/ bklags pas tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba zhag bdun byas na/ bstan bcos thams cad la
mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par
phye ba thams cad la mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na/ thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor da lo
gcig gi bar du byas na/ tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad na bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang / tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro/ /til mar
dang lhan cig bskol te mgo la bskus na/ skra cung zad 'khyil cing lcang lo can du 'gyur ro/ /bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bskus na/ ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par 'gyur
zhing me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus thams cad la byugs na/ mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'byung zhing rkang lag shin tu gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ rna
ba la byugs na/ rna ba ji tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na/ klad pa'i nad do cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing snabs dang mchil ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ lha'i
spos kyi dri mnam par 'gyur zhing nam yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par mi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang / skra dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so rgal ba yang gsar du skye bar
'gyur| lce pad+ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mid pa'i nad dang ske 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te sna ba bkang na/
sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na gi'u wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par
@#/ /bya'o| |de nas legs par grub pa/ mchog tu dge ba/ dge bar 'gro ba mig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di
lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags
pa'i snying po 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la mig rkang gi ril bu khar
bcug na/ ji snyed bshad pa dang / bklags pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ lce pad+ma dang ku mu da'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mi'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/
de las lha'i sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang la smras pa de dag bran pho dang / bran mo bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/ gang la dri mnam pa de yang dbang du 'gyur/ tha na
dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa yang dbang du byed do/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / yi dwags dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad
dang / brjed byed dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgyar byer nas thag ring
po na 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing byams pa'i sems kyi dbang du
'gyur ro/ /dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na/ lag pas glang po che gnon par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /gyad
kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra ba'i mthu stobs ston par 'gyur ro/ /mgul du btags te g.yul ngor song na/ gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan
lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /spyi bor bzhag ste rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po
dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing spyi bo la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang ldan par
'gyur| lag pa la btags na/ gang la reg pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la reg pa tsam gyis zad
mi shes par 'gyur/ sa bon gdab pa dang / brda ba byas na/ zad mi shes par 'phel bar 'gyur/ rin po che'i lag pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ 'bru'i phung po 'phel bar
@#/ /'gyur| nyi ma re re zos na/ dran pa dang blo chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ rims
thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ 'bras dang / mdze dang / lhog pa dang / lu'u ta dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / phol mig la byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig par
'gyur zhing nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba zla ba gcig tsam du byas na/ cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor
gyi mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus kun tu lus la thogs na/ mtshon gzas pas lus la mi tshugs so/ /chom rkun dang / g.yon can thams cad kyis glags rnyed
par mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur/ til mar dang lhan cig bskol te klad pa na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang / klad pa
phyed na ba la 'jam tsam blugs pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing phyin chad nad gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon stong phrag drug
cu rtsa brgyad la zhun mar dang yungs kar bsres te bdugs na/ 'dus nas phyogs bcur 'byer zhing nam yang gnas kyi sa phyogs der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi
yid la 'dod pa'i dgos pa gzhan thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha thams cad 'gugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan 'dren pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la skul ba/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha'/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / brjed byed dang /
gnod sbyin mo rnams dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / skem byed thams cad 'byer bar byed pa/ sdang ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa/ nad thams cad zlog pa/ gdug pa'i dug
rnams zlog pa/ mche ba'i dug dang / gnas pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa med pa grub pa/ rims thams cad 'joms pa/ khyad par du rims nyin
bzhi pa 'joms pa/ bzhin dang bar byed pa'i gtso bo/ /gos bdug pa'i mchog /gsang sngags dang / byad thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog /gang la rgyal po khros nas
gshed mas mtshon gzas pa yang bdug pa 'dis bdugs na/ de thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / srog chags lu'u ta dang / sbrul gyis zin pa dang /
srog chags go na se dang / gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang bcas pa mchog tu mi zad pa rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin na yang bdugs pa tsam gyis
@#/ /dug thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /nad kun 'phrog pa grub pa ste/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam/ /grub pa lha
rnams kun gyis mchod/ /brgya byin sum cu'i lha dang ni/ /lha min lhan cig g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /bdug pa 'di yis bdugs pa dang / lha min de bzhin pham par 'gyur/ /
drag po yis ni sum brtsegs bsregs/ /khyab 'jug gis ni pa li bcings/ /mi'u thung gis ni sa gzhi mnan/ /lha min dbang pos nyi zla dang / /gza' rnams pham byas
'khrugs par gyur/ /bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyad par gyis/ /mi'u thung ni kun las rgyal/ /sgyu ma byed pa stong phrag brgya/ /rtag tu rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /bdug pa'i rgyal
pos skya bsengs rnams/ /rnam par pham par the tshom med/ /bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya/ /'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis btul/ /bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya//
bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyis/ /sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag zad/ /rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs byas pas/ /rgya mtshor gnas kun gcer pur 'gyur/ /snod
gcig gi ni sum cha bskams/ /yid bzhin nor bu chud zos pas/ /don kun grub pa bdag nyid ches/ /bdug spos 'di yis bdugs byas nas/ /slar yang rang
gi khyim 'ongs te/ /rtag tu rgyal mtshan rtser btags nas/ /bdug pa 'di yis bdugs byas shing / /nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni/ /rin chen bdun gyi char pa phab/ /de ltar
bdug pa stobs ldan yin/ /las kyis don kun sgrub par byed/ /g.yul chen po lhung ba'i klu'i mtshor dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos rgya mtsho chen po la lhun po'i ri rab kyis
bsrubs pas/ dug 'dzags pa mgrin sngon gyis dug 'thungs pas bdug pa'i rgyal pos bskor bas dug med par byas so/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus bdud rtsir
yongs su byas so/ /de ltar bdug pa'i rgyal pos dug thams cad 'joms par the tshom med do/ /gling bzhi pa yi drang srong gis/ /des ni maN+Dal pham par byas/ /stan phyed
la ni longs spyod pa'i/ /skra can dbang pos ltung bar byas/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po bsam pa yis/ /rdzun du smra ba de rnams nyams/ /de phyir bden par smra ba'i phyir/ /bdug
pa 'di ni bden pa ldan/ /bden pa'i rgyal pos rab tu bsgrags/ /bden pa'i chos dang bden par smra/ /mtha' dag bsdus las byams pa'i sems/ /'jig rten kun la rtag
tu byams/ /snying rje dang ni dga' ba nyid/ /bdug pa gzhan gyis bdugs pa 'di/ /mtshon cha thams cad 'joms par byed/ /bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdug pa
@#/ /'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po 'jig rten pa'i rtag tu bla mar gyur pa'o/ /sems can thams
cad la phan pa'i don du rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi khyad par du dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'jigs pa chen pos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong
bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa chen po cher mi zad pa/ rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa/ kyi hud ces sgra sgrog par byed pa'i skrag
pa de la skyabs med do/ /sems can thams cad rjes su brtse bas brtan par kun tu blta bar bya'o/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs su gsungs pa ni/ bdug pa'i
rgyal po bla na med pa'o/ /bdug pa 'dis bdugs te gang gi don du ming nas smos pa yang ma rungs pa'am/ yang na byams pa yang rung ste/ yid la bsam pa rnams
sgrub par byed do/ /'dis bdugs te brjod pa tsam gyi mod la 'di rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grub par byed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsung dge
pa'o| |gza' zla ba'am/ gza' nyi ma rgyu skar nyam bab la gnas pa/ sgra gcan gyis zos pa rnams dang / mi gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang / rgyal po'am/ yang
na bud med dam/ blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje rigs dang / skye bo gzhan dang /
'grogs pas gnod pa dang / 'thab pa nyid dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nye bar 'tshe ba la bdug spos rgyal pos bdugs pas de'i skad cig la de dag thams cad mi 'byung
ngo / /bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim po thob ste gos med pa'i skye bos gos dang / rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / khri
dang / nye bar bsten pa dang / lhab lhub thams cad skad cig gis 'byung ste/ gal te yang dag par sbyar ba yin na'o/ /bsam pa dang / re ba dang / yid kyi shing rta thams cad
mngon par smras pas 'grub par byed do/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsung ste/ rtag tu 'di dag thams cad 'grub bo/ /yi dwags rnams kyis zas rnyed cing / lha rdzas kyi gos
dang / rgyan mchog rab tu 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi sdig pa thams cad rtag tu grol bas dmyal ba las grol te dmyal ba mi bzad pa thams cad las grol lo/ /sdug bsngal
thams cad las grol te/ skye bo bde ba la rtse bar byed do/ /bde zhing bde 'gror 'gro la bde ba thams cad du thob par byed do/ /bdug spos 'dis bdugs pas mchog gi
@#/ /dri snom par byed de/ rdul dang mun pa can thams cad bdug pa bsnams pas sangs par byed de/ dper na/ nyi ma shar bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa rnam
par sangs par byed pa bzhin no/ /bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing dmyal ba thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / 'jigs
pa thams cad las grol te sa bcu po thob cing / bde 'gro'i lam bzang po bstan pa de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bdug pa chen po'i rgyal po chen po cho ga zhib mo dang rjes su mthun pa 'di
gsungs so/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar mchod rten la sa'i phyogs gang du bdug pa 'dis bdug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rtag tu byin gyis
brlabs pa dang / thams cad du rgyal ba dang / de bzhin du lung bstan pa'i sa'i phyogs der gang+gA'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs
pa der rig sngags 'chang gis gang du bdug spos kyi bdugs pas rdo rje 'chang bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa
dang bcas pa dang / rtag tu ri gangs ldan dang / de bzhin du nor bu bzang po dang / lnga rtse na dang / gang ba bzang po dang / ke lI kI la dang / gnod sbyin chen po yang dag shes dang /
mi la zhon pa dang / sangs rgyas stobs dang / stobs po che dang / sgra sgo skyong dang / na da ku be ra dang / rab 'joms dang / dz+ya Ta ba ka dang / stobs kyi lha dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/
'di rnams sde dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas pas nyin mtshan rtag tu gnas nas de bzhin nyid du srung bar byed do/ /bdag gi dpal sa gsum gyi lha mo rtag
tu mchod par byed do/ /rtag tu sa gzhi gang du bdug pa rab tu bdug par bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du gsang ba pa dang bcas pa dang / chos 'dzin pa la mkhas
pa rnams rtag tu srung bar byed cing / de bzhin nyid du tshangs pa dang / drag po lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du khyab 'jug dang / lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis
po thams cad du dus rtag tu yang srung bar byed do/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin du sgra gcan dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / mtshan mo'i lha rnams kyis dus
rtag tu srung bar byed do/ /'jigs ma dang / dpal mo dang / dung can ma'i lha rnams dang / dbyangs can ma dang / sa 'dzin gyi lha rnams dang / chu lha dang / ljon pa dang /
@#/ /nags kyi rtse mo'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka'i lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu'i lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha dang / gzhon nu'i lha dang / lha'i
drang srong bdag nyid che ba dang / lteng ka'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin du lha rnams kyis
rtag tu srung bar byed do/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing / nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ste sa'i phyogs gang du bdug spos 'dis bdugs pa'i sa phyogs
su rtag tu lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs so/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dang / mgon po dang / bla ma dang / rnam par 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi skyabs dang / mchog
sbyin par de bzhin nyid du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas so/ /gnas der bdug spos gang yin pa de dag gis mchog tu bdug par bya'o/ /dri mnams pa tsam gyis
myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes so/ /sems can kun la phan don phyir/ /sdug bsngal thams cad ldog byed pa'i/ /rdzas kyi ming rnams bshad bya yi/ /lha dang mi
rnams mnyan par gyis/ /a ga ru dang rgya spos nyid/ /de bzhin tsan+dan ser por bcas/ /pr-ik+ka nyid dang gi haM dang / /kun tu ru bcas ma he'i mig /ro dang sra rtsi pog
nyid dang / de bzhin gur gum na lan+da/ a ru ra bcas dpal bskor ba/ /sA ma kaM dang spang spos bcas/ /pri yaM gu bcas tu ruska/ /ka yas+tha dang ba yas+tha/ /na me ru dang gla sgang
bcas| |ru ta a ga ru nag nyid/ /ga pur dang ni gla rtsi nyid/ /laM ka gser shing 'bras bu dang / /arga'i 'o ma gser 'o ma/ /snu ha'i 'o ma nyid dang ni/ /thod pa skal pa ldan nyid
dang / /so ma rA dza khyab 'jug mnon/ /shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid/ /nA ku lI dri nA ku yI/ /tshangs pa'i bu dang ku mu dang / /pad+ma'i chu ba sbrang rtsi dang / /bu ram dkar po'i khu
ba dang / /'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi/ /bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrub par bya/ /mkhas pas legs par khrus byas te/ /gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos shing / /zla ba
nya'am bcu bzhi la/ /bcu gsum pa'am tshes brgyad la/ /rtag tu sbyar bya nyin mtshan gzung / /sngags la mkhas pas bdug spos 'di/ /so so so sor kun sbyar nas/ /phyog
rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags dang / /me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis dang / /gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang / /mchod yon snod ni gang ba
dang / /mgo la'ang dri dang til mar gyi/ /mar me legs gru gnas su ni/ /legs sbas gtsang mar gnas de sgrub/ /legs sbas gtsang mar gnas pa yis/ /slong ma
@#/ /mchog gi grogs kyis ni/ /don yod zhags pa'i spyan snga ru/ /'dug nas yongs su dag pa'i lus/ /sdom dang byams pa'i sems bzhag nas/ /sems
can kun la snying rje'i bdag /sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgom zhing / /gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te 'jig
rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad/ don yod grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshig dang yi ge
shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te/
de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag brgya bzla'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te a mo g+ha hr-i da yan/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ sA d+he ya hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa
ya a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste swA hA/ de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas te mnyam par bzhag la las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos kyi mchog la bzlas
pa tsam gyi mod la bdug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa
snang ba rgya che ba/ nor bu chen po'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog
